K10D0239_H0240:159a-6: tshe bas nyen pa rnams la sprin stug por gyur pa'o //
K10D0239_H0240:159a-7: dbul phongs pa la yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po cher gyur pa'o //
K10D0239_H0240:159a-8: 'jigs skrag pa dag la skyabs dang /
K10D0239_H0240:159a-10: lo tog rnams la char par gyur ba'o //
K10D0239_H0240:159a-11: chu rnyog ma can rnams nor bu chu dang du gyur pa'o //
K10D0239_H0240:159a-12: sems can mang po'i dge ba'i rtsa ba mi 'gong
K10D0239_H0240:159a-13: bar byed pas spyod yul dam pa ston cing 'khor
K10D0239_H0240:159a-14: spro ba dang / tshim par byed pa'o //
K10D0239_H0240:159a-15: sems can rnams lhag pa'i 'dzam pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:159a-16: ngo tsha ba la bskul zhing 'dzud pa'o //
K10D0239_H0240:159a-18: ye shes kyi tshogs gsog pa la de'i rgyan dang ldan par byed pa'o //
K10D0239_H0240:159a-19: nyon mongs pa yongs su sel ba la skyug pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:159a-20: 'khru pa'i sman lta bur gyur pa'o //
K10D0239_H0240:159a-21: sems 'khrugs pa sdud pa ni mnyam par 'jog pa'i spyod yul lta bur gyur pa'o //
K10D0239_H0240:159a-22: spobs pa thogs pa med pa ni zo chun rgyud pa'i 'khor lo lta bu'o //
K10D0239_H0240:159a-23: dmigs pa la sems sdug pa ni gzugs bzang po la rtog pa lta bu'o //
K10D0239_H0240:159a-24: bzod pa brtan pa ni ri rab lhun po lta bu'o //
K10D0239_H0240:159b-0: gzugs zab cing rgya che ba ni rgya @159b mtsho chen po lta bu'o //
K10D0239_H0240:159b-1: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa thogs pa med pa ni nam mkha' lta bu'o //
K10D0239_H0240:159b-2: sgrib pa'i bag chags thams cad yongs su sel ba
K10D0239_H0240:159b-3: ni ji ltar nyi ma tsha bas 'khyag pa cha
K10D0239_H0240:159b-5: rtag tu bas ma gtan dang /
K10D0239_H0240:159b-7: yang dag pa'i lam la rol cing thams cad mkhyen
K10D0239_H0240:159b-8: pa'i ye shes kyi rin po che'i dam pa'i gling
K10D0239_H0240:159b-9: lta bur gyur pas ched du ma brtsams kyang chos
K10D0239_H0240:159b-10: chen po'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor ro //
K10D0239_H0240:159b-12: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
K10D0239_H0240:159b-13: sa'i snying po de ni de lta bu'i yon tan
K10D0239_H0240:159b-14: gyi khyad par tshad med grangs med pa bsam gyis
K10D0239_H0240:159b-15: mi khyab pa dang ldan pa de 'khor dang bcas
K10D0239_H0240:159b-16: te gnas 'dir phyir du nya bas 'od las 'di
K10D0239_H0240:159b-18: ltas sngar bstan pa yin no //
K10D0239_H0240:159b-19: bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying
K10D0239_H0240:159b-20: po'i yon tan mang po bshad ma thag tu de'i
K10D0239_H0240:159b-21: tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i
K10D0239_H0240:159b-22: snying po 'khor byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag
K10D0239_H0240:159b-23: khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu dang bcas te /
K10D0239_H0240:159b-24: rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus dge sbyong gi gzugs su ston
K10D0239_H0240:159b-25: cing lho phyogs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar
K10D0239_H0240:159b-26: lhags te / 'khor mang po dang bcom ldan 'das
K10D0239_H0240:159b-27: kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos gtugs te phyag btsal
K10D0239_H0240:159b-28: nas lan gsum bskor ba byas te /
K10D0239_H0240:159b-29: de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar thal mo sbyar nas /
K10D0239_H0240:160a-1: bzhin du tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do //
K10D0239_H0240:160a-2: rnam par 'dren pa rkang gnyis mchog /
K10D0239_H0240:160a-3: byams pa'i thugs kyis kun la skyob //
K10D0239_H0240:160a-4: sa chen ltar ni shin tu bzod //
K10D0239_H0240:160a-5: zhe sdang khro ba'i sems kun bsal //
K10D0239_H0240:160a-6: mtshan dang dpe byad mchog ldan pas //
K10D0239_H0240:160a-7: sangs rgyas kun gyi zhing rab brgyan //
K10D0239_H0240:160a-8: bden pa'i byams dang snying rje yis; ;rgyal ba'i zhing kun rab tu 'gengs //
K10D0239_H0240:160a-9: sred pa'i dra ba kun bcad nas //
K10D0239_H0240:160a-10: yang dag ci bzhin bde bar gnas //
K10D0239_H0240:160a-11: yongs su dag pa'i zhing spangs nas //
K10D0239_H0240:160a-12: rnyog pa can gyi sems can dgrol //
K10D0239_H0240:160a-13: rnyog pa'i zhing 'dir dam bcas te //
K10D0239_H0240:160a-14: ngan 'gro sems can smin par mdzad //
K10D0239_H0240:160a-15: yang dag brtan pa'i rtsol ba yis //
K10D0239_H0240:160a-16: ring mo zhig nas dka' thub spyad //
K10D0239_H0240:160a-17: yun ring dka' thub spyad pa dang //
K10D0239_H0240:160a-18: thos nas 'jigs pa'i sems kyang skye //
K10D0239_H0240:160a-19: sbyin pa tshul khrims bzod pa dang //
K10D0239_H0240:160a-20: brtson 'grus bsam gtan shes rab bskyed //
K10D0239_H0240:160a-21: sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang /
K10D0239_H0240:160a-22: tshad med nyan thos bsnyen bkur mchod //
K10D0239_H0240:160a-23: gzhan yang skye bo mang po dag /
K10D0239_H0240:160a-24: bkres sko ma na 'chi kun las bsgral //
K10D0239_H0240:160a-25: so so'i skye bo gzhan gyi phyir //
K10D0239_H0240:160a-26: lus srog ma chags mang du btang //
K10D0239_H0240:160a-27: yang dag dam pa'i chos tshol phyir //
K10D0239_H0240:160a-28: sha dang rus pa'ang mang du btang //
K10D0239_H0240:160a-29: bdag gi bde ba kun btang nas //
K10D0239_H0240:160b-0: skye bo rnams la thugs brtser @160b dgongs //
K10D0239_H0240:160b-1: so so'i skye bo mang po'i phyir //
K10D0239_H0240:160b-2: the tshom dra ba gcod la brtson //
K10D0239_H0240:160b-3: dbang po drug rnams rab bsdams nas //
K10D0239_H0240:160b-4: 'dong ba thams cad ring du spangs //
K10D0239_H0240:160b-5: 'dus byas mi rtag sdug bsngal te //
K10D0239_H0240:160b-6: bdag med stong pa nyid du rtogs //
K10D0239_H0240:160b-7: sdug bsngal las kun skye ba yi //
K10D0239_H0240:160b-9: de phyir dbang po drug pas sngar //
K10D0239_H0240:160b-10: 'dod chags yongs su gcad par bya //
K10D0239_H0240:160b-11: sems can gnas pa'i khams kun tu //
K10D0239_H0240:160b-12: rtag par thugs rje chen pos gnas //
K10D0239_H0240:160b-13: byang chub mchog tu sangs rgyas kyang //
K10D0239_H0240:160b-14: sngon gyi smon lam kun mi gtong //
K10D0239_H0240:160b-15: sems can gang zhig sdug bsngal gyis //
K10D0239_H0240:160b-16: rnam par gzir ba dag gzigs nas //
K10D0239_H0240:160b-18: de las sgrol phyir rab tu brtson //
K10D0239_H0240:160b-19: sbyin pa tshul khrims bzod brtson 'grus //
K10D0239_H0240:160b-20: bsam gtan shes rab kun bsgoms nas //
K10D0239_H0240:160b-21: ji ltar ma ni bu gcig la //
K10D0239_H0240:160b-22: byams pa'i sems kyi gso bzhin du //
K10D0239_H0240:160b-23: sngon yang sems can ris kun la //
K10D0239_H0240:160b-24: rtag tu byams pa'i thugs bskyed pas //
K10D0239_H0240:160b-25: de phyir myur du sangs rgyas nas //
K10D0239_H0240:160b-26: tshad med pa yi 'khor rnams sgrol //
K10D0239_H0240:160b-27: ji tsam byang chub spyod bsgoms pa //
K10D0239_H0240:160b-28: sems can don du ma bsngos med; ;de bas sems can thams cad la //
K10D0239_H0240:160b-29: pha rol phyin pa drug mi gtong //
K10D0239_H0240:160b-30: rtag tu dus ngan tha ma'i tshe //
K10D0239_H0240:160b-31: bla med byang chub bsgrubs pas na //
K10D0239_H0240:160b-32: da yang dus ngan tha ma'i tshe //
K10D0239_H0240:161a-2: ngan par lta ba'i lta klu mi //
K10D0239_H0240:161a-3: gnod sbyin dag ni kun btul te //
K10D0239_H0240:161a-4: the tshom gcod cing bder bkod pa /
K10D0239_H0240:161a-5: rdo rje lta bu'i lam la'o //
K10D0239_H0240:161a-6: tshad med pa yi skye bo dag /
K10D0239_H0240:161a-7: byang chub mchog tu lung yang ston //
K10D0239_H0240:161a-9: mchog gi bsod nams zhing du gyur //
K10D0239_H0240:161a-10: dpe zla med pa'i bcom ldan 'das //
K10D0239_H0240:161a-11: byams pas 'gro ba kun la skyob //
K10D0239_H0240:161a-12: tshad med grags pa chen po yis //
K10D0239_H0240:161a-13: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten yongs su khyab //
K10D0239_H0240:161a-14: de bas byang chub sems dpa' rnams //
K10D0239_H0240:161a-15: bdag gi don du bsgrub pa'i phyir //
K10D0239_H0240:161a-17: thub pa chen po spyan sngar lhags //
K10D0239_H0240:161a-18: dam pa'i chos rnams thos nas ni //
K10D0239_H0240:161a-19: rab tu dga' ba'i sems skyes te //
K10D0239_H0240:161a-20: lhag par yang dag brtson bskyed nas //
K10D0239_H0240:161a-21: byang chub spyod la nan tan bgyid //
K10D0239_H0240:161a-22: rnam par 'dren pa'i chos kyi mthus //
K10D0239_H0240:161a-23: thams cad mngon par 'tshang rgya bas //
K10D0239_H0240:161a-25: bsdus pa'i 'khor ni sngon ma byung //
K10D0239_H0240:161a-26: gnod sbyin khri phrag bcu gsum snyed //
K10D0239_H0240:161a-27: rtag tu sha za khrag 'thung ba //
K10D0239_H0240:161a-28: thams cad sdig pa'i las btang nas //
K10D0239_H0240:161a-29: byang chub chen por 'bab cing gzhol //
K10D0239_H0240:161a-30: kha cig khyad par gzugs mchog dang //
K10D0239_H0240:161a-31: bzod pa ting nge 'dzin yang thob //
K10D0239_H0240:161a-32: kha cig zag pa kun zad nas //
K10D0239_H0240:161b-0: 'jig rten mchog gi dgra bcom @161b gyur; ;kha cig tshad med bzhi bsgoms shing //
K10D0239_H0240:161b-1: kha cig bsdu ba bzhi la gnas //
K10D0239_H0240:161b-2: kha cig yang dag rigs bzhi thob //
K10D0239_H0240:161b-3: kha cig mthun pa'i bzod la gnas //
K10D0239_H0240:161b-5: kha cig shes rab mig dang ldan //
K10D0239_H0240:161b-6: kha cig mi skye bzod la gnas //
K10D0239_H0240:161b-7: de kun 'dren pas byin gyis brlabs //
K10D0239_H0240:161b-8: bcom ldan gzi brjid chen po'i mthus //
K10D0239_H0240:161b-9: bdud kyi 'khor rnams bcom nas su //
K10D0239_H0240:161b-10: rnam pa dgu bcu rtsa lnga yi //
K10D0239_H0240:161b-11: mu stegs can gyi ris kun btul //
K10D0239_H0240:161b-12: sems can dmyal ba byol song dang //
K10D0239_H0240:161b-13: yi dvags lha min rgyud kun bcom //
K10D0239_H0240:161b-14: bde bas sems can bden pa rnams //
K10D0239_H0240:161b-15: thams cad rgyal ba'i spyan sngar lhags //
K10D0239_H0240:161b-16: nad dang mtshon gyis 'jigs pa dang //
K10D0239_H0240:161b-18: sems can mdongs shing 'thom pa dang //
K10D0239_H0240:161b-19: yang dag lam ni stor ba bsgrol //
K10D0239_H0240:161b-20: nyon mongs myos shing 'khrugs pa dag /
K10D0239_H0240:161b-21: thams cad zhi ba'i lam la bkod //
K10D0239_H0240:161b-22: bdag gi bya ba kun spangs te //
K10D0239_H0240:161b-23: lhags nas bcom ldan zhabs la thug /
K10D0239_H0240:161b-24: dpag tu med pa'i zhing rnams na //
K10D0239_H0240:161b-25: bcom ldan da ltar bzhugs pa'i rnams //
K10D0239_H0240:161b-26: thams cad khyod la kun bsngags bas //
K10D0239_H0240:161b-27: thos nas thams cad 'di ru lugs //
K10D0239_H0240:161b-28: thams cad mkhyen pa rgya mtsho yi //
K10D0239_H0240:161b-29: yang dag yon tan tshad ma mchis //
K10D0239_H0240:161b-30: sems can mang po'i don mdzad pa //
K10D0239_H0240:161b-31: mos pa'i sems kyis phyag 'tshal lo //
K10D0239_H0240:162a-2: bcom ldan zhabs la phyag 'tshal gyur //
K10D0239_H0240:162a-3: tshad med bskal pa'i bar du yang //
K10D0239_H0240:162a-4: mchod pa mang pos mchod par shog /
K10D0239_H0240:162a-5: bdag kyang bcom ldan ji bzhin du //
K10D0239_H0240:162a-6: de lta bu yi yi dam bcas //
K10D0239_H0240:162a-8: bla med byang chub thob par shog /
K10D0239_H0240:162a-9: de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
K10D0239_H0240:162a-10: sa'i snying pos tshigs su bcad pa dam pa 'di
K10D0239_H0240:162a-11: dag gis / bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod nas 'khor dang bcas te /
K10D0239_H0240:162a-14: me tog rnam pa sna tshogs kyi rin po che'i
K10D0239_H0240:162a-15: rgyan tshad med pa snyed kyis bcom ldan 'das la
K10D0239_H0240:162a-16: mngon par gtor nas steng gi bar snang la rin
K10D0239_H0240:162a-17: po che'i gdugs su gyur te /
K10D0239_H0240:162a-18: dam pa'i chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar ci'ang mi smra bar 'dug go /
K10D0239_H0240:162a-19: de'i tshe 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor der 'dus pa'i 'khor
K10D0239_H0240:162a-20: thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
K10D0239_H0240:162a-21: po sa'i snying po mthong nas ngo mtshar rmad du
K10D0239_H0240:162a-22: gyur te / so so nas rnam pa sna tshogs kyi lha rdzas kyi spos dang /
K10D0239_H0240:162a-28: gdugs la sogs pa phul te byang chub sems dpa'
K10D0239_H0240:162a-29: sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po la mchod pa
K10D0239_H0240:162a-30: byas nas 'di skad ces smras so //
K10D0239_H0240:162b-0: @162b bdag cag gis rnyed pa rab tu rnyed do //
K10D0239_H0240:162b-1: bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis mngon sum
K10D0239_H0240:162b-2: du skyes bu chen po khyod mthong nas bsti stang
K10D0239_H0240:162b-3: dang bcas te mchod pa byas par gyur to /
K10D0239_H0240:162b-5: de nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de'i nang na byang
K10D0239_H0240:162b-6: chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rigs par the
K10D0239_H0240:162b-7: tshom 'dri zhes bya ba zhig 'dug pa stan las
K10D0239_H0240:162b-8: langs nas gos tshags bcos te phrag pa g-yas pa
K10D0239_H0240:162b-9: phyung nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos
K10D0239_H0240:162b-10: phyag btsal nas pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga sa
K10D0239_H0240:162b-11: la btsugs te / bcom ldan 'das gang na ba
K10D0239_H0240:162b-12: de logs su thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das
K10D0239_H0240:162b-15: rigs kyi bu 'di gang nas mchis /
K10D0239_H0240:162b-16: gnas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na /
K10D0239_H0240:162b-19: dge ba'i rtsa ba ji tsam zhig dang ldan na
K10D0239_H0240:162b-20: bcom ldan 'das kyis bstod pa rnam pa sna tshogs
K10D0239_H0240:162b-21: kyis bsngags la phyir yang bcom ldan 'das kyi yon
K10D0239_H0240:162b-22: tan gyi rgya mtsho bsam gyi khyab pa la mngon
K10D0239_H0240:162b-24: bdag cag gis sngon ma mthong bas ngo mtshar du'i
K10D0239_H0240:162b-25: gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag la bshad
K10D0239_H0240:162b-26: du gsol // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10D0239_H0240:162b-29: skyes bu chen po 'di'i yon tan dang /
K10D0239_H0240:162b-30: dge ba'i rtsa ba ji tsam pa de 'jig rten du bcas pa lha dang /
K10D0239_H0240:163a-1: kyis rtogs par nus pa ma yin no //
K10D0239_H0240:163a-2: gal te de bzhin gshegs pas skyes bu chen po de'i yon tan dang /
K10D0239_H0240:163a-3: dge ba'i rtsa ba rgyas par bshad na 'jig rten du bcas pa lha dang /
K10D0239_H0240:163a-4: mi thams cad kyi mgo rmongs te yid mi ches par 'gyur ro //
K10D0239_H0240:163a-5: de nas byang chub sems dpa' rigs par the tshom 'dri bas yang gsol pa /
K10D0239_H0240:163a-7: bdag cag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du bshad du gsol //
K10D0239_H0240:163a-8: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10D0239_H0240:163a-9: legs par shin tu nyon la yid la zungs shig dang /
K10D0239_H0240:163a-10: ngas khyod la phyogs tsam zhig bshad par bya'o //
K10D0239_H0240:163a-11: ji ltar skyes bu chen po de'i yon tan gyi
K10D0239_H0240:163a-12: khyad par tshad med bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang
K10D0239_H0240:163a-14: dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyi khyad par la bde bar gnas pa'o //
K10D0239_H0240:163a-15: de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul lnga shin tu rtogs par 'jug pa'o //
K10D0239_H0240:163a-16: mi skye ba'i chos kyi bzod pa'i khyad par yang thob pa'o //
K10D0239_H0240:163a-17: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la dbang du gyur pa'o //
K10D0239_H0240:163a-18: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi sa la bzod pa thob pa'o //
K10D0239_H0240:163a-19: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi rgya mtsho'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
K10D0239_H0240:163a-20: seng ge rab tu bsgyings pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi ting 'dzin la'ang shin tu gnas pa'o //
K10D0239_H0240:163a-21: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi ri la'ang rab tu 'dzegs pa'o //
K10D0239_H0240:163b-1: phas kyi rgol ba thams cad shin tu tshoms pa ste /
K10D0239_H0240:163b-2: sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i
K10D0239_H0240:163b-3: phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji snyed pa thams cad
K10D0239_H0240:163b-4: du de gnas par byed do //
K10D0239_H0240:163b-5: skyes bu chen po de ji ltar gnas pa bzhin
K10D0239_H0240:163b-6: du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de bzhin du
K10D0239_H0240:163b-7: gnas te / gang ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis tshad
K10D0239_H0240:163b-8: med pa'i yon tan gyi khyad par skyed par gyur
K10D0239_H0240:163b-9: pas gdul ba'i sems can tshad med pa dag yongs
K10D0239_H0240:163b-11: skyes bu chen po de ji ltar gnas pa bzhin
K10D0239_H0240:163b-12: du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de bzhin du
K10D0239_H0240:163b-13: 'gyur te / gal te ye shes mngon par skyed
K10D0239_H0240:163b-14: pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
K10D0239_H0240:163b-15: zhugs na ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus sangs rgyas kyi
