K10D0239_H0240:179a-40: rigs kyi bu 'di'ang de bzhin du byang chub kyi
K10D0239_H0240:179a-41: yan lag gi rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs
K10D0239_H0240:179b-0: @179b char bzhin du 'bebs te sems can la sbyin
K10D0239_H0240:179b-2: rin po che'i gling ltar rin po che rnam pa
K10D0239_H0240:179b-3: sna tshogs kyis yongs su gang ba bzhin du rigs
K10D0239_H0240:179b-4: kyi bu 'di'ang byang chub kyi yan lag rin po
K10D0239_H0240:179b-5: che rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan no //
K10D0239_H0240:179b-7: lha rdzas kyi shing pa ri ci tri la bsung dang /
K10D0239_H0240:179b-8: me tog gis mdzes pa bzhin du rigs kyi bu
K10D0239_H0240:179b-9: 'di'ang sangs rgyas kyi chos rin po che rnam pa
K10D0239_H0240:179b-10: sna tshogs kyis rab tu mdzes so //
K10D0239_H0240:179b-12: seng ge'i rgyal po ni ri dvags thams cad kyis
K10D0239_H0240:179b-13: zil gyis mi non cing mi skrag pa bzhin du
K10D0239_H0240:179b-14: rigs kyi bu 'di'ang sems can thams cad kyis bag
K10D0239_H0240:179b-15: tsha ba'am / zil gyis non pa med do //
K10D0239_H0240:179b-17: ji ltar nyi ma gsal bas 'jig rten gyi mun
K10D0239_H0240:179b-18: pa thams cad yongs su sel ba bzhin du rigs
K10D0239_H0240:179b-19: kyi bu 'di'ang sems can thams cad kyi ngan par
K10D0239_H0240:179b-20: lta ba'i ma rig pa'i mun pa thams cad sel
K10D0239_H0240:179b-22: nam thang ba'i zla ba ni mtshan mo'i dus su
K10D0239_H0240:179b-23: lam stor ba'i sems can thams cad la bde ba'i
K10D0239_H0240:179b-24: lam ston te / gar 'gro bar dga' ba bzhin
K10D0239_H0240:179b-25: du phyin par 'gyur ba ltar rigs kyi bu 'di'ang
K10D0239_H0240:179b-26: ma rig pa'i mtshan mor theg pa gsum las 'brog
K10D0239_H0240:179b-27: bslad de 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon par 'khyam pa'i sems
K10D0239_H0240:179b-28: can thams cad la theg pa gsum gyis yang dag
K10D0239_H0240:179b-29: pa'i lam ston cing skal pa ji lta ba bzhin
K10D0239_H0240:179b-30: du thabs kyis yang dag par 'byung ba'i lam la
K10D0239_H0240:180a-0: lam ston te / @180a *// 'god par byed do /
K10D0239_H0240:180a-2: sa chen po la ni sa bon gyi tshogs thams cad dang /
K10D0239_H0240:180a-5: sa'i khams su gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi
K10D0239_H0240:180a-6: rten du 'gyur ba ltar rigs kyi bu 'di la'ang
K10D0239_H0240:180a-7: byang chub kyi yan lag khyad par can gyi chos
K10D0239_H0240:180a-8: thams cad ston pa'i gnas so //
K10D0239_H0240:180a-10: rin po che chen po'i ri rab ri'i rgyal po
K10D0239_H0240:180a-11: ni shin tu brtan cing ma god ma nyams pa
K10D0239_H0240:180a-12: bzhin du rigs kyi bu 'di'ang sangs rgyas kyi ma
K10D0239_H0240:180a-13: 'dres pa'i chos thams cad la shin tu gnas shing
K10D0239_H0240:180a-14: sems can thams cad mi gtong ba'i phyir mi nyams
K10D0239_H0240:180a-15: pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad sems
K10D0239_H0240:180a-16: can thams cad la gtong ba'i phyir ma god pa'o
K10D0239_H0240:180a-18: nam mkha' la sems can thams cad spyod pa bzhin du /
K10D0239_H0240:180a-20: 'di'ang sems can thams cad de la longs spyod do //
K10D0239_H0240:180a-21: rigs kyi bu 'di ni de ltar yon tan tshad med dpag tu med pa dang ldan no //
K10D0239_H0240:180a-22: de'i tshe 'khor mang po rnams kyis byang chub sems
K10D0239_H0240:180a-23: dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po'i yon tan
K10D0239_H0240:180a-24: tshad med pa dang ldan pa bstod pa thos nas
K10D0239_H0240:180a-25: ngo mtshar rmad du gyur te /
K10D0239_H0240:180a-27: rim gro byas nas rab tu dga' bas sems rtse
K10D0239_H0240:180a-28: gcig tu byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying po la
K10D0239_H0240:180b-0: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don de dag @180b
K10D0239_H0240:180b-1: gsal bar bzlas pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad de bka'
K10D0239_H0240:180b-2: stsal pa / skyes bu yang dag sa yi snying po ni //
K10D0239_H0240:180b-3: yon tan mang po phun sum tshogs par ldan //
K10D0239_H0240:180b-4: dge sbyong cha lugs 'dzin cing ston byed pa //
K10D0239_H0240:180b-5: ston pa chen po la ni phyag 'tshal lhags //
K10D0239_H0240:180b-6: sems can kun la bde ba rab tu byin //
K10D0239_H0240:180b-7: srid pa gsum gyi sdug bsngal kun las sgrol //
K10D0239_H0240:180b-8: tshad med rnam pa sna tshogs char phab nas //
K10D0239_H0240:180b-9: ston pa chen po la ni mchod pa byed //
K10D0239_H0240:180b-10: brgya byin dri ma med par skyes pa des //
K10D0239_H0240:180b-11: phyogs bzhi kun tu bltas shing brtags nas su //
K10D0239_H0240:180b-12: thal mo sbyar nas bsti stang rab bcas te //
K10D0239_H0240:180b-13: ston pa chen po la ni bsngags shing bstod //
K10D0239_H0240:180b-14: bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor mthong ba //
K10D0239_H0240:180b-15: nor bu rin po che yi 'od zer ltar //
K10D0239_H0240:180b-16: sangs rgyas mang po'i zhing kun snang byas te //
K10D0239_H0240:180b-17: thams cad gsal bar ma gyur gang yang med //
K10D0239_H0240:180b-18: mngon shes drug gis 'jig rten snang bar byed //
K10D0239_H0240:180b-19: deng 'dir 'dus shing lhags par gyur pa ni //
K10D0239_H0240:180b-20: shin tu dpa' ba sa yi snying po ste //
K10D0239_H0240:180b-21: rab tu byung ba'i spyod lam rnam par ston //
K10D0239_H0240:180b-22: 'phags pa'i nor bdun 'byung ba'i gter yin te //
K10D0239_H0240:180b-23: 'jigs pa med pa'i sangs rgyas nga ro dbyangs //
K10D0239_H0240:180b-24: byang chub sems dpa' mang po'i rgyal mtshan te //
K10D0239_H0240:180b-25: sems can mang po 'dren pa'i gtso bo'o //
K10D0239_H0240:180b-26: rnam par grol ba'i rin chen 'byung khungs te //
K10D0239_H0240:180b-27: brtson 'grus brtan pa'i bsod nams rgya mtsho yin //
K10D0239_H0240:181a-0: @181a *// byams pa'i blo gros snying rje brtse la mos //
K10D0239_H0240:181a-1: sdug bsngal ba yi sems can mang po sgrol //
K10D0239_H0240:181a-2: 'jigs pa srung ba'i 'obs dang mkhar yin te //
K10D0239_H0240:181a-3: nam mkha' dang ba'i zla bzhin lam yang ston //
K10D0239_H0240:181a-4: sa ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad skyed //
K10D0239_H0240:181a-5: rdo rje ltar ni the tshom yongs su gcod //
K10D0239_H0240:181a-6: rnam par grol ba'i rin chen kun la gtong //
K10D0239_H0240:181a-7: chu ltar sgrib pa thams cad 'dag par byed //
K10D0239_H0240:181a-8: nyon mongs tsha bas gdungs pa'i gdugs su 'gyur //
K10D0239_H0240:181a-9: sman pa ltar ni nad kun 'tsho bar byed //
K10D0239_H0240:181a-10: zhag gcig sa yi snying po'i ming brjod pa'i //
K10D0239_H0240:181a-11: grags pa chen po'i bsod nams thob pa ni //
K10D0239_H0240:181a-12: bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig par du yang //
K10D0239_H0240:181a-13: blo can gzhan gyi ming nas brjod pas lhags //
K10D0239_H0240:181a-14: so so'i skye bo grol bar byed pa ni //
K10D0239_H0240:181a-15: nyon mongs thams cad rnam par 'ching byed pa'o //
K10D0239_H0240:181a-16: dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting 'dzin mthar phyin cing //
K10D0239_H0240:181a-17: ting 'dzin gzhan dag gi yang pha rol phyin //
K10D0239_H0240:181a-18: rkyen mang bcu gsum po yang rnam dag pas; ;mang po kun la ye shes nam mkha' bzhin //
K10D0239_H0240:181a-19: dpag tu med pa'i sangs rgyas zhing rnams kyi //
K10D0239_H0240:181a-20: skye bo mang po'i mun pa'i tshogs kyang bcom //
K10D0239_H0240:181a-21: zhing rnams ji bzhin ting 'dzin der 'jug cing //
K10D0239_H0240:181a-22: bsam gtan bzhi po la yang rgyun du 'jug /
K10D0239_H0240:181a-23: ting nge 'dzin du zhugs nas sems can gyi //
K10D0239_H0240:181a-24: nyon mongs pa yi gdung ba rab tu sel //
K10D0239_H0240:181b-0: so so'i skye @181b po sngon gyi sdig pa'i las //
K10D0239_H0240:181b-1: mchon dang nad dang mu ges 'jigs pa dang //
K10D0239_H0240:181b-2: rnam pa mang pos 'tshe zhing gsod gyur pa //
K10D0239_H0240:181b-3: de dag kun nas rnam par grol bar byed //
K10D0239_H0240:181b-4: sems can nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga //
K10D0239_H0240:181b-5: sdug bsngal mang pos 'tshe zhing gdungs gyur pa //
K10D0239_H0240:181b-6: sa yi snying po de la skyabs gsol na //
K10D0239_H0240:181b-7: srid pa'i sdug bsngal thams cad zhi bar 'gyur //
K10D0239_H0240:181b-8: sems can sdug bsngal 'khor lo rab bskor te //
K10D0239_H0240:181b-9: gcig gis gcig la 'tshe zhing gnod gyur ba //
K10D0239_H0240:181b-10: sa yi snying po de la skyabs gsol na //
K10D0239_H0240:181b-11: bzod cing byams pa'i sems la gnas par 'gyur //
K10D0239_H0240:181b-12: bcu gsum rkyen gyis rab 'jigs skrag byed cing //
K10D0239_H0240:181b-13: tshol ba mi rnyed rkyen gyis sdug pa dag /
K10D0239_H0240:181b-14: sa yi snying po de la skyabs gsol na //
K10D0239_H0240:181b-15: 'jigs pa med la bde bar gnas par 'gyur //
K10D0239_H0240:181b-16: bsod nams byed la mos shing dran pa dang //
K10D0239_H0240:181b-17: tshul khrims mang thos shes rab 'dod pa dag /
K10D0239_H0240:181b-18: sa yi snying po de la skyabs gsol na //
K10D0239_H0240:181b-19: re ba bzhin du thams cad rdzogs par 'gyur //
K10D0239_H0240:181b-20: yon tan so sor smos pa'i bzod rtsal dang //
K10D0239_H0240:181b-21: sman dang sa bon tshogs la mos pa dag /
K10D0239_H0240:181b-22: sa yi snying po de la skyabs gsol na //
K10D0239_H0240:181b-23: re ba kun dang ldan zhing rdzogs par 'gyur //
K10D0239_H0240:181b-24: lo tog rtsi shing legs par 'dod pa dang //
K10D0239_H0240:181b-25: khye'u dang bu me gos dang bran khol phyir //
K10D0239_H0240:181b-26: sa yi snying po de la skyabs gsol na //
K10D0239_H0240:181b-27: re ba bzhin du thams cad rdzogs par 'gyur //
K10D0239_H0240:182a-2: sa chen 'di yang mi gtong rab tu 'dzin //
K10D0239_H0240:182a-3: de yi rkyen gyis sman dang lo thog rnams //
K10D0239_H0240:182a-4: snum zhing 'jam la ro dang ldan par 'gyur //
K10D0239_H0240:182a-5: nyon mongs mang pos bsgribs par gyur nas su //
K10D0239_H0240:182a-6: mi dge bcu yi las la mos pa dag /
K10D0239_H0240:182a-7: sa yi snying po de la skyabs gsol na //
K10D0239_H0240:182a-8: mi dge nyon mongs thams cad zhi bar 'gyur //
K10D0239_H0240:182a-9: rnam pa sna tshogs kun gyi lus ston cing //
K10D0239_H0240:182a-10: skye bo mang po dag la chos kyang ston //
K10D0239_H0240:182a-11: sbyin pa'i yon tan thams cad rdzogs pas ni //
K10D0239_H0240:182a-12: sems can kun la snying brtse bde bar 'gyur //
K10D0239_H0240:182a-13: gal te bskal ba mang po brgya yi bar //
K10D0239_H0240:182a-14: de yi yon tan bsngags shing rab bstod de //
K10D0239_H0240:182a-15: mthar phyin rdzogs par 'gyur ba shin tu dka'//
K10D0239_H0240:182a-16: de bas kun gyis bsti stang bcas pas mchod //
K10D0239_H0240:182a-17: 'dus pa chen po las byang chub sems dpa' sa'i
K10D0239_H0240:182a-18: snying po'i 'khor lo bcu pa zhes bya ba las
K10D0239_H0240:182a-19: / gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o ////
K10D0239_H0240:182a-21: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
K10D0239_H0240:182a-22: sa'i snying po stan las langs te bla gos phyogs
K10D0239_H0240:182a-24: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos gtugs te /
K10D0239_H0240:182a-25: pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te thal mo sbyar ba btud de /
K10D0239_H0240:182a-26: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10D0239_H0240:182a-27: yon tan tshad med rgya mtsho can //
K10D0239_H0240:182b-0: bcom ldan 'das la zhu @182b gsol pa //
K10D0239_H0240:182b-1: the tshom nem nur ci mchis pa //
K10D0239_H0240:182b-2: bdag la rgyas par bshad du gsol //
K10D0239_H0240:182b-3: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10D0239_H0240:182b-5: khyod ni chos thams cad ye shes kyis mthong ba la thogs pa med do //
K10D0239_H0240:182b-6: 'on kyang sems can la pan pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:182b-7: bde bar 'dod pa'i phyir khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la ci dang /
K10D0239_H0240:182b-9: bcom ldan 'das kyis dris pa de dang /
K10D0239_H0240:182b-10: de'i lung bstan pas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o //
K10D0239_H0240:182b-11: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying pos tshigs su bcad de gsol pa /
K10D0239_H0240:182b-12: bdag sngon bskal pa bcu gsum du //
K10D0239_H0240:182b-13: spyod pa dka' ba shin tu spyod //
K10D0239_H0240:182b-14: so so'i skye bo kun don du //
K10D0239_H0240:182b-15: 'jigs pa gsum dang rnyog lnga gsal //
K10D0239_H0240:182b-16: sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig la //
K10D0239_H0240:182b-17: tshang ma mchis pa'i mchod bgyis pas //
K10D0239_H0240:182b-19: tshogs chen 'dus pa'ang sngon mthong ngo //
K10D0239_H0240:182b-20: blo can brtson 'grus rtsol ba dag /
K10D0239_H0240:182b-23: mthong bar gyur pa ngo mtshar rmad //
K10D0239_H0240:182b-24: ci slad sangs rgyas zhing 'di kun //
K10D0239_H0240:182b-25: sdig pas dge ba nyams bgyis shing //
K10D0239_H0240:182b-26: blo can dag gis spangs pa yi //
K10D0239_H0240:182b-27: ngan par spyod kun lhan cig gnas //
K10D0239_H0240:182b-28: mtshams med sdig pa bgyid pa dang //
K10D0239_H0240:182b-29: yang dag dam pa'i chos la skur //
K10D0239_H0240:182b-30: 'phags la smod cing log lta bas //
K10D0239_H0240:183a-2: sdig pa bcu yi las bgyid cing //
K10D0239_H0240:183a-4: theg pa rnam gsum ring spangs shing //
K10D0239_H0240:183a-5: sdig can dag la ngan 'gror gzhol //
K10D0239_H0240:183a-6: ma rig pas ni bsgribs pa'i mig /
K10D0239_H0240:183a-8: sangs rgyas 'khor lo rab bskor te //
K10D0239_H0240:183a-9: sems can 'di dag sgrol bar mdzad //
K10D0239_H0240:183a-10: ji ltar nying mtshams sbyor ba yi //
K10D0239_H0240:183a-11: nyon mongs rdo rje lta bus bcad //
K10D0239_H0240:183a-12: ji lta bur na gzungs dag 'thob //
K10D0239_H0240:183a-13: de bzhin bzod pa'ang nges par 'gyur //
K10D0239_H0240:183a-14: bdag gis 'dren pa tshogs chen dag /
K10D0239_H0240:183a-15: mthong bar gyur pa ngo mtshar che //
K10D0239_H0240:183a-17: phyogs gzhan dag na ma mthong ngo //
K10D0239_H0240:183a-18: yon tan mang po kun ldan zhing //
K10D0239_H0240:183a-19: byang chub lam la rab brtson pas //
K10D0239_H0240:183a-20: ji ltar byis pa'i 'khor dag la //
K10D0239_H0240:183a-21: sangs rgyas 'khor lo bskor ba mdzad //
K10D0239_H0240:183a-22: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10D0239_H0240:183a-26: khyod kyi sngon 'das pa'i dus na'ang chu klung gangg'a'i
K10D0239_H0240:183a-27: bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas dag gi zhing na
K10D0239_H0240:183a-29: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chu klung gangg'a'i bye ma
K10D0239_H0240:183a-30: snyed la sngon 'di lta bu'i don dag zhu ba
K10D0239_H0240:183a-31: zhus so // khyod kyis dres pa'i don 'di dag
K10D0239_H0240:183a-32: la sngon yang nan tan shin tu byas pas shin
K10D0239_H0240:183a-33: tu rtogs shing khong du chud do //
K10D0239_H0240:183b-0: spyod pa mang po @183b phun sum tshogs pa pha
K10D0239_H0240:183b-1: rol tu phyin pas shin tu thabs mkhas pa'i shes
K10D0239_H0240:183b-2: rab dang ldan te sems can thams cad yongs su
K10D0239_H0240:183b-5: bde ba'i don 'thob par bya ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:183b-6: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad
K10D0239_H0240:183b-7: thabs mkhas pas 'phags pa'i spyod pa'i gter sbyin pa
K10D0239_H0240:183b-8: la sogs pa pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis
K10D0239_H0240:183b-9: sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i
K10D0239_H0240:183b-11: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi yon tan rgya mtsho yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:183b-12: rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i rgyal po
K10D0239_H0240:183b-13: spyod pa mi dge ba la gnas pa thams cad
K10D0239_H0240:183b-14: ngan song gsum las bzlog cing mi ltung bar bya
K10D0239_H0240:183b-15: ba dang / zhing 'dir dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung
K10D0239_H0240:183b-16: shin tu rgyas shing yun ring du gnas par bya
K10D0239_H0240:183b-17: ba'i phyir 'di lta bu'i don dris pa legs so
K10D0239_H0240:183b-18: ba dang / // shin tu legs par nyon la yid la zungs shig dang /
K10D0239_H0240:183b-21: de ltar bgyi'o zhes gsol nas /
K10D0239_H0240:183b-22: bcom ldan 'das la slar nyan to //
K10D0239_H0240:183b-23: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa'
K10D0239_H0240:183b-24: sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po la 'di skad
K10D0239_H0240:183b-27: de bzhin gshegs pa ni sngon gyi smon lam gyi
K10D0239_H0240:183b-28: shugs kyis sangs rgyas kyi 'khor lo rnam pa bcu
K10D0239_H0240:184a-0: sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnyog pa lnga can gyi sems can @184a *//
K10D0239_H0240:184a-1: thams cad rnam par dkar ba'i chos thams cad las phyir ldog pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:184a-2: 'phags pa'i nor rin po che bdun gyis bral ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:184a-3: mkhas pa dag dang ring du gyur pa chad pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:184a-4: rtag pa'i dra bas kun nas glags pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:184a-5: ngan song du 'gro ba'i shing rta la spro zhing dga' ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:184a-6: skye ba phyi ma'i sdug bsngal la 'jigs par mi
K10D0239_H0240:184a-7: lta ba dang; ma rig pa'i mun nag thibs po
K10D0239_H0240:184a-8: la gnas pa la dad pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:184a-9: mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rdzogs par byed pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:184a-10: mtshams med pa lnga byed pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:184a-11: dam pa'i chos la skur cing 'phags pa la dbang zab /
K10D0239_H0240:184a-12: dge ba'i chos thams cad ring du spong zhing mi
K10D0239_H0240:184a-13: dge ba'i chos rdzogs par byed pa'i gnas na bzhugs
K10D0239_H0240:184a-14: so // de lta bu'i sdug bsngal rnam pa sna
K10D0239_H0240:184a-15: tshogs dang ldan pa'i zhing na bzhugs kyang rab tu
K10D0239_H0240:184a-17: bag tsha ba med pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:184a-18: 'jigs skrag pa med pas drang srong chen po'i gnas
K10D0239_H0240:184a-19: su phyin te sangs rgyas kyi 'khor lo bskor nas
K10D0239_H0240:184a-20: lha dang / bdud du bcas pa'i mu stegs can log par smra ba thams cad btul nas /
K10D0239_H0240:184a-21: so so'i skye bo thams cad kyi rigs la nyon
K10D0239_H0240:184a-22: mongs pa shin tu sra ba rdo rje lta bu
K10D0239_H0240:184a-23: dag bsal nas ci la mos pa bzhin du so
K10D0239_H0240:184a-24: sor bkod do // mthu dang ldan pa'i sems can
K10D0239_H0240:184a-25: dag ni theg pa gsum las phyir mi ldog par
K10D0239_H0240:184a-26: sor bkod do // yang mdzad do // rigs kyi bu /
K10D0239_H0240:184b-1: yul kha cig tu srid med par 'gyur ba na
K10D0239_H0240:184b-2: de na gnas pa'i mi thams cad bdag gi dmag
K10D0239_H0240:184b-3: dang / gzhan gyi dmag gis yongs su gtses shing nyon mongs pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:184b-5: de na gnas pa'i mi mang po'ang mi bde bas 'thab pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:184b-7: gcig la gcig smod pa tshad med pa snyed 'byung ste /
K10D0239_H0240:184b-9: g-yo sgyu dang; tshig rtsub par smra ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:184b-12: ling tog can du 'gyur ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:184b-13: nad rnam pa sna tshogs kyis gzir ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:184b-14: grang ba dang; tsha ba'i nad ma rungs pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:184b-15: ri mus rnam pa mang po dang /
K10D0239_H0240:184b-20: dbang po ma tshang zhing yan lag dang /
K10D0239_H0240:184b-24: 'tsho ba'i yo byad rnam pa sna tshogs kyis phongs shing brel te /
K10D0239_H0240:184b-25: bdog pa thams cad yid du mi 'ong ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:184b-26: skye bo thams cad mu stegs can dang /
K10D0239_H0240:184b-27: 'jig rten gyi lha la skyabs su song zhing lta ba ngan pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:184b-29: mos pa ngan pa yongs su rgyas te /
K10D0239_H0240:184b-30: yang dag pa'i lam stor nas ngan song du ltung bar 'gyur ba na /
K10D0239_H0240:184b-31: de'i tshe yul de na gnas pa'i rgan po blo dang ldan zhing yid gzhungs pa /
K10D0239_H0240:184b-33: drang dag na che ba dag 'dus nas gros su bgros te /
K10D0239_H0240:185a-0: @185a *// grong mi kun bsdus nas thams cad kyis mthun par
K10D0239_H0240:185a-1: rgyal bu gcig btus pa ni sngon sbyin pa rab
K10D0239_H0240:185a-2: tu byas pa / tshul khrims shin tu bsrungs pa /
K10D0239_H0240:185a-4: shin tu dka' ba'i spyod pa dang ldan pa /
K10D0239_H0240:185a-5: mchog tu gyur pa'i bsod nams kyi mtshan dang ldan pa /
K10D0239_H0240:185a-6: dbang po yongs su rdzogs shing yan lag ma nyams pa /
K10D0239_H0240:185a-7: lus byad che chung ran pa /
K10D0239_H0240:185a-9: dpe byad bzang pos brgyan pa /
K10D0239_H0240:185a-10: phul du gyur pa'i mdog dam pa dang ldan pa /
K10D0239_H0240:185a-11: thams cad kyis bkur sti dang /
K10D0239_H0240:185a-13: yul de na gnas pa'i mi thams cad kyi yid du 'ong zhing lta 'dod pa /
K10D0239_H0240:185a-14: rang bzhin gyis drang zhing brtan pa /
K10D0239_H0240:185a-18: rtsal thams cad dang ldan pa /
K10D0239_H0240:185a-19: ngang des pa'i bzod pas sems rab tu brgyan pa /
K10D0239_H0240:185a-20: btsun mo dam pa'i sras thu bor gyur pa /
K10D0239_H0240:185a-21: spos dam pa rnam pa sna tshogs rnam par dag pa'i chus lus bkrus nas /
K10D0239_H0240:185a-22: rin po ches brgyan pa'i gos dam pa spos kyis bdugs pa rnam pa sna tshogs gyon zhing /
K10D0239_H0240:185a-23: nor bu rin po che spyi bo'i gtsug phud la btags pa /
K10D0239_H0240:185a-24: rin po che'i me tog gi phreng bas brgyan pa'i gser gyi cod pan mgo la thogs pa /
K10D0239_H0240:185a-25: rab tu yang la 'jam pa'i dar gyis bcings pa /
K10D0239_H0240:185a-26: gzhan yang nor bu rin po che dang /
K10D0239_H0240:185b-0: dngul la sogs pa rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs las byas @185b pa'i rna cha dang /
K10D0239_H0240:185b-3: gdu bu la sogs pa thogs pa /
K10D0239_H0240:185b-4: rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs las byas pa'i lham gyis rkang pa bteg pa /
K10D0239_H0240:185b-5: rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs las byas pa'i gdugs kyis steng gi bla bres bres pa /
K10D0239_H0240:185b-7: drang srong thams cad kyis bsrung zhing 'dzin pa'i khri bshams pa /
K10D0239_H0240:185b-8: brgya byin la sogs pa thams cad kyis srung zhing
K10D0239_H0240:185b-9: skyob pa; bzo shin tu mkhas pas las su byas
K10D0239_H0240:185b-10: pa'i gzhal med khang chen por sngon rgyal po snga
K10D0239_H0240:185b-11: ma 'dug 'dug pa'i khri la bzhag nas rgyal por
K10D0239_H0240:185b-12: bcug go / rgyal sar zhugs nas lha'i dbang po dang /
K10D0239_H0240:185b-14: gnod sbyin gyi dbang po dang /
K10D0239_H0240:185b-15: lha ma yin gyi dbang po dang /
K10D0239_H0240:185b-16: grul bum gyi dbang pos srung zhing 'dzin pa'i dril bu dang /
K10D0239_H0240:185b-17: rnga chen po brdungs nas de'i sgras yul khams kun tu grags par gyur te /
K10D0239_H0240:185b-18: rgyal rigs la sogs pa rigs chen po bzhi la
K10D0239_H0240:185b-19: gtogs pa'i mi tshad med pa snyed lus yang dag
K10D0239_H0240:185b-20: par bkrus nas gos gtsang ma gyon te /
K10D0239_H0240:185b-21: lag na rnam pa sna tshogs kyi rin po che'i gdugs dang /
K10D0239_H0240:185b-24: nor bu rin po che dang /
K10D0239_H0240:185b-31: beed'urya la sogs pa tshad med pa snyed thogs te rgyal po de la phul lo //
K10D0239_H0240:186a-0: thos pa dang ldan zhing shes pa che ba'i 'am ze thams cad @186a *//
K10D0239_H0240:186a-1: kyis kyang tshigs su bcad pas bstod pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:186a-3: dbyangs dam pa tshad med pa snyed kyis rgyal po de la bstod pa byas so //
K10D0239_H0240:186a-4: legs par 'gyur pa rnam pa sna tshogs thob par gyur cig ces smon lam yang btab bo //
K10D0239_H0240:186a-5: bkra shis pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis rgyal po'i spyi bor gtor to //
K10D0239_H0240:186a-6: rgyal po snga ma'i blon po'i rigs la gtogs pa thos pa dang ldan zhing shes pa che ba /
K10D0239_H0240:186a-9: mdzangs pa dag kyang ci rigs su blon por rim par phye ste bcug nas /
K10D0239_H0240:186a-10: rgyal po'i las byed pas sngon yul de na bdag
K10D0239_H0240:186a-11: dang; gzhan gyi dmag thams cad kyis gtse bar 'gyur
K10D0239_H0240:186a-12: ba dang / phyir rgol ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:186a-13: grogs po ngan pa thams cad med par byas nas phas rgol ba'i dgra dang /
K10D0239_H0240:186a-14: gnod pa byed pa thams cad zhi bar gyur nas /
K10D0239_H0240:186a-15: nag po'i phyogs thams cad byang zhing rnam par dkar
K10D0239_H0240:186a-16: ba'i phyogs thams cad skyes te 'phel bar gyur to
K10D0239_H0240:186a-18: rgyal rigs rgyal thabs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i
K10D0239_H0240:186a-19: rgyal po chen po de lta bu'i 'khor lo gcig
K10D0239_H0240:186a-20: dang ldan na / 'khor lo de'i dbang gis bdag
K10D0239_H0240:186a-21: gi rgyal srid rab tu che zhing phas rgol ba'i
K10D0239_H0240:186a-22: dgra thams cad shin tu thul ba las tshe'ang ring
K10D0239_H0240:186a-23: dang ldan na / bar 'gyur ro // rigs kyi bu /
K10D0239_H0240:186a-24: de bzhin du rnyog pa lnga'i 'jig rten gyi khams
K10D0239_H0240:186a-25: mi mjed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir sangs rgyas
K10D0239_H0240:186b-1: de na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad rang gi
K10D0239_H0240:186b-2: sems kyi bag la nyal ba'i nyon mongs pas yongs
K10D0239_H0240:186b-3: su bcings nas nang gi dgra dang /
K10D0239_H0240:186b-4: pha rol gyi dgras rnam par gtses te /
K10D0239_H0240:186b-5: kun nas nyon mongs pas nyon mongs nas gti mug gis ldongs te /
K10D0239_H0240:186b-6: mi bde bar gyur pas rtag pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:186b-7: chad pa la rnam par zhen cing chags pa tshad
K10D0239_H0240:186b-8: med pa bskyed nas phan tshun rtsod cing 'gal bar
K10D0239_H0240:186b-9: byed de / gcig la gcig dbang za zhing smod pas 'dod chags dang /
K10D0239_H0240:186b-13: sgyu'i tshul du smra zhing mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rdzogs par byed pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:186b-14: rnam par zhen cing chags pa'i skye bo dag nyon
K10D0239_H0240:186b-15: mongs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir rnam pa sna
K10D0239_H0240:186b-16: tshogs kyi nyon mongs pa'i nad kyis gzir ba dang
K10D0239_H0240:186b-17: ldan pas yang dag pa'i chos kyi mig ldongs te
K10D0239_H0240:186b-19: khong khro bas gdungs shing 'khrugs kyang yang dag pa
K10D0239_H0240:186b-20: bden pa'i chos cung zad kyang yid la mi byed
K10D0239_H0240:186b-21: de / yang dag pa'i chos kyi ro yongs su
K10D0239_H0240:186b-22: gtang nas dge ba byed pa la dbang za zhing
K10D0239_H0240:186b-23: de / smod de // de sngar bde zhing skyid pas ni bral cing phongs par 'gyur gyi /
K10D0239_H0240:186b-24: rtag tu nyon mongs pa'i dra ba rnam pa mang
K10D0239_H0240:186b-25: pos dkris shing glags nas mu stegs can gyi ston
K10D0239_H0240:186b-26: pa rnam pa drug po la skyabs su song ste
K10D0239_H0240:186b-27: / 'phags pa'i lam las phyir log cing ngan song gsum las gzhol bar 'gyur to //
K10D0239_H0240:187a-0: de'i tshe zhing de na byang chub sems dpa' sems @187a *//
K10D0239_H0240:187a-1: dpa' chen po sngon sangs rgyas tshad med pa snyed la mchod cing pa snyen bkur byas pa /
K10D0239_H0240:187a-2: sangs rgyas kyi yon tan gyi rgya mtshor zhugs pa /
K10D0239_H0240:187a-3: snga ma 'das pa'i sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul la
K10D0239_H0240:187a-4: gnas pa thams cad 'dus shing tshogs nas nga'i spyan
K10D0239_H0240:187a-5: sngar lhags te tshig mthun par 'di skad zer ro
K10D0239_H0240:187a-6: // khyod sngon 'das pa'i dus na sbyin pa tshad med pa la nan tan byas pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:187a-7: tshul khrims rab tu bsrungs pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:187a-8: shin tu 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus kyis shin tu spyad dka' ba spyad de /
K10D0239_H0240:187a-9: thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bsgoms so //
K10D0239_H0240:187a-10: de lta bu'i bsod nams dang /
K10D0239_H0240:187a-14: snying rje chen po la sogs pas yongs su brgyan pas yon tan chen po'i gter du gyur pa /
K10D0239_H0240:187a-16: gzungs rnams las rab tu bzod pa /
K10D0239_H0240:187a-17: sa'i yon tan thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i rgya mtshor gyur pa'o //
K10D0239_H0240:187a-19: sgyu med cing lus byad shin tu ring la mtshan dang /
K10D0239_H0240:187a-20: dpe byad phun sum tshogs par gyur pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:187a-21: des pa'i bzod pa dang ldan zhing shin tu mdzes par gyur pa /
K10D0239_H0240:187a-22: gzhan gyi dring la mi 'brang bas byang chub kyi
K10D0239_H0240:187a-23: lam bsgom par ye shes kyi rgya mtsho thams cad
K10D0239_H0240:187a-24: yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa /
K10D0239_H0240:187a-25: phul du gyur ba'i mdog mchog dam pa dang ldan par gyur pa /
K10D0239_H0240:187b-0: rang @187b sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ston pa chen por gyur pa /
K10D0239_H0240:187b-1: 'khor bas 'jigs skrag pa'i sems can thams cad kyi dpung gnyen du gyur pa /
K10D0239_H0240:187b-3: snying rje chen po la sogs pa yon tan tshad med pas yongs su brgyan pa /
K10D0239_H0240:187b-4: bcom ldan 'das log par dad sel dang /
K10D0239_H0240:187b-6: 'od srung la sogs pa'i sras yang dag pa /
K10D0239_H0240:187b-7: bskal pa bzang po 'dir mngon par 'tshang rgya ba /
K10D0239_H0240:187b-8: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi nang na gtso bor gyur pa /
K10D0239_H0240:187b-9: yon tan rnam pa sna tshogs kyi spos can /
K10D0239_H0240:187b-11: lhag mthong gi chu yongs su dag pas khrus byas pa /
K10D0239_H0240:187b-14: rnam par dag pa'i chos kyi dbyings gtsug gi nor bur thogs pa /
K10D0239_H0240:187b-15: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spyod yul rgya chen po'i me tog gi phreng ba'i cod pan thogs pa /
K10D0239_H0240:187b-16: rnam par grol ba'i srad bus cings pa /
K10D0239_H0240:187b-18: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang /
K10D0239_H0240:187b-19: mi skye ba'i bzod pa la sogs pa'i yon tan gyi rin po che yongs su brgyan pa /
K10D0239_H0240:187b-23: btang snyoms kyi lham rin po che gyon pa /
K10D0239_H0240:187b-24: khams gsum yongs su khebs pa'i spyod pa rnam gsum
K10D0239_H0240:187b-25: gyis 'phags pa'i rgyu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba'i
K10D0239_H0240:188a-0: drang srong gis yongs su bzung ba'i rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyi gdan ba shams @188a *//
K10D0239_H0240:188a-2: rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bkur sti dang bcas
K10D0239_H0240:188a-3: te yongs su bzung ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag
K10D0239_H0240:188a-5: sngon gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gting ba'i gdan
K10D0239_H0240:188a-6: la bzhugs nas bla na med pa'i byang chub tu
K10D0239_H0240:188a-8: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes su gyur pa dkon
K10D0239_H0240:188a-9: mchog gsum gyi gdung mi gcad pa'i phyir chos kyi
K10D0239_H0240:188a-11: chos kyi rnga rab tu brdungs nas khams gsum kun tu chos kyi sgra bsgrags te /
K10D0239_H0240:188a-14: gnod sbyin dang; srin po dang /
K10D0239_H0240:188a-25: mi ma yin pa la sogs pa thams cad la 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhis grol bar byas so //
K10D0239_H0240:188a-26: yan lag bcu gnyis dang ldan pa'i chos kyi 'khor
K10D0239_H0240:188a-27: lo gang 'jig rten du bcas pa dge sbyong dang;
K10D0239_H0240:188a-32: mi ma yin pa la sogs pa gang gis kyang ma bskor ba de /
K10D0239_H0240:188a-33: 'jig rten du bcas pa lha dang /
K10D0239_H0240:188a-34: mi tshad med pa dag la phan pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:188a-35: bde ba'i don chen po mchog dam pa thob par
K10D0239_H0240:188a-36: bya ba'i phyir sngon gang gis kyang ma bskor ba
K10D0239_H0240:188a-37: de rnam pa gsum du rab tu bskor to //
K10D0239_H0240:188b-0: nga de lta bu'i sangs @188b rgyas kyi 'khor lo
K10D0239_H0240:188b-1: gcig pa de dang ldan te 'khor lo de'i dbang
K10D0239_H0240:188b-2: gis yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'jig
K10D0239_H0240:188b-3: rten 'di dang / 'jig rten phyi ma dang /
K10D0239_H0240:188b-5: gnas ma yin pa mngon sum du mkhyen pas 'jigs pa med pa thob ste /
K10D0239_H0240:188b-6: bde bar gnas shing lha dang /
K10D0239_H0240:188b-7: bdud du bcas pa'i mu stegs can log par smra
K10D0239_H0240:188b-8: ba thams cad shin tu btul nas tshangs pa chen
K10D0239_H0240:188b-10: tshangs pa chen po'i spyod pa shin tu grub pas
K10D0239_H0240:188b-11: nga ni rnyog pa lnga'i sdig pa can gyi 'jig
K10D0239_H0240:188b-12: rten gyi khams 'dir 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du seng
K10D0239_H0240:188b-13: ge'i sgra yang dag par bsgrags te /
K10D0239_H0240:188b-14: sems can thams cad kyi mtshams med pa lnga'i las zhi bar byas so //
K10D0239_H0240:188b-15: de bzhin du mi dge ba'i rtsa bar gtogs pa
K10D0239_H0240:188b-16: thams cad bsal nas skye bo thams cad kyi nyon
K10D0239_H0240:188b-17: mongs pa'i rgyun rdo rje ltar sra ba dag kyang
K10D0239_H0240:188b-19: zag pa thams cad yongs su zad pa rnam par
K10D0239_H0240:188b-20: grol ba'i 'bras bu dam pa la rnam par bzhag
K10D0239_H0240:188b-21: nas ci dang / ci la mos pa bzhin du thams cad bde bar 'jog pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:188b-22: mthu dang ldan pa'i sems can dag ni theg pa
K10D0239_H0240:188b-23: gsum la bzhag ste phyir mi ldog par yang mdzad
K10D0239_H0240:188b-26: rgyal rigs rgyal thabs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i
K10D0239_H0240:188b-27: rgyal po chen po theg ma rgyal sar zhugs nas
K10D0239_H0240:188b-28: rgyal po'i srid bzung ma thag tu 'das pa dang
K10D0239_H0240:189a-0: da ltar gyi rgyal po thams cad kyis chos @189a *//
K10D0239_H0240:189a-1: dang; khrims la shin tu lta zhing rtog go /
K10D0239_H0240:189a-2: de ltar rgyal po kun gyi las kyi 'khor lo shin tu rtogs nas rgyu dang /
K10D0239_H0240:189a-5: cir ldan pa bzhin de dang /
K10D0239_H0240:189a-6: de lta bu'i thabs byin te las su bcug pas /
K10D0239_H0240:189a-7: yul de na gnas pa'i mdzangs ngan las las kyi 'khor lo rnam pa gsum byed du bcug go /
K10D0239_H0240:189a-8: las kyi 'khor lo de'i dbang gis de na gnas
K10D0239_H0240:189a-9: pa'i sems can thams cad yun ring po'i 'tsho ba'i
K10D0239_H0240:189a-10: yo byad yid du 'ong ba rnam pa sna tshogs
K10D0239_H0240:189a-12: bde skyid 'phel zhing skye ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:189a-13: phas rgol ba'i dgra thams cad kyang thul bar gyur to //
K10D0239_H0240:189a-14: las kyi 'khor lo rnam pa gsum gang zhe na /
K10D0239_H0240:189a-16: rgyal po srid kyi las kyi 'khor lo rnam par
K10D0239_H0240:189a-17: bzhag pas gang dgra thabs mkhas par bslabs shing rtsal
K10D0239_H0240:189a-18: sbyangs te phas rgol ba'i dgra 'dul zhing mi mang
K10D0239_H0240:189a-19: po srung bar byed pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:189a-21: gnas byed pa'i las kyi 'khor lo rnam par bzhag pas gang khang khyim brtsig pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:189a-22: zhing gi las lag byad kyis phyin par byed du 'jug cing bde bar byas pas bza' ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:189a-23: btung bas mi brel bar byed pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:189a-24: nor rin po che tshol pa'i las kyi 'khor lo rnam par bzhag pas gang tshong spogs dang /
K10D0239_H0240:189a-25: bzo rnam pa sna tshogs slob tu gzhug cing 'tsho
K10D0239_H0240:189a-26: ba'i yo byad rnam pa sna tshogs yid bzhin du
K10D0239_H0240:189b-0: spyad du @189b yod la bde zhing skyid pa 'phel
K10D0239_H0240:189b-1: bar byed pa'o // rigs kyi bu /
K10D0239_H0240:189b-2: rgyal rigs rgyal thabs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i
K10D0239_H0240:189b-3: rgyal po chen po rgyal pa'i 'khor lo gsum po
K10D0239_H0240:189b-4: 'di dang ldan na 'khor lo 'di'i dbang gis bdag
K10D0239_H0240:189b-5: gi yul rab tu bde zhing skyid pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:189b-7: grogs po ngan pa btul zhing lus srung ba'i nan
K10D0239_H0240:189b-8: tan la mkhas pas tshe 'ang ring bar 'gyur ro;
K10D0239_H0240:189b-9: ;rigs kyi bu / de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs
K10D0239_H0240:189b-10: pa'ang thog ma mngon par sangs rgyas kyi bla na
K10D0239_H0240:189b-11: med pa'i ye shes thob nas 'das pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:189b-13: da ltar gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi mig la shin tu rtog go /
K10D0239_H0240:189b-14: de ltar shin tu brtags pas las dang /
K10D0239_H0240:189b-17: 'dul bar 'gyur ba'i sems can thams cad la las
K10D0239_H0240:189b-18: kyi 'khor lo rnam pa gsum rnam par bzhag go
K10D0239_H0240:189b-19: / las kyi 'khor lo de'i dbang gis dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung dang /
K10D0239_H0240:189b-20: chos kyi mig yun ring du gnas pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:189b-21: bla na med pa yang dag pa'i chos rgya cher kun tu khyab pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:189b-22: skye bo thams cad rtag tu mtho ris kyi lhar
K10D0239_H0240:189b-23: skye ba nas mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar du
K10D0239_H0240:189b-24: shin tu bde ba thob pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:189b-25: mu stegs can log par smra ba thams cad kyis
K10D0239_H0240:189b-26: mi tshugs shing yang dag pa'i chos kyi mig gis
K10D0239_H0240:189b-27: phas rgol ba thams cad chos bzhin du thul bar
K10D0239_H0240:190a-0: las kyi 'khor lo rnam pa gsum gang @190a *//
K10D0239_H0240:190a-3: ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa'i las kyi 'khor lo rnam par gzhag pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:190a-4: kha ton goms par bya ba'i las kyi 'khor lo rnam par bzhag pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:190a-5: bsod nams bya ba'i las kyi 'khor lo rnam par bzhag pa dang gsum mo //
K10D0239_H0240:190a-7: de la ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting
K10D0239_H0240:190a-8: nge 'dzin bsgom pa'i las kyi 'khor lo gang zhe
K10D0239_H0240:190a-9: na / ting nge 'dzin rnam pa bcu ste /
K10D0239_H0240:190a-11: yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par
K10D0239_H0240:190a-12: shes pa dang bcas pa'i lus 'di la brtags na
K10D0239_H0240:190a-14: bdag gir zhen cing chags pa'i rgyu dang /
K10D0239_H0240:190a-16: ma rig pas bsgribs pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:190a-17: sred pa'i chus brlan pa'i dbang med par gzhan gyi
K10D0239_H0240:190a-18: dbang gis yod par gyur pas rkyen mang po la
K10D0239_H0240:190a-21: sdug bsngal gyi rgyun rnam pa gsum po dgag pa'i phyir de ltar brtag go /
K10D0239_H0240:190a-22: las kyi rgyun gang zhe na /
K10D0239_H0240:190a-23: gang sems can rnams ji snyed kyi 'du byed mngon du spyod pa de ma rig pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:190a-24: sred pa'i rgyu las srid pa skye bas nyon mongs pa'i rgyun ces bya'o //
K10D0239_H0240:190a-25: nyon mongs pa'i dbang gis rnam par shes pa'i rgyu dang /
K10D0239_H0240:190a-26: rkyen mang po 'dus pa las ming dang /
K10D0239_H0240:190a-30: rkyen mang po 'dus pa las skye mched drug skye'o //
K10D0239_H0240:190a-31: skye mched drug gi rgyu dang /
K10D0239_H0240:190b-0: rkyen mang po 'dus @190b pa las reg pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:190b-2: srid pa phyi ma'i skye ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:190b-4: 'chi ba la sog pa rim kyis 'byung ba na sdug bsngal gyi rgyun ces bya'o //
K10D0239_H0240:190b-5: da ltar rgyun gsum po 'di ni las kyi zhing la ma rig pa'i rgyu dang /
K10D0239_H0240:190b-6: sred pa'i rlan gyis skye bar gyur to //
K10D0239_H0240:190b-7: 'di ltar las kyi zhing lam rig pa'i rgyu dang /
K10D0239_H0240:190b-8: sred pa'i rlan gyis rgyun rnam pa gsum po brkam
K10D0239_H0240:190b-9: pa'i phyir nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la
K10D0239_H0240:190b-16: smig rgyu ba lta bu dang /
K10D0239_H0240:190b-17: chu'i zla ba lta bu dang /
K10D0239_H0240:190b-18: rmi lam lta bu stong pa ci'ang med pa /
K10D0239_H0240:190b-28: skye ba'i gnas med par rtogs so; ;de ltar nye
K10D0239_H0240:190b-29: bar len pa'i phung po lnga la shin tu brtags
K10D0239_H0240:190b-30: pas stong pa nyid dang rjes su mthun pa'i bzod
K10D0239_H0240:190b-31: pa dang / mtshan ma med pa'i rjes su mthun pa'i bzod pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:190b-32: smon pa med pa'i rjes su mthun pa'i bzod pa la phyogs so //
K10D0239_H0240:190b-33: yang nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la rjes su brtag par bya ba'i phyir /
K10D0239_H0240:190b-35: thabs mkhas pas dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba la rtog ste nang du rgyu ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:190b-36: phyir rgyu ba'i dran pa goms par byed do //
K10D0239_H0240:190b-37: de la ji ltar na dran pa'i dbang gis yang
K10D0239_H0240:190b-38: dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du dbugs phyi nang
K10D0239_H0240:190b-39: du rgyu ba la rtog ce na /
K10D0239_H0240:191a-1: ba bzhin du bgrang ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:191a-6: yongs su dag pa la rtog go /
K10D0239_H0240:191a-7: de la bgrang bas ni las kyi dngos po rnam pa gnyis byed par 'gyur te /
K10D0239_H0240:191a-8: rten du gyur pas rnam par rtog pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:191a-9: rnam par dpyod pa rnams thul ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:191a-10: dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba'i mtshan nyid 'dzin par nus pa'o //
K10D0239_H0240:191a-11: rjes su 'brang bas kyang las kyi dngos po rnam pa gnyis byed par 'gyur te /
K10D0239_H0240:191a-12: yang dag par 'byung ba la rten cing rnam par rtog pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:191a-13: rnam par dpyod pa dang bral ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:191a-14: dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba'i 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid la mkhas par gyur pa'o //
K10D0239_H0240:191a-15: zhi gnas kyis kyang las kyi dngos po rnam pa gnyis byed par 'gyur te /
K10D0239_H0240:191a-16: dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba bri bar mngon du ston pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:191a-17: ting nge 'dzin gyi mchog la gnas par nus pa'o //
K10D0239_H0240:191a-18: lhag mthong gis kyang las kyi dngos po rnam pa gnyis byed par 'gyur te /
K10D0239_H0240:191a-19: dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba zad par mngon du ston pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:191a-21: sems las byung ba'i chos so sor rtogs pa la gnas pa'o //
K10D0239_H0240:191a-22: 'jug pas kyang las kyi dngos po rnam pa gnyis byed par 'gyur te /
K10D0239_H0240:191a-23: nye bar len pa'i phung po spong ba'i sbyor ba la mkhas pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:191a-24: 'phags pa'i sar 'jug pa la sbyor ba'o //
K10D0239_H0240:191b-0: yongs su dag pas kyang bya ba'i @191b las kyi dngos po gnyis byed par 'gyur te /
K10D0239_H0240:191b-1: kun nas nyon mongs pa spong ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:191b-2: lta ba yongs su dag pa'o //
K10D0239_H0240:191b-3: de ltar sbyor ba rnam pa drug gis dbugs phyi
K10D0239_H0240:191b-4: nang du rgyu ba la rtog pa bsgoms pas nye
K10D0239_H0240:191b-5: bar len pa'i phung po lnga rtogs pa dang rjes
K10D0239_H0240:191b-8: ji ltar dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba'i rang bzhin ni gzugs nye bar len pa'i phung po'o //
K10D0239_H0240:191b-9: dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba len cing myong bar
K10D0239_H0240:191b-10: byed pa ni tshor ba nye bar len pa'i phung
K10D0239_H0240:191b-11: po'o // dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba'i mtshan nyid
K10D0239_H0240:191b-12: len pa ni 'du shes nye bar len pa'i phung
K10D0239_H0240:191b-13: po'o; ;dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba mngon du byed
K10D0239_H0240:191b-14: pa ni 'du byed nye bar len pa'i phung po'o
K10D0239_H0240:191b-15: po'o // // dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba bye
K10D0239_H0240:191b-16: brag tu 'byed pa ni rnam par shes pa nye
K10D0239_H0240:191b-17: bar len pa'i phung po ste /
K10D0239_H0240:191b-18: de ltar nye bar len pa'i phung po rnam lnga bshad pa ni so so ba /
K10D0239_H0240:191b-24: spungs pa med pa ma yin pa /
K10D0239_H0240:191b-26: de ltar nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga shin
K10D0239_H0240:191b-27: tu rtogs pas 'du byed rnam pa gsum yongs su
K10D0239_H0240:191b-29: gal te de lta 'du byed rnam pa gsum yongs
K10D0239_H0240:191b-30: su zad par rjes su brtags pa'i mthar phyin na
K10D0239_H0240:191b-31: rnam par shes pa dang bcas pa'i lus dang /
K10D0239_H0240:191b-32: yul drug rjes su rtogs pa'i mthar phyin par 'gyur ro //
K10D0239_H0240:192a-6: kun nas 'gebs pa'i rlon pa'ang thams cad zad par 'gyur ro //
K10D0239_H0240:192a-7: de bzhin du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi
K10D0239_H0240:192a-8: bsgom pa'ang yongs su rdzogs pa nas 'phags pa'i lam
K10D0239_H0240:192a-9: yan lag brgyad pa'i bar du'ang bsgom pa yongs su
K10D0239_H0240:192a-11: de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
K10D0239_H0240:192a-12: bco brgyad kyi bar du'ang bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs
K10D0239_H0240:192a-13: par 'gyur ro // de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang /
K10D0239_H0240:192a-14: mi skye ba'i chos kyi bzod pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:192a-15: dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin la sogs pa'i
K10D0239_H0240:192a-16: bar du bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro
K10D0239_H0240:192a-18: 'ong ba rjes su dran pas gzung bar bsam gtan
K10D0239_H0240:192a-19: dag la zhugs pa ni yang dag pa'i chos don
K10D0239_H0240:192a-20: dam pa la gnas pa'i sems can zhes bya'o //
K10D0239_H0240:192a-21: bsam gtan yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du sgom pa zhes bya'o //
K10D0239_H0240:192a-22: dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la yang dag par mchod pa zhes bya'o //
K10D0239_H0240:192a-23: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thugs las byung ba'i sras /
K10D0239_H0240:192a-24: thams cad kyi gsung las skyes pa; chos kyi grub pas chos kyi btul ba zhes bya'o //
K10D0239_H0240:192a-25: byang chub sems dpa' la las de ltar bsgoms pa
K10D0239_H0240:192a-26: las bags kyis phyir nur na'ang zag pa zad pa'i
K10D0239_H0240:192b-0: dgra bcom par @192b gyur pa nas mngon par shes
K10D0239_H0240:192b-1: pa drug dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
K10D0239_H0240:192b-2: byang chub sems dpa' la la de ltar bsgoms pas
K10D0239_H0240:192b-3: gong nas gong du 'phar ba ni yon tan thams
K10D0239_H0240:192b-5: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen por gyur pa
K10D0239_H0240:192b-6: nas sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad
K10D0239_H0240:192b-7: dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi bar du yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te /
K10D0239_H0240:192b-8: ring po mi thogs par bla na med pa'i byang
K10D0239_H0240:192b-9: chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur
K10D0239_H0240:192b-11: ngas rnam pa de snyed kyi las dang /
K10D0239_H0240:192b-16: rnam par smin pa la ye shes kyis dus gsum
K10D0239_H0240:192b-17: gyi sangs rgyas kyi chos la brtags na sems can
K10D0239_H0240:192b-18: dag ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa'i las kyi 'khor lo
K10D0239_H0240:192b-19: bcu rnam par bzhag la sgom du 'dzud do //
K10D0239_H0240:192b-21: de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin sgom pa'i las kyi 'khor lo zhes bya'o //
K10D0239_H0240:192b-23: de la ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa'i kha ton goms pa'i las kyi 'khor lo zhe na /
K10D0239_H0240:192b-29: rigs kyi bu mo dge ba'i rtsa ba chung zhing srab pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:192b-30: kun rdzob kyi bden pa la gnas pa dbang po
K10D0239_H0240:192b-31: yongs su ma smin pa dag la ngas kha ton
K10D0239_H0240:192b-32: goms par bya ba la btsud de /
K10D0239_H0240:193a-1: le le med par shin tu brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:193a-2: sems can gang bla na med pa'i ye shes tshol
K10D0239_H0240:193a-3: ba dag ni ngas rnam par dkar pa'i theg pa
K10D0239_H0240:193a-6: pha rol po gzhan klog tu 'jug pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:193a-8: pha rol po gzhan 'don du 'jug pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:193a-10: pha rol po gzhan 'chad du 'jug pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:193a-11: theg pa chen po la bdag goms par bya ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:193a-12: pha rol po gzhan goms par byed du 'jug pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:193a-14: gzhan gyi kun nas nyon mongs pa bsal ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:193a-15: bla na med pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob par bya ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:193a-16: sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal zhi bar bya ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:193a-17: 'jigs pa med pa'i grong khyer chen por zhugs pa'i phyir rtsol lo //
K10D0239_H0240:193a-18: sems can gang rang sangs rgyas kyi thag pa 'dod
K10D0239_H0240:193a-19: pa dag ni ngas rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i
K10D0239_H0240:193a-20: chos la btsud nas kha ton goms par byed du
K10D0239_H0240:193a-21: bcug go / sems can gang nyan thos kyi theg
K10D0239_H0240:193a-22: pa 'dod pa dag la ni ngas gzhung tshigs su
K10D0239_H0240:193a-23: bcad pa stong phrag brgya pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:193a-24: 'dul ba tshigs su bcad pa stong phrag brgya pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:193a-26: mngon par smra ba tshigs su bcad pa stong phrag
K10D0239_H0240:193a-27: brgya pa la sogs pa kha ton goms par byed
K10D0239_H0240:193b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa'i kha ton goms par bya ba'i las kyi 'khor lo zhes bya'o //
K10D0239_H0240:193b-3: de la ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i las kyi 'khor lo zhe na /
K10D0239_H0240:193b-5: sems can gang dbang po rtul pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:193b-6: dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa /
K10D0239_H0240:193b-9: dran pa nyams pa 'tsho ba'i yo byad rnam ba kun la zhen cing chags pa /
K10D0239_H0240:193b-10: dge ba'i bshes gnyen yongs su spong ba dag ni ngas bsod nams bya ba'i las la btsud do //
K10D0239_H0240:193b-14: dge 'dun la bya ba byed pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:193b-16: slob dpon la bya ba byed pa ste /
K10D0239_H0240:193b-18: de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsod nams sgrub pa'i las kyi 'khor lo zhes bya'o //
K10D0239_H0240:193b-20: de ltar nga ni sangs rgyas kyi 'khor lo gnyis pa 'di dang ldan te /
K10D0239_H0240:193b-21: 'khor lo de'i dbang gis bla na med pa'i dus
K10D0239_H0240:193b-22: gsum gyi las kyi ye shes kyis yang dag pa
K10D0239_H0240:193b-23: ji lta ba bzhin du sems can thams cad kyi
K10D0239_H0240:193b-27: 'bras bu yongs su smin pa mkhyen te /
K10D0239_H0240:193b-28: cis 'dul ba bzhin du las kyi 'khor lo rnam
K10D0239_H0240:193b-29: pa gsum rnam par bzhag nas snod du gyur pa'i
K10D0239_H0240:193b-30: sems can thams cad la phan pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:193b-32: 'jigs pa med pa la bde bar bkod do //
K10D0239_H0240:194a-1: du bcas pa'i mu stegs can log par smra ba
K10D0239_H0240:194a-2: thams cad btul nas tshangs pa chen po'i 'khor lo
K10D0239_H0240:194a-3: bskor zhing / tshangs pa chen po'i spyad pa yongs
K10D0239_H0240:194a-4: su grub pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin
K10D0239_H0240:194a-5: du sems can gyi rgyu dang /
K10D0239_H0240:194a-6: 'bras bu kun mngon par mkhyen to //
K10D0239_H0240:194a-9: rgyal rigs rgyal thabs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i
K10D0239_H0240:194a-10: rgyal po chen po ni thabs mkhas pa'i blo dang
K10D0239_H0240:194a-15: dmangs rigs la sogs pa yon tan rnam pa sna tshogs dang /
K10D0239_H0240:194a-20: sems can gang phyug cing yon tan dang ldan pa /
K10D0239_H0240:194a-21: thabs mkhas pa'i blo dang ldan pa /
K10D0239_H0240:194a-23: brtan pa phyir mi ldog pa /
K10D0239_H0240:194a-24: bsod nams rnam pa sna tshogs kyis yongs su brgyan
K10D0239_H0240:194a-25: pa de dag la rgyal rigs rgyal thabs spyi bo
K10D0239_H0240:194a-26: nas dbang bskur ba'i rgyal po chen pos de dag
K10D0239_H0240:194a-27: ci dang ldan pa bzhin ci 'os ci rigs su
K10D0239_H0240:194a-33: las byed pa'i mi la sogs pa ci rigs su sbyin par byed do //
K10D0239_H0240:194a-34: yul de na gnas pa'i mi yon tan dang /
K10D0239_H0240:194a-36: las byas pa chung pa dag la ni rgyal thabs
K10D0239_H0240:194b-0: spyi bo nas dbang bskur @194b ba'i rgyal po chen
K10D0239_H0240:194b-1: pos de dag la'ang ci 'os ci rigs su shas
K10D0239_H0240:194b-3: yul de na gnas pa bsod nams med cing brtson 'grus chung ba /
K10D0239_H0240:194b-6: dran pa nyams pa; snying rje'i sems med pa /
K10D0239_H0240:194b-8: 'jig rten phyi ma'i sdug bsngal la 'jigs par mi lta ba /
K10D0239_H0240:194b-10: sdig pa mang po byed pa de dag la ni
K10D0239_H0240:194b-11: rgyal po chen pos ci rigs ci 'os su chad
K10D0239_H0240:194b-12: pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis gcod de /
K10D0239_H0240:194b-13: kha cig la ni tshig na bas spyos zhing brgyad pa dag byed do //
K10D0239_H0240:194b-14: kha cig la ni rin po che dang /
K10D0239_H0240:194b-15: nor rdzas la sogs pa 'phrog go /
K10D0239_H0240:194b-16: kha cig la ni 'tsho ba'i yo byad dag kyang 'phrog go /
K10D0239_H0240:194b-17: kha cig la ni lcag gis gzhu ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:194b-19: kha cig la ni yan lag dang /
K10D0239_H0240:194b-21: kha cig la ni mgo dang /
K10D0239_H0240:194b-23: de dag la sogs pa chad pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis chad pa gcod do //
K10D0239_H0240:194b-25: de ltar rgyal rigs rgyal thabs spyi bo nas dbang
K10D0239_H0240:194b-26: bskur ba'i rgyal po chen po rgyal po'i 'khor lo
K10D0239_H0240:194b-28: 'khor lo de'i dbang gis bdag gi yul rab tu
K10D0239_H0240:194b-29: bde zhing skyid pas phas rgol ba'i dgra thams cad
K10D0239_H0240:194b-30: dang / grogs po ngan pa btul cing lus srung
K10D0239_H0240:194b-31: ba'i nan tan mkhas pas tshe'ang ring par 'gyur ro
K10D0239_H0240:194b-33: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'ang dbang po la
K10D0239_H0240:194b-34: shin tu mkhas pa'i ye shes dang ldan pas 'khor
K10D0239_H0240:195a-3: shes rab las ring du gyur pa /
K10D0239_H0240:195a-6: zhi ba yongs su spangs te dran pa nyams nas
K10D0239_H0240:195a-7: sems 'khrugs par gyur pa dag nga gang na ba
K10D0239_H0240:195a-8: der 'ongs te / nga la skyabs su 'ongs nas de dag gi dbang po dang /
K10D0239_H0240:195a-11: mos pa shin tu mkhyen pas ci dang /
K10D0239_H0240:195a-12: cis 'dul ba bzhin du chad pas gcad pa'i thabs 'dul ba la sogs pa'i chos ston to //
K10D0239_H0240:195a-13: sems can gang nga rgyal gyi dbang du gyur te /
K10D0239_H0240:195a-14: bslab pa mang po gzungs su mi 'dzin pa dag
K10D0239_H0240:195a-15: la ni ngas bstan pa dam pa'i chos yun ring
K10D0239_H0240:195a-16: du gnas par bya ba'i phyir dngos po 'di dag
K10D0239_H0240:195a-18: la lar ni dran par bya ba'i dam bca' bas chad pas gcod do //
K10D0239_H0240:195a-19: la lar ni tshig na bas bsdigs pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:195a-22: la lar ni skad cig dgar zhing smra dbab pas gcod do //
K10D0239_H0240:195a-23: la lar ni phyag 'tshal ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:195a-25: rnyed pa lhan cig tu mi spyod pas gcod do //
K10D0239_H0240:195a-26: la lar ni rtsa dgram pa lta bu dang /
K10D0239_H0240:195a-27: la lar ni bskrad pa la sogs pa'i chad pas gcad pa ste /
K10D0239_H0240:195a-28: de ltar gang zag de dag gi dbang po dang /
K10D0239_H0240:195a-31: mos pa kun mkhyen pas ci rigs ci 'os su chad pas gcad do //
K10D0239_H0240:195b-0: de'ang don med pa'i mun pa'i tshogs bsags @195b pa gzhom pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:195b-1: nyon mongs pa'i chu bo bskam pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:195b-2: mtho ris kyi lhar skye ba nas mya ngan las
K10D0239_H0240:195b-3: 'da' ba'i bde ba thob pa'i phyir mi dge ba
K10D0239_H0240:195b-4: spyod pa'i gang zag 'dul ba'i phyir ci dang /
K10D0239_H0240:195b-5: ci rigs su chad pas gcad pa'i chos bstan to //
K10D0239_H0240:195b-6: mdo sde mang po las kyang mi dge ba spyod pa chad pas gcad pa'i chos ci dang /
K10D0239_H0240:195b-8: de'i chos rgya cher bshad do //
K10D0239_H0240:195b-9: ngas mchog dam pa'i ye shes kyis sems can gang lhag pa'i bsam pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:195b-11: mos pa yongs su dag pa dang ldan pa'ang shin tu mkhyen pas ci dang /
K10D0239_H0240:195b-12: cis 'dul ba bzhin du dge ba'i phyogs kyi khyad par rnam pa sna tshogs bstan te /
K10D0239_H0240:195b-13: bslab cing goms su bcug pa nas dge ba'i rtsa
K10D0239_H0240:195b-14: ba thams cad kyi bar du yongs su rdzogs shing
K10D0239_H0240:195b-15: 'jigs pa med pa'i grong khyer chen por btsud do
K10D0239_H0240:195b-17: nga ni de ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'khor lo
K10D0239_H0240:195b-18: gsum po 'di dang ldan te 'khor lo 'di'i dbang
K10D0239_H0240:195b-19: gis sems can thams cad kyi dbang po rnam pa
K10D0239_H0240:195b-20: sna tshogs dang / dad pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:195b-25: myong ba'i chos kun mkhyen pas ci dang cis 'dul ba bzhin du phan pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:195b-26: bde pa'i don gyis 'jigs pa med pa la bde bar bkod do //
K10D0239_H0240:195b-27: 'jigs pa med pas nga ni drang srong chen po'i
K10D0239_H0240:195b-28: gnas su dam bca' zhing sangs rgyas kyi 'khor lo
K10D0239_H0240:196a-2: bdud du bcas pa'i mu stegs can log par smra
K10D0239_H0240:196a-3: ba thams cad btul te 'khor mang po'i dkyil 'khor
K10D0239_H0240:196a-4: du seng ge'i sgra bsgrags so //
K10D0239_H0240:196a-7: rgyal rigs rgyal thabs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i
K10D0239_H0240:196a-8: rgyal po chen po ni bdag gi yul na gang
K10D0239_H0240:196a-9: zag ji snyed cig 'jig rten gyi lha dang /
K10D0239_H0240:196a-10: mu stegs can rnam pa sna tshogs la skyabs su song zhing log pa la dad pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:196a-12: log pa la slong ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:196a-13: log pa'i brtul zhugs la mngon par zhen te /
K10D0239_H0240:196a-14: log pa'i ltas bzang ngan la chags nas don med
K10D0239_H0240:196a-15: pa'i sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs kyis sdug bsngal
K10D0239_H0240:196a-16: bar gyur pa dag rgyal po chen po des shes
K10D0239_H0240:196a-18: yang bsdus te rgyal po snga ma'i dam pa'i chos
K10D0239_H0240:196a-19: lugs kyis rgyas par bstan nas log par lta ba
K10D0239_H0240:196a-20: dang / log par dad pa spong la /
K10D0239_H0240:196a-21: rgyal po snga ma'i chos lugs bslab pa la nan tan du spyod cig par bkas btags te /
K10D0239_H0240:196a-22: yul de na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad 'jug pa gcig /
K10D0239_H0240:196a-25: 'dod pa gcig par thams cad mthun par rgyal po
K10D0239_H0240:196a-26: snga ma'i dam pa'i chos bzhin du gnas pa dang
K10D0239_H0240:196a-27: / bka' bzhin du nyan cing rjes su spyod pas
K10D0239_H0240:196a-28: de na gnas pa thams cad mthun par gang bya
K10D0239_H0240:196a-29: bar rigs pa rnams byed do //
K10D0239_H0240:196b-0: rgyal @196b rigs rgyal thabs spyi bo nas dbang bskur
K10D0239_H0240:196b-1: ba'i rgyal po chen po'ang rtag tu blon po rnams
K10D0239_H0240:196b-2: dang 'dus nas ston mo byed cing longs spyod de
K10D0239_H0240:196b-3: / dga' bas rol cing gshegs pas gros mthun pas rgyal po'i las byed do //
K10D0239_H0240:196b-5: rgyal rigs rgyal thabs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i
K10D0239_H0240:196b-6: rgyal po chen po de ltar rgyal po'i 'khor lo
K10D0239_H0240:196b-8: 'khor lo de'i dbang gis bdag gi yul rab tu bde zhing skyid pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:196b-9: phas rgol ba'i dgra thams cad dang /
K10D0239_H0240:196b-10: grogs po ngan pa btul zhing lus srung ba'i nan tan la mkhas pas tshe'ang ring bar 'gyur ro //
K10D0239_H0240:196b-12: de ltar de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'ang shin
K10D0239_H0240:196b-13: tu thabs mkhas pa'i mos pa mkhyen pa'i ye shes
K10D0239_H0240:196b-14: dang ldan pas 'jig rten na log pa la phyogs
K10D0239_H0240:196b-15: pa rnam pa sna tshogs dang /
K10D0239_H0240:196b-18: log pa'i chos la mos pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:196b-19: log pa'i las spyod pa de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis
K10D0239_H0240:196b-20: sdug bsngal tshad med pa myong bar de bzhin gshegs
K10D0239_H0240:196b-21: pas mkhyen cing gzigs nas rtag tu yang dang /
K10D0239_H0240:196b-22: yang 'khor mang po bsdus te snga ma 'das pa'i
K10D0239_H0240:196b-23: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi dkon mchog gsum gyi
K10D0239_H0240:196b-26: pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang /
K10D0239_H0240:196b-28: sdom pa gsum la sogs pa'i rgyu dang /
K10D0239_H0240:197a-1: par phye ste mngon par bstan nas 'khor mang po rnams rnam par grol bar byed do //
K10D0239_H0240:197a-2: phyin ci log tu lta ba rnams yang dag pa'i lta ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:197a-3: dge ba bcu'i yang dag pa'i las kyi lam la rnam par 'jug go /
K10D0239_H0240:197a-4: sems can rnams ni rtag tu mthun par chos la 'jug /
K10D0239_H0240:197a-5: chos la spyod par thabs kyis drang zhing sgom du 'dzud pas rgyu dang /
K10D0239_H0240:197a-6: 'bras bu rgyun mi 'chad par byed do //
K10D0239_H0240:197a-7: sems can rnams 'khor rnam bzhi dang mthun par dge
K10D0239_H0240:197a-8: pa spyod pa'i khyad par la nan tan byed du
K10D0239_H0240:197a-9: bcug nas dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang
K10D0239_H0240:197a-11: rnam par grol ba'i ye shes ston pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:197a-12: lam gyi yan lag la spro bzhin du rtse'o //
K10D0239_H0240:197a-13: 'phags pa'i bstan pa yun du gnas par bya ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:197a-14: dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung rgyun mi 'chad par bya ba'i phyir yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /
K10D0239_H0240:197a-15: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /
K10D0239_H0240:197a-18: byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /
K10D0239_H0240:197a-19: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:197a-20: de ma yin pa ting nge 'dzin dang /
K10D0239_H0240:197a-21: rnam par grol ba'i ye shes ston pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:197a-22: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi khyad par rnam pa sna tshogs la ci dgar rtser bcug go /
K10D0239_H0240:197a-24: nga ni de ltar sangs rgyas kyi 'khor lo bzhi pa 'di dang ldan te /
K10D0239_H0240:197a-25: 'khor lo de'i dbang gis so so'i skye bo ci dang /
K10D0239_H0240:197b-1: ci la dga' ba kun mkhyen pas ci dang /
K10D0239_H0240:197b-2: cis 'dul ba bzhin du phan pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:197b-3: bde ba'i don gyis 'jigs pa med pa la bde bar bkod do //
K10D0239_H0240:197b-4: 'jigs pa med pas nga ni drang srong chen po'i
K10D0239_H0240:197b-5: gnas su bzhugs te sangs rgyas kyi 'khor lo bskor
K10D0239_H0240:197b-6: nas lha dang / bdud du bcas pa'i mu stegs
K10D0239_H0240:197b-7: can log par smra ba thams cad btul te 'khor
K10D0239_H0240:197b-8: mang po'i nang du seng ge'i sgra bsgrags so zhes
K10D0239_H0240:197b-9: nas lha dang / gsungs so // rigs kyi bu /
K10D0239_H0240:197b-11: rgyal rigs rgyal thabs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i
K10D0239_H0240:197b-12: rgyal po chen po bdag gi yul na gnas pa'am
K10D0239_H0240:197b-13: / pha rol gzhan gyi yul na gnas pa'i sems
K10D0239_H0240:197b-14: can tshad med pa snyed pa dag gi nor dang
K10D0239_H0240:197b-15: / / gzugs la chags shing skyo mi shes pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:197b-16: pha rol po gzhan gyi nor dang /
K10D0239_H0240:197b-17: gzugs la chags shing 'dod pas de bsrung ba'i phyir grong dang /
K10D0239_H0240:197b-20: rgyal po'i pho brang yang mkhar dang /
K10D0239_H0240:197b-21: ra bas bskor ba nas bya shal dang /
K10D0239_H0240:197b-22: ne tso'i bar du srung du 'dzud de stor cing gong bar mi byed do //
K10D0239_H0240:197b-24: rgyal rigs rgyal thabs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i
K10D0239_H0240:197b-25: rgyal po chen po 'di ltar rgyal po'i 'khor lo
K10D0239_H0240:197b-27: 'khor lo de'i dbang gis bdag gi yul rab tu bde zhing skyid pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:197b-28: phas rgol [?] ba'i dgra thams cad dang /
K10D0239_H0240:197b-29: grogs po ngan pa btul cing lus srung ba'i nan tan la mkhas pas tshe'ang ring bar 'gyur ro //
K10D0239_H0240:198a-1: bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'ang rang bzhin la shin
K10D0239_H0240:198a-2: tu thabs mkhas pas mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang ldan
K10D0239_H0240:198a-3: pas bdud sdig can ma rungs pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:198a-4: mu stegs can dgu bcu rtsa lnga po dang /
K10D0239_H0240:198a-5: de ma yin pa gzhan yang bdud kyi ris dang /
K10D0239_H0240:198a-6: mu stegs can tshad med pa snyed kyis bslus pa kun mkhyen te /
K10D0239_H0240:198a-7: sems can gang bdag gi nor dang /
K10D0239_H0240:198a-8: gzugs la mngon par chags pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:198a-9: pha rol po gzhan gyi nor dang /
K10D0239_H0240:198a-10: gzugs la'ang chags shing 'dod pas tshol lo //
K10D0239_H0240:198a-12: nga'i 'khor rnams la phrag dog bskyed de; nga bsad
K10D0239_H0240:198a-13: pa'i phyir bsod snyoms kyi nang du dug bcug pa
K10D0239_H0240:198a-14: dang / me dong gi steng du gdan bting ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:198a-16: bal glang smyos pa rbad pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:198a-17: ral gri phyung ste snyegs pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:198a-20: mi tshangs par spyod do zhes skur ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:198a-21: ma ning yin no zhes btags pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:198a-22: mi ma yin pa'o zhes brjod pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:198a-23: sgyu ma'o zhes tshig ngan pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis kyang nga la smod cing skur to //
K10D0239_H0240:198a-24: nga'i nyan thos kyi slob ma la'ang phrag dog bskyed de /
K10D0239_H0240:198a-25: de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis skur cing smod pa rnam pa mang po byed par mkhyen nas /
K10D0239_H0240:198a-26: de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po drug bsrung ba la mkhas pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:198a-27: tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi la gnas pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:198b-0: so so yang dag par @198b rig pa bzhi dang ldan par gyur pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:198b-1: nyan thos rnams la'ang chos kyi mdo rnam par thar
K10D0239_H0240:198b-2: pa'i sgo gsum yongs su dag pa rnam par bzhag
K10D0239_H0240:198b-3: pa bstan to // ngas da ltar 'jig rten dang /
K10D0239_H0240:198b-4: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rang bzhin kun yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du mkhyen to //
K10D0239_H0240:198b-5: de ltar sems can gyi rang bzhin tha dad pa rnam pa sna tshogs kun mkhyen nas /
K10D0239_H0240:198b-7: cis 'dul ba bzhin du phan pa dang bde ba'i don mdzad do //
K10D0239_H0240:198b-9: ngas de ltar sangs rgyas kyi 'khor lo lnga pa 'di dang ldan te /
K10D0239_H0240:198b-10: 'khor lo de'i dbang gis 'jig rten pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:198b-11: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rang bzhin mkhyen pa'i ye
K10D0239_H0240:198b-12: shes kyis sems can gyi rang bzhin tshad med pa
K10D0239_H0240:198b-13: rnam pa sna tshogs kun so sor mkhyen pas ci
K10D0239_H0240:198b-14: dang / cis 'dul ba bzhin du phan pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:198b-15: bde ba'i don gyis 'jigs pa med pa la bde bar bkod do //
K10D0239_H0240:198b-16: 'jigs pa med pas nga ni drang srong chen po'i
K10D0239_H0240:198b-17: gnas su bzhugs shing sangs rgyas kyi 'khor lo bskor
K10D0239_H0240:198b-18: nas lha dang / bdud du bcas pa'i mu stegs
K10D0239_H0240:198b-19: can log par smra ba thams cad btul te 'khor
K10D0239_H0240:198b-20: mang po'i dkyil 'khor du seng ge'i sgra rab tu
K10D0239_H0240:198b-21: nas lha dang / sgrogs so // rigs kyi bu /
K10D0239_H0240:198b-23: rgyal rigs rgyal thabs spyi bo nas dbang bskur pa'i rgyal po chen po ji ltar grong khyer dang /
K10D0239_H0240:198b-26: rgyal po'i pho brang brtan par bsrung ba'i phyir 'obs
K10D0239_H0240:198b-27: kyis bskor ba nas gzhung de bzhin du rgyas par
K10D0239_H0240:199a-1: ne tso'i bar du srung ma btsud do //
K10D0239_H0240:199a-4: bu mor bcas pas yongs su bskor cing 'dod pa
K10D0239_H0240:199a-5: lnga la rtse zhing longs spyod rnam pa sna tshogs
K10D0239_H0240:199a-6: la bag med par dbang po drug nyams rangs su
K10D0239_H0240:199a-8: rgyal rigs rgyal thabs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i
K10D0239_H0240:199a-9: rgyal po chen po de de ltar rgyal po'i 'khor
K10D0239_H0240:199a-10: lo drug pa 'di dang ldan te /
K10D0239_H0240:199a-11: 'khor lo de'i dbang gis bdag gi yul rab tu bde zhing skyid pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:199a-13: grogs po ngan pa thams cad btul te lus srung
K10D0239_H0240:199a-14: ba'i nan tan la mkhas pas tshe'ang ring bar 'gyur
K10D0239_H0240:199a-16: de ltar de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'ang byang
K10D0239_H0240:199a-17: chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang; nyan
K10D0239_H0240:199a-18: thos chen po rnams kyang thams cad 'phags pas bstan
K10D0239_H0240:199a-19: pa'i grong khyer brtan par btsud nas /
K10D0239_H0240:199a-20: de'i 'og tu bsam gtan mchog dam pa la snyoms
K10D0239_H0240:199a-21: par 'jug pa nas bsam gtan bzhi'i bar du snyoms
K10D0239_H0240:199a-23: nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug pa nas /
K10D0239_H0240:199a-24: de bzhin du rgyas par 'du shes med 'du shes
K10D0239_H0240:199a-25: med min gyi skye mched kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi
K10D0239_H0240:199a-26: bar du snyoms par 'jug pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:199a-27: de bzhin du sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spyod yul
K10D0239_H0240:199b-0: gyi ting nge 'dzin gyi bar du @199b snyoms par
K10D0239_H0240:199b-2: ting nge 'dzin de dag tu zhugs nas lha dang /
K10D0239_H0240:199b-13: lus srul po la sogs pa sems can la gnod cing 'tshe ba /
K10D0239_H0240:199b-16: 'jig rten phyi ma'i sdug bsngal gyis mi 'jigs pa
K10D0239_H0240:199b-17: tshad med pa bye ba brgya stong snyed ngas sangs
K10D0239_H0240:199b-18: rgyas thams cad kyi spyod yul gyi ting nge 'dzin
K10D0239_H0240:199b-20: thams cad la shin tu dga' ba'i sems bskyed de /
K10D0239_H0240:199b-21: bsam pa yongs su dag pas dkon mchog gsum la mchog dam pa'i dga' ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:199b-22: dad pa bskyed nas bsti stang dang bcas /
K10D0239_H0240:199b-23: bkur sti dang bcas te ngo mtshar rmad du gyur
K10D0239_H0240:199b-24: nas nyes pa thams cad so sor bshags te yongs
K10D0239_H0240:199b-26: de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis skad cig yud tsam gyis
K10D0239_H0240:199b-27: tshad med dpag tu med pa'i nyon mongs pa'i sgrib
K10D0239_H0240:199b-28: pa dang / las kyi sgrib pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:199b-29: chos kyi sgrib pa kun byang bar 'gyur te /
K10D0239_H0240:199b-30: tshad med dpag tu med pa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs dang /
K10D0239_H0240:199b-31: ye shes kyi tshogs kun yongs su rdzogs par gyur nas /
K10D0239_H0240:199b-32: 'khor ba la rgyab kyis bltas shing mya ngan las 'da' ba la phyogs nas /
K10D0239_H0240:199b-33: de bzhin gshegs pa bla na med pa yang dag pa'i chos srung zhing 'dzin to //
K10D0239_H0240:200a-2: nga'ang de ltar sangs rgyas kyi 'khor lo drug pa 'di dang ldan te /
K10D0239_H0240:200a-3: 'khor lo de'i dbang gis de bzhin gshegs pa bsam gtan dang /
K10D0239_H0240:200a-4: ting nge 'dzin dang; rnam par grol ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:200a-6: mnyam par gzhag pa tshad med pa brgya stong snyed
K10D0239_H0240:200a-7: la rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyis 'jug cing
K10D0239_H0240:200a-8: / sems can gyi nyon mongs pa tshad med pa snyed bsal nas ci dang /
K10D0239_H0240:200a-9: cis 'dul ba bzhin du phan pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:200a-10: bde ba'i don gyis 'jigs pa med pa la bde bar 'god do //
K10D0239_H0240:200a-11: 'jigs pa med pas nga ni drang srong chen po'i
K10D0239_H0240:200a-12: gnas su dam bca' zhing sangs rgyas kyi 'khor lo
K10D0239_H0240:200a-14: bdud du bcas pa'i mu stegs can log par smra
K10D0239_H0240:200a-15: ba thams cad btul te 'khor mang po'i dkyil 'khor
K10D0239_H0240:200a-16: du seng ge'i sgra bsgrags so zhes gsung ngo //
K10D0239_H0240:200a-19: rgyal rigs rgyal thabs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i rgyal po chen po ni blon po dang /
K10D0239_H0240:200a-20: dmag rnam bzhi dang bcas te bdag gi ris su dbang pa'i grong khyer dang /
K10D0239_H0240:200b-0: nags tshal la sogs par kun tu byung zhing brtags @200b nas yul de phyogs kyi 'jigs pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:200b-1: the tshom du bcas pa'i gnas sam /
K10D0239_H0240:200b-2: g-yang zab bsdur mi rung ba'i gnas sam /
K10D0239_H0240:200b-3: pha rol gyi dgra 'khras shing 'tshe ba'i gnas rnams
K10D0239_H0240:200b-4: su rgyal rigs rgyal thabs spyi bo nas dbang bskur
K10D0239_H0240:200b-5: ba'i rgyal po chen pos rang gi nyams kyis dpags
K10D0239_H0240:200b-6: shing rnam pa thams cad du sbyangs te /
K10D0239_H0240:200b-7: bde bar 'jog pa la sbyor ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:200b-8: legs par bsrung zhing brtan par byas pas gnas pa'i
K10D0239_H0240:200b-9: phyogs de dag mnyam pa las byar rung ba phas
K10D0239_H0240:200b-10: kyi dgra dang / grogs po ngan pa glags lta zhing 'khras pa'i gnas med par byas te /
K10D0239_H0240:200b-12: bag tsha ba bsal ba'i phyir yul de na gnas
K10D0239_H0240:200b-13: pa'i sems can thams cad mi bde ba'i sdug bsngal
K10D0239_H0240:200b-14: dang bral zhing rab tu bde zhing skyid par skyabs
K10D0239_H0240:200b-16: de ltar rgyal rigs rgyal thabs spyi bo nas dbang
K10D0239_H0240:200b-17: bskur ba'i rgyal po chen po rgyal po'i 'khor lo
K10D0239_H0240:200b-18: bdun pa de dang ldan te /
K10D0239_H0240:200b-19: 'khor lo de'i dbang gis bdag gi yul rab tu bde zhing skyid pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:200b-21: grogs po ngan pa thams cad btul zhing lus bsrung
K10D0239_H0240:200b-22: ba'i nan tan la mkhas pas tshe'ang ring bar 'gyur
K10D0239_H0240:200b-24: de ltar de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'ang sangs
K10D0239_H0240:200b-25: rgyas kyi spyan gyis yang dag pa ji lta ba
K10D0239_H0240:200b-26: bzhin du sems can thams cad kyi 'dod chags dang
K10D0239_H0240:200b-28: gti mug gi bsam pa gang dang ldan pa rab tu mkhyen to //
K10D0239_H0240:201a-0: yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin @201a *//
K10D0239_H0240:201a-1: du nyon mongs pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyi nang mi mthun pa'ang rab tu mkhyen to //
K10D0239_H0240:201a-2: de bzhin gshegs pas de ltar mkhyen pas shin tu 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus tshad med pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:201a-3: thabs mkhas pa'i shugs kyis ci dang cis 'dul ba
K10D0239_H0240:201a-4: bzhin du ting nge 'dzin rnam pa sna tshogs sgrub
K10D0239_H0240:201a-5: pa'i sman dam pa byin pas sems can dag nyon
K10D0239_H0240:201a-6: mongs pa'i nad bal ba la nan tan dang brtson
K10D0239_H0240:201a-8: sems can gang mi gtsang ba la rtog pa'i nyon mongs pa'i nad zhi bar 'os pa zhig na /
K10D0239_H0240:201a-9: de la mi gtsang ba la rtog pa'i sman sgom du bcug go /
K10D0239_H0240:201a-10: sems can gang tshangs pa'i gnas la nan tan byas
K10D0239_H0240:201a-11: pas nyon mongs pa'i nad zhi bar 'os pa zhig
K10D0239_H0240:201a-12: na tshangs pa'i gnas kyi sman sgom du bcug go
K10D0239_H0240:201a-13: / sems can gang rten cing 'brel te 'byung ba
K10D0239_H0240:201a-14: bsgoms pas nyon mongs pa'i nad sel bar 'os pa
K10D0239_H0240:201a-15: / zhig na / de la rten cing 'brel te 'byung ba'i sman sgom du bcug go /
K10D0239_H0240:201a-16: sems can gang dbugs bgrang ba yid la byas pas nad zhi bar 'os pa zhig na /
K10D0239_H0240:201a-17: de la dbugs bgrang pa yid la bya ba'i sman sgom du bcug go /
K10D0239_H0240:201a-18: sems can gang rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum bsgoms
K10D0239_H0240:201a-19: pas nyon mongs pa'i nad zhi bar 'os pa zhig
K10D0239_H0240:201a-20: na / de la rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum gyi sman sgom du bcug go /
K10D0239_H0240:201b-0: sems can gang bsam @201b gtan bsgoms pas nyon mongs pa'i nad zhi bar 'os pa zhig na /
K10D0239_H0240:201b-1: de la bsam gtan gyi sman sgom du bcug go /
K10D0239_H0240:201b-2: sems can gang gzugs med pa'i bsam gtan bsgoms pas
K10D0239_H0240:201b-3: nyon mongs pa'i nad zhi bar 'os pa zhig na
K10D0239_H0240:201b-4: / de la gzugs med pa'i bsam gtan sgom du bcug go /
K10D0239_H0240:201b-5: sems can gang dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin
K10D0239_H0240:201b-6: gyi bar bsgoms pas nyon mongs pa'i nad zhi bar
K10D0239_H0240:201b-8: de la dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sman sgom du bcug go /
K10D0239_H0240:201b-9: de bas na de bzhin gshegs pas sems can dag
K10D0239_H0240:201b-10: la de lta bu'i chos kyi sman gyis sbyin pa
K10D0239_H0240:201b-11: mdzad do // snod du gyur pa'i sems can thams
K10D0239_H0240:201b-12: cad bdud rnam bzhi'i dbang du 'gyur bar mi mdzad
K10D0239_H0240:201b-13: mdzad do // do // snod du gyur pa'i sems can thams cad lha dang /
K10D0239_H0240:201b-14: mi'i theg pa la rgyab kyis phyogs shing ngan song du gzhol bar mi mdzad do //
K10D0239_H0240:201b-15: de bzhin gshegs pa bla na med pa'i chos kyi sman dang /
K10D0239_H0240:201b-16: dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung myur du med par 'gyur
K10D0239_H0240:201b-17: bar mi mdzad de; de ltar na de bzhin gshegs
K10D0239_H0240:201b-18: pas sems can rnams la de lta bu'i chos kyi
K10D0239_H0240:201b-19: sman gyi sbyin pa mdzad do //
K10D0239_H0240:201b-21: de bzhin gshegs pa de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi 'khor lo bdun pa dang ldan te /
K10D0239_H0240:201b-22: 'khor lo de'i dbang gis bla na med pa kun
K10D0239_H0240:201b-23: tu 'gro ba'i ye shes kyi spyod pas sems can
K10D0239_H0240:201b-24: thams cad la chos kyi sman rnam pa sna tshogs
K10D0239_H0240:202a-0: byin pa de sgom du btsud @202a *//
K10D0239_H0240:202a-1: na nyon mongs pa'i nad kun zhi zhing 'jigs pa med pa la bde bar gnas par 'gyur ro //
K10D0239_H0240:202a-2: 'jigs pa med pas nga ni drang srong chen po'i
K10D0239_H0240:202a-3: gnas su bzhugs te; sangs rgyas kyi 'khor lo bskor
K10D0239_H0240:202a-4: nas lha dang / bdud du bcas pa'i mu stegs can log par smra ba thams cad btul te /
K10D0239_H0240:202a-5: 'khor mang po'i dkyil 'khor du seng ge'i sgra sgrogs so //
K10D0239_H0240:202a-8: rgyal rigs rgyal thabs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i rgyal po chen po bdag dang /
K10D0239_H0240:202a-11: gzhon nu'i tshe rtse ba la sogs pa thams cad la dran pa mngon par bzhag ces sems so //
K10D0239_H0240:202a-13: gnas gang du thog ma btsas pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:202a-15: bang du blangs shing nu zho snun pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:202a-16: lus dang; yan lag gi tshogs mnyes pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:202a-17: dga' bzhin du rtse ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:202a-19: bye ma la rtse ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:202a-20: 'khor dang bcas te bag med pa rnam pa mang pos rtse ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:202a-22: de ma yin pa'i las rnam pa gzhan byed pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:202a-23: rgyal po gzhan gyi yul du rgyu zhing 'gro ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:202a-24: rgyal po'i bya ba sgrub pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:202a-25: rgyal po'i las byed pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:202a-26: rgyal tsha ba byed pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:202a-27: rgyal thabs thob nas dbang du gyur te bde ba'i longs spyod chen po myong ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:202a-28: grags pa chen pos phyogs kun tu grags pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:202a-29: dngos po de dag la sogs pa bsams te dran
K10D0239_H0240:202b-0: nas @202b rgyal po snga ma'i chos lugs yang dag
K10D0239_H0240:202b-1: pa rnam par gzhag nas de na gnas pa'i sems
K10D0239_H0240:202b-2: can thams cad la 'tshe skyong ste /
K10D0239_H0240:202b-3: bdag gi srid 'dzin cing pha rol mi 'tsho'o //
K10D0239_H0240:202b-5: rgyal rigs rgyal thabs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i
K10D0239_H0240:202b-6: rgyal po chen po de ltar rgyal po'i 'khor lo
K10D0239_H0240:202b-8: 'khor lo de'i dbang gis bdag gi yul rab tu bde zhing skyid pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:202b-10: grogs po ngan pa thams cad btul te lus bsrung
K10D0239_H0240:202b-11: ba'i nan tan la mkhas pas tshe'ang ring bar 'gyur
K10D0239_H0240:202b-13: de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa; yang 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor na bzhugs pa'i tshe bdag dang /
K10D0239_H0240:202b-14: pha rol po gzhan gyi sngon gyi skye ba tshad
K10D0239_H0240:202b-15: med pa snyed na ci byas pa'i dngos po kun
K10D0239_H0240:202b-19: skye ba gsum nas skye ba tshad med pa brgya
K10D0239_H0240:202b-20: stong gi bar gyi ci byas pa'i dngos po kun
K10D0239_H0240:202b-21: dgongs so // de bzhin du bskal pa 'grub pa dgongs pa nas bskal pa 'jig pa'ang dgongs so //
K10D0239_H0240:202b-22: bskal pa chad med pa 'grub pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:202b-23: bskal pa tshad med pa 'jig pa'i bar du thams cad dgongs te /
K10D0239_H0240:202b-24: 'di ni sngon 'das pa'i dus na che ge mo
K10D0239_H0240:202b-25: zhig na 'dug 'dug ste rigs ni 'di zhes bya'o
K10D0239_H0240:202b-30: sdug bsngal yang 'di dag myong ngo //
K10D0239_H0240:203a-2: tshe'i mthar thug pa na che ge mo zhig tu tshe 'phos nas 'di dag tu skyes so //
K10D0239_H0240:203a-3: 'di dag tu tshe 'phos nas che ge mo zhig
K10D0239_H0240:203a-4: tu skyes pa la sogs pa dngos po tshad dpag
K10D0239_H0240:203a-5: tu med pa kun dgongs pas sems can gyi dbang
K10D0239_H0240:203a-6: po so so ji lta ba bzhin du dam pa'i
K10D0239_H0240:203a-7: chos ston te / phan pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:203a-10: nga de ltar de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi 'khor lo brgyad pa 'di dang ldan te /
K10D0239_H0240:203a-11: 'khor lo de'i dbang gis sems can tshad med pa la phan pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:203a-12: bde ba'i don gyis 'jigs pa med pa la bde par bkod do //
K10D0239_H0240:203a-13: 'jigs pa med pas nga ni drang srong chen po'i gnas su bzhugs te /
K10D0239_H0240:203a-14: sangs rgyas kyi 'khor lo bskor nas lha dang /
K10D0239_H0240:203a-15: bdud du bcas pa'i mu stegs can la sogs pa log par smra ba thams cad btul te /
K10D0239_H0240:203a-16: 'khor mang po'i dkyil 'khor du seng ge'i sgra sgrogs so //
K10D0239_H0240:203a-19: rgyal rigs rgyal thabs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i
K10D0239_H0240:203a-20: rgyal po chen po ni bsams pa bzhin du bdag
K10D0239_H0240:203a-21: gi ris na gnas pa'i sems can gyi rigs dang
K10D0239_H0240:203a-24: las kyi dngos po ci byed pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:203a-25: 'di nas tshe 'phos nas gang du skye ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:203a-27: 'bras bu bzang ngan gyi khyad par mi mthun pa kun shin tu rtog go /
K10D0239_H0240:203a-28: sems can gang su'i khyim du skyes na rtul phod cing dpa' ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:203b-0: bzo rtsal @203b bslabs na lobs pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:203b-8: mi mdzes pa la sogs pa kun shes pa nas tshe 'pho ba'i bar du kun shes te /
K10D0239_H0240:203b-9: gang su zhig las ma zad par 'chi ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:203b-10: gang ni las zad de 'chi ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:203b-11: gang ni rgyal po'i khrims 'gal nas bsad pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:203b-12: gang ni dgras bsad pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:203b-13: gang ni lcag gis gzhus pas 'chi ba dang /

K10D0239_H0240:203b-15: gang ni bzo rtsal sbyong ba'i phyir 'chi ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:203b-16: gang ni phas rgol ba'i dgra'i g-yul ngor 'chi ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:203b-17: gang ni rtsod cing 'thabs nas 'chi ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:203b-18: gang ni nor dbyig srung ba'i phyir 'chi ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:203b-19: gang ni 'dod chags kyi dbang gis 'chi ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:203b-20: gang ni khong khro zhing 'khon du 'dzin pa'i phyir 'chi ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:203b-21: gang ni ngal chad nas 'chi ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:203b-22: gang ni ltogs te 'chi ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:203b-23: gang ni nyes pa'i skyon dang bcas te 'chi ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:203b-24: gang ni skyon med par 'chi ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:203b-25: gang ni rgas 'khogs te 'chi ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:203b-26: gang ni dar la bab ste 'chi ba dang /

K10D0239_H0240:203b-28: gang ni dge ba'i las rnam pa mang po byas nas 'chi ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:203b-29: gang ni mi dge ba'i las rnam pa mang po
K10D0239_H0240:203b-30: byas te 'chi ba dag kyang rab tu shes so
K10D0239_H0240:203b-31: // sems can gang ni dge ba sbyad pa'i rgyus
K10D0239_H0240:203b-32: shi na'ang mtho ris su skye bar 'gyur ba'ang shes
K10D0239_H0240:204a-1: can gang ni mi dge ba sbyad pa'i rgyus tshe
K10D0239_H0240:204a-2: 'phos nas ngan song du skye bar 'gyur ba'ang rab
K10D0239_H0240:204a-3: tu shes so // de ltar dngos po de dag
K10D0239_H0240:204a-4: kun rab tu shes pas 'di snyam du bdag kyang
K10D0239_H0240:204a-5: brtson pa'i sbyor ba la lus dge ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:204a-7: yid dge ba la spyod pa la shin tu brtson par bya'o snyam du sems so //
K10D0239_H0240:204a-8: bdag gis thabs rnam pa sna tshogs kyis sbyin pa la goms par bya ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:204a-9: zhi zhing dul bar bya ste tshe 'phos nas gnas bzang por skye bar bya yi /
K10D0239_H0240:204a-10: ngan song du ltung bar mi bya'o snyam du sems so //
K10D0239_H0240:204a-11: de ltar rgyal rigs rgyal thabs spyi bo nas dbang
K10D0239_H0240:204a-12: bskur ba'i rgyal po chen po de lta bu'i dngos
K10D0239_H0240:204a-13: po bsams nas shin tu 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus kyis
K10D0239_H0240:204a-15: yid gsum gyis dge ba spyod pa las shin tu rtsol te /
K10D0239_H0240:204a-16: rtag tu sbyin pa spyod pa ni /
K10D0239_H0240:204a-29: de ma yin pa 'tsho ba'i yo byad thams cad dang /
K10D0239_H0240:204a-34: nor dbyig rnam pa sna tshogs dang /
K10D0239_H0240:204a-39: srog gi bar du phangs pa med par thams cad gtong ngo //
K10D0239_H0240:204b-0: srog gcod pa yongs su @204b spong ba nas ma byin par len pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:204b-1: 'dod pas log par g-yem pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:204b-3: ngag rtsub bor smra ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:204b-7: zhe sdang dang; log par lta ba'i bar du yongs su spong ngo //
