K10D0239_H0240:204b-9: bo nas dbang bskur ba'i rgyal po chen po yon
K10D0239_H0240:204b-10: tan gyi khyad par rnam pa bcu thob bo //
K10D0239_H0240:204b-13: grags pa chen po dang ldan pa yin /
K10D0239_H0240:204b-14: nor rin po che dang ldan pa yin /
K10D0239_H0240:204b-15: mtshan phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa yin /
K10D0239_H0240:204b-16: 'khor mang po dang ldan pa yin /
K10D0239_H0240:204b-17: mi bde ba dang; nad med pa yin /
K10D0239_H0240:204b-19: gnyen bshes kun shes rab rno zhing mang du thos pa yin /
K10D0239_H0240:204b-21: yang dag pa'i spyod pa can la sten cing mchod pa byed pa yin /
K10D0239_H0240:204b-22: phyogs bcu kun tu shin tu snyan pas rgya cher grags pa yin /
K10D0239_H0240:204b-23: gzi brjid chen po'i mthu dang ldan pa'i lhas rtag tu srung ba yin /
K10D0239_H0240:204b-24: tshe 'phos par gyur na'ang mtho ris kyi lhar skye
K10D0239_H0240:204b-25: zhing rtag tu gnas bzang por rab tu bde ba'i
K10D0239_H0240:204b-26: longs spyod dang ldan pa yin no //
K10D0239_H0240:204b-28: rgyal rigs rgyal thabs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i
K10D0239_H0240:204b-29: rgyal po chen po de ltar 'khor lo dgu pa
K10D0239_H0240:204b-31: 'khor lo de dang ldan pa'i dbang gis bdag gi yul rab tu bde zhing skyid pa dang /

K10D0239_H0240:205a-4: dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can thams
K10D0239_H0240:205a-6: 'chi 'pho ba'i dngos po kun mkhyen to //
K10D0239_H0240:205a-7: yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can
K10D0239_H0240:205a-8: gang ni lus mi dge ba spyod pa dang ldan

K10D0239_H0240:205a-10: sems can gang ni yid mi dge ba spyod pa

K10D0239_H0240:205a-17: sems can gang ni lus dge ba spyod pa dang ldan /
K10D0239_H0240:205a-18: gang ni ngag dge ba spyod pa dang ldan /
K10D0239_H0240:205a-19: gang ni yid dge ba spyod pa dang ldan zhing 'phags pa rnams la dbang mi za ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:205a-20: yang dag par lta ba dang ldan te /
K10D0239_H0240:205a-21: yang dag par lta ba'i rkyen gyis tshe 'phos nas mtho ris kyi lhar skye ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:205a-23: zag pa zad par 'gyur ba'ang rab tu mkhyen to //
K10D0239_H0240:205a-24: de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji
K10D0239_H0240:205a-25: lta ba bzhin du mkhyen pas sems can de dag
K10D0239_H0240:205a-27: snying rje chen po bskyed de /
K10D0239_H0240:205a-28: shin tu 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus kyis cho 'phrul rnam pa gsum mngon par bstan te /
K10D0239_H0240:205b-0: sems can de @205b dag sangs rgyas kyis bstan pa'i chos dang /
K10D0239_H0240:205b-3: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dad pa la bkod do //
K10D0239_H0240:205b-6: mngon par shes pa'i cho 'phrul dang /
K10D0239_H0240:205b-8: pha rol gyi sems shes pa'i cho 'phrul lo //
K10D0239_H0240:205b-9: cho 'phrul rnam pa de gsum gyis sems can de

K10D0239_H0240:205b-12: srid pa na 'khor ba'i sems can thams cad rnam par grol bar mdzad do //
K10D0239_H0240:205b-14: nga de ltar sangs rgyas kyi 'khor lo dgu pa 'di dag dang ldan te /
K10D0239_H0240:205b-15: 'khor lo de'i dbang gis sems can tshad med pa la phan pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:205b-16: bde ba'i don gyis 'jigs pa med pa la bde bar bkod do //

K10D0239_H0240:205b-18: sangs rgyas kyi 'khor lo bskor nas lha dang /
K10D0239_H0240:205b-19: bdud du bcas pa'i mu stegs can log par lta ba thams cad btul te /
K10D0239_H0240:205b-20: 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du seng ge'i sgra sgrogs so //
K10D0239_H0240:205b-23: rgyal rigs rgyal thabs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i
K10D0239_H0240:205b-24: rgyal po chen po ni gling bzhi pa'i sems can
K10D0239_H0240:205b-25: tshad med pa'i lus kyi nad rnam pa sna tshogs
K10D0239_H0240:205b-26: bsal pa'i phyir rgyal thabs btang nas spos chus lus
K10D0239_H0240:205b-27: bkrus nas gos gtsang ma sar ba gyon nas lus
K10D0239_H0240:206a-3: mnyam pa'i sems yid la byas te /
K10D0239_H0240:206a-4: nad thams cad las thar par bya ba'i phyir me tog dang /
K10D0239_H0240:206a-6: rol mo rnam pa sna tshogs dang /
K10D0239_H0240:206a-7: de ma yin pa'i mchod pa'i yo byad rnam pa
K10D0239_H0240:206a-8: sna tshogs mang pos mthu tshe ba gzi brjid dang
K10D0239_H0240:206a-9: ldan pa'i lha thams cad la mchod pa byed do
K10D0239_H0240:206a-10: // de'i tshe na lha'i dbang po dang /
K10D0239_H0240:206a-11: klu'i dbang po nas lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po'i
K10D0239_H0240:206a-12: bar du thams cad kyis de ltar shes nas gcig
K10D0239_H0240:206a-13: la gcig 'di skad ces zer ro //
K10D0239_H0240:206a-14: rgyal rigs rgyal thabs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i
K10D0239_H0240:206a-15: rgyal po chen po 'di yon tan dang ldan te
K10D0239_H0240:206a-16: / gzi brjid che bas na gling bzhi la dbang ba'i 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por 'os kyi /
K10D0239_H0240:206a-17: bdag cag gis der dong la gling bzhi la dbang ba'i rgyal por dbang bskur ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:206a-18: sems can rnams nad med cing bde bar bya ba'i phyir 'dong ngo zhes smras nas /
K10D0239_H0240:206a-19: lha'i dbang po nas lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po'i bar du thams cad lhags nas /
K10D0239_H0240:206a-20: rgyal rigs rgyal thabs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i
K10D0239_H0240:206a-21: rgyal po chen po de 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal
K10D0239_H0240:206a-23: rin po che sna bdun dang ldan pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:206a-24: gling bzhi la dbang byed pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:206a-25: bu stong dang ldan te thams cad dpa' brtul phod pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:206a-26: mdzes shing yid du 'ong ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:206b-0: phas rgol ba'i dgra thul ba @206b dang /
K10D0239_H0240:206b-1: dbang bar gyur pa'i sa chen po de ltar rgya
K10D0239_H0240:206b-2: mtsho'i mtha' nas pho brang du thug gi bar du
K10D0239_H0240:206b-3: mtshon cha mi spyod cing thams cad dam pa'i chos
K10D0239_H0240:206b-4: spyod de bde skyid par byas so //
K10D0239_H0240:206b-6: rgyal rigs rgyal thabs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i
K10D0239_H0240:206b-7: rgyal po chen po de ltar 'khor lo bcu pa
K10D0239_H0240:206b-9: 'khor lo de'i dbang gis gling chen po bzhi nas
K10D0239_H0240:206b-10: phyogs mtshams brgyad dang; gling phran brgyad khri bzhi stong
K10D0239_H0240:206b-11: dag na sems can ji snyed gnas pa de dag
K10D0239_H0240:206b-12: thams cad dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la gnas
K10D0239_H0240:206b-13: shing / bdag gi lus shin tu srung ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:206b-15: tshe 'phos nas kyang mtho ris kyi lhar skye zhing longs spyod dam pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
K10D0239_H0240:206b-17: de ltar de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'ang sngon byang chub sems dpa'i tshe na bdag dang /
K10D0239_H0240:206b-18: gzhan gyi lus la nyon mongs pa'i nad rnam pa
K10D0239_H0240:206b-19: tshad med pa snyed yod par mkhyen nas ting nge
K10D0239_H0240:206b-20: 'dzin gyi spos chus ni lus bkrus bden pa'i chos
K10D0239_H0240:206b-21: dang / byams pa chen po dang /
K10D0239_H0240:206b-22: snying rje chen po'i chus khrus byas pa khrel ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:206b-23: 'dzem pa'i gos gyon nas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis bsam gtan dang /
K10D0239_H0240:206b-29: thugs rjes rjes su bzung ste thams cad kyis gsung mthun par /
K10D0239_H0240:206b-31: skyes bu chen po 'di ni bsod nams dang /
K10D0239_H0240:207a-1: shes chen po'i tshogs kyis yongs su brgyan pa'i snod du gyur pas rnam par thar pa gsum dang /
K10D0239_H0240:207a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /
K10D0239_H0240:207a-4: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi snod du gyur pa'o //
K10D0239_H0240:207a-5: bla na med pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob pa'i gnas byams pa chen po dang /
K10D0239_H0240:207a-6: snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs pa /
K10D0239_H0240:207a-7: sems can thams cad la phan pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:207a-8: bde ba'i don byed pa la spro ba /
K10D0239_H0240:207a-9: sangs rgyas rin po che tshol ba'i tshong dpon du gyur pa /
K10D0239_H0240:207a-10: 'khor bas sdug bsngal ba'i sems can yongs su sgrol ba /
K10D0239_H0240:207a-11: sems can la mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bde ba chen po rab tu stobs pa yin te /
K10D0239_H0240:207a-12: bdag cag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad bden
K10D0239_H0240:207a-13: pa'i gsung gis ci dang; ci 'dod pa de dag
K10D0239_H0240:207a-15: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par
K10D0239_H0240:207a-16: rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas bla na med pa'i chos
K10D0239_H0240:207a-17: thob nas chos kyi rgyal po chen por gyur te
K10D0239_H0240:207a-18: / nga de'i tshe na bsod nams dang /
K10D0239_H0240:207a-19: ye shes kyi tshogs la brten te shin tu brtan
K10D0239_H0240:207a-20: pa'i brtson 'grus kyis 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi yang
K10D0239_H0240:207a-21: dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du chud nas bla
K10D0239_H0240:207a-22: na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
K10D0239_H0240:207a-23: tu mngon par sangs rgyas so //
K10D0239_H0240:207a-25: ji ltar 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po gling bzhi
K10D0239_H0240:207b-0: la dbang sgyur ba bzhin du de bzhin @207b gshegs
K10D0239_H0240:207b-1: pa yang bsam gtan bzhi dang /
K10D0239_H0240:207b-2: gzugs med pa'i ting nge 'dzin bzhi dang /
K10D0239_H0240:207b-4: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang //
K10D0239_H0240:207b-7: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /
K10D0239_H0240:207b-8: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang /
K10D0239_H0240:207b-9: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la dbang du gyur to //
K10D0239_H0240:207b-10: ji ltar 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po rin po che sna bdun dang ldan pa ltar /
K10D0239_H0240:207b-11: de bzhin gshegs pa'ang byang chub kyi yan lag rnam pa bdun dang ldan no //
K10D0239_H0240:207b-12: ji ltar 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po bu stong
K10D0239_H0240:207b-13: dang ldan te thams cad dpa' zhing brtul phod pa
K10D0239_H0240:207b-14: / mdzes shing yid du 'ong bas pha rol po'i
K10D0239_H0240:207b-15: dgra thams cad thul ba bzhin du de bzhin gshegs
K10D0239_H0240:207b-16: pa'ang dang por 'phags pa cang shes koondi n+ya nas
K10D0239_H0240:207b-17: tha mar tshe dang ldan pa rab tu bzang po
K10D0239_H0240:207b-18: / dang / rab des la sogs pa nyan thos
K10D0239_H0240:207b-19: kyi 'khor chen po sangs rgyas kyi thugs las byung
K10D0239_H0240:207b-20: / dang / ba / bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung las skyes pa /
K10D0239_H0240:207b-21: bstan pa'i chos las skyes pa /
K10D0239_H0240:207b-22: sangs rgyas kyi chos thob pa dag yod de /
K10D0239_H0240:207b-23: zag pa yongs su zad pa'i phyir dpa' la rtsal che ba zhes bya /
K10D0239_H0240:207b-24: tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi dang ldan pas mdzes shing yid du 'ong ba zhes bya /
K10D0239_H0240:207b-26: mu stegs can thul bas phas rgol ba'i dgra thul ba zhes bya'o //
K10D0239_H0240:208a-0: ji ltar 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po @208a *//
K10D0239_H0240:208a-1: gling phran brgyad khri bzhi stong 'dul zhing ston pa bzhin du /
K10D0239_H0240:208a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa'ang dzambu'i gling bye ba phrag brgya dang /
K10D0239_H0240:208a-3: nub kyi ba glang spyod bye ba phrag brgya dang; shar gyi lus 'phags bye ba phrag brgya dang /
K10D0239_H0240:208a-4: byang gi sgra mi snyan bye ba phrag brgya dang /
K10D0239_H0240:208a-5: rgya mtsho chen po bye ba brag brgya dang /
K10D0239_H0240:208a-6: ri rab lhun po bye ba phrag brgya dang /
K10D0239_H0240:208a-7: rgyal chen ris bzhi bye ba phrag brgya dang /
K10D0239_H0240:208a-8: 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched bye ba phrag brgya dang /
K10D0239_H0240:208a-9: khor yug chen po bye ba phrag brgya de dag
K10D0239_H0240:208a-10: sangs rgyas kyi zhing shin tu rgya che ba gcig
K10D0239_H0240:208a-11: tu gyur par gsung gis dbang sgyur ba la mnga'
K10D0239_H0240:208a-14: nga 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi 'khor lo bcu pa 'di dang ldan te /
K10D0239_H0240:208a-15: 'khor lo de'i dbang gis yang dag pa ji lta
K10D0239_H0240:208a-16: ba bzhin du bdag dang gzhan gyi lus kyi zag
K10D0239_H0240:208a-17: pa thams cad yongs su zad pa mkhyen nas /
K10D0239_H0240:208a-18: sems can tshad med pa la phan pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:208a-19: bde ba'i don gyis 'jigs pa med pa la bde bar bkod do //
K10D0239_H0240:208a-20: 'jigs pa med pas nga ni drang srong chen po'i gnas su bzhugs te /
K10D0239_H0240:208a-21: sangs rgyas kyi 'khor lo bskor nas lha dang /
K10D0239_H0240:208a-22: bdud du bcas pa'i mu stegs can log par smra ba thams cad btul te /
K10D0239_H0240:208a-23: 'khor mang po'i nang du seng ge'i sgra sgrogs so //
K10D0239_H0240:208a-25: nga ni de ltar sangs rgyas kyi 'khor lo bcu pa 'di dag dang ldan te /
K10D0239_H0240:208a-26: sngon gyi smon lam gyi shugs kyis sangs rgyas kyi
K10D0239_H0240:208b-0: @208b zhing rnyog pa lnga can gyi sems can thams
K10D0239_H0240:208b-1: cad rnam par dkar ba'i chos rnams nyams pa /
K10D0239_H0240:208b-2: 'phags pa'i nor bdun gyis brel ba /
K10D0239_H0240:208b-3: mkhas pa dag dang ring du gyur pa /
K10D0239_H0240:208b-5: chad pa'i dra bas kun glags shing zil gyis non pa /
K10D0239_H0240:208b-6: ngan song du 'gro ba'i shing rta la spro zhing dga' ba skyed pa /
K10D0239_H0240:208b-7: phyi ma'i sdug bsngal gyis mi 'jigs pa /
K10D0239_H0240:208b-8: rtag tu kun nas khebs pa'i ma rig pa'i mun par gnas pa la dad pa /
K10D0239_H0240:208b-9: mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rdzogs par byed pa /
K10D0239_H0240:208b-10: mtshams med pa lnga'i las byed pa /
K10D0239_H0240:208b-11: dam pa'i chos la skur cing 'phags pa la dbang za ba /
K10D0239_H0240:208b-12: dge ba'i chos thams cad ring du spong ba /
K10D0239_H0240:208b-13: mi dge ba'i chos rdzogs par byed pa 'dir bzhugs te /
K10D0239_H0240:208b-14: nga ni sangs rgyas kyi 'khor lo rnam pa bcu
K10D0239_H0240:208b-15: po 'di dang ldan pas 'jigs pa med par bde
K10D0239_H0240:208b-16: bar gnas so // 'jigs pa med pas nga ni drang srong chen po'i gnas su bzhugs te /
K10D0239_H0240:208b-17: sangs rgyas kyi 'khor lo bskor nas lha dang /
K10D0239_H0240:208b-18: bdud du bcas pa'i mu stegs can log par smra ba thams cad btul to //
K10D0239_H0240:208b-19: sems can thams cad kyi rigs la rdo rje ltar
K10D0239_H0240:208b-20: sra ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad bcom nas ci
K10D0239_H0240:208b-21: dang / cis 'dul ba bzhin du snod du gyur
K10D0239_H0240:208b-22: ba'i sems can thams cad theg pa gsum las phyir
K10D0239_H0240:208b-23: mi ldog par rnam par bzhag go /
K10D0239_H0240:208b-24: de nas 'khor de'i nang nas 'dul ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad dang /
K10D0239_H0240:209a-6: mi ma yin pa la sogs pa'i bar du 'khor mang po thams cad rab tu dga' nas /
K10D0239_H0240:209a-7: skad mthun par legs so zhes smras te /
K10D0239_H0240:209a-8: spos kyi char chen po rab tu phab bo //
K10D0239_H0240:209a-9: me tog gi char chen po'ang rab tu phab bo //
K10D0239_H0240:209a-10: rin po che'i char chen po'ang rab tu phab bo //
K10D0239_H0240:209a-11: na bza'i char chen po'ang rab tu phab ste /
K10D0239_H0240:209a-12: brgya stong sa chen po 'di'ang rab tu g-yos so //
K10D0239_H0240:209a-13: de ltar sangs rgyas kyi 'khor lo rnam pa bcu po 'di bshad pa'i tshe /
K10D0239_H0240:209a-14: 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de'i nang na byang chub sems
K10D0239_H0240:209a-15: dpa' sems dpa' chen po bye ba khrag khrig brgyad
K10D0239_H0240:209a-16: cu rtsa bzhi snyed kyis mi skye ba'i chos la
K10D0239_H0240:209a-19: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa snyed kyis gzungs dang /
K10D0239_H0240:209a-23: sems can tshad med grangs med pa snyed kyis bla
K10D0239_H0240:209a-24: na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
K10D0239_H0240:209a-25: tu sems bskyed de phyir mi ldog par gyur to
K10D0239_H0240:209a-27: sems can tshad med grangs med pa snyed kyis 'bras bu thob par gyur to //
K10D0239_H0240:209a-29: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sa'i snying
K10D0239_H0240:209a-30: po 'khor lo bcu pa zhes bya ba las 'khor
K10D0239_H0240:209a-31: lo bcu'i le'u ste gnyis so ////
K10D0239_H0240:209b-1: de nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de'i nang na tshangs
K10D0239_H0240:209b-2: pa chen po lha'i snying po zhes bya ba dge
K10D0239_H0240:209b-3: ba'i rtsa ba shin tu bskyed pa /
K10D0239_H0240:209b-5: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yon tan
K10D0239_H0240:209b-6: dang ldan pa zhig stan las langs nas thal mo
K10D0239_H0240:209b-7: sbyar te / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi
K10D0239_H0240:209b-8: bos phyag btsal nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag
K10D0239_H0240:209b-9: sbyar te / smras so // shes rab rgya mtsho yon tan mdzod can la //
K10D0239_H0240:209b-10: bdag gis the tshom zhu zhing gsol bar bgyi //
K10D0239_H0240:209b-11: shes rab rgya mtsho thugs rjes skabs phye ste //
K10D0239_H0240:209b-12: bdag gi rtog pa'i the tshom bsal bar gsol //
K10D0239_H0240:209b-13: bdag cag skom gyis shin tu gdungs pa ltar //
K10D0239_H0240:209b-14: yon tan snying po mchog gi chos ro dang //
K10D0239_H0240:209b-15: phul du gyur pa don dam chos kyi ro //
K10D0239_H0240:209b-16: 'khor du gyur pa thams cad thos par smon //
K10D0239_H0240:209b-17: bcom ldan 'das kyis tshangs pa chen po lha'i snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10D0239_H0240:209b-18: khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la ci dang /
K10D0239_H0240:209b-21: de'i lung bstan pas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o //
K10D0239_H0240:209b-22: tshangs pa chen pos gsol pa /
K10D0239_H0240:209b-24: de ltar bgyi'o zhes gsol nas tshigs su bcad de zhus pa /
K10D0239_H0240:209b-25: shes rab ldan zhing ting 'dzin rab bsgoms te //
K10D0239_H0240:209b-26: bdag med pa la bde bar gnas pa'i rnams //
K10D0239_H0240:209b-27: 'on te dam pa'i don la gnas bgyi'am //
K10D0239_H0240:209b-28: 'on te 'khor ba'i 'khor bar gnas par bgyi //
K10D0239_H0240:210a-2: 'don cing goms par bgyid de rtsol ba dag /
K10D0239_H0240:210a-3: 'on te nyon mongs mtsho las rgal bgyi'am //
K10D0239_H0240:210a-4: 'on ta ma ngan song dag tu ltung bar bgyi //
K10D0239_H0240:210a-5: bsod nams byed la shin tu 'bad rtsol ba //
K10D0239_H0240:210a-6: nges par mya ngan 'da' la gzhol 'gyur ram //
K10D0239_H0240:210a-8: 'on te ngan song dag tu ltung bar 'gyur //
K10D0239_H0240:210a-9: shes rab ldan pa'i rgyal thabs dbang bskur te //
K10D0239_H0240:210a-10: 'khor lo rnam pa bcu dang ldan pa dag /
K10D0239_H0240:210a-12: 'on te sangs rgyas 'bras bu thob par 'gyur //
K10D0239_H0240:210a-13: kun nas nyon mongs pas ni glags pa'i sems //
K10D0239_H0240:210a-14: nyon mongs mang pos 'khrul bar gyur pa dag /
K10D0239_H0240:210a-15: ji ltar sems ni yongs su dag par sbyang //
K10D0239_H0240:210a-16: sgom dang 'don pa'i las dag ji ltar bgyi //
K10D0239_H0240:210a-17: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshangs pa chen po
K10D0239_H0240:210a-18: lha'i snying po de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal
K10D0239_H0240:210a-20: don de dag legs par zhu bar spobs ba legs te /
K10D0239_H0240:210a-21: khyod ni chos 'di dag la shin tu nan tan byed pa'o //
K10D0239_H0240:210a-22: khyod ni spyod pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'o //
K10D0239_H0240:210a-23: khyod ni sngon 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
K10D0239_H0240:210a-24: klung gangg'a'i bye ma snyed la sgo gsum yongs su
K10D0239_H0240:210a-25: sbyang ba'o // dam pa'i chos spel ba'o //
K10D0239_H0240:210a-26: dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung 'tshob pa ste /
K10D0239_H0240:210a-27: de'ang sems can tshad med pa la phan pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:210b-0: bde ba'i @210b don gyi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa
K10D0239_H0240:210b-1: la don zab mo 'di dag dris pa legs so
K10D0239_H0240:210b-4: shes pa brda sprod pa chen po gnas pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:210b-5: spyad par mi bya ba'i chos yod de /
K10D0239_H0240:210b-6: sngon 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad
K10D0239_H0240:210b-7: kyis kyang sems can thams cad yongs su smin par
K10D0239_H0240:210b-8: bya ba dang / 'khor ba las skyo bar bya ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:210b-10: nyon mongs pa yongs su bcad pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:210b-11: theg pa gsum myur du yongs su rdzogs par bya
K10D0239_H0240:210b-12: ba'i phyir shes pa brda sprod pa chen po gnas
K10D0239_H0240:210b-13: pa dang / spyad par mi bya ba'i chos 'di gsungs so //
K10D0239_H0240:210b-14: da ltar phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom
K10D0239_H0240:210b-15: ldan 'das thams cad kyis kyang sems can thams cad
K10D0239_H0240:210b-16: yongs su smin par bya ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:210b-17: 'khor ba las skyo bar bya ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:210b-19: nyon mongs pa yongs su bcad pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:210b-20: theg pa gsum myur du yongs su rdzogs par bya
K10D0239_H0240:210b-21: ba'i phyir shes pa brda sprod pa chen po gnas
K10D0239_H0240:210b-22: pa dang / spyad par mi bya ba'i chos 'di la gnas pa gsung ngo //
K10D0239_H0240:210b-23: ma 'ongs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad
K10D0239_H0240:210b-24: kyang sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya
K10D0239_H0240:210b-25: ba dang / 'khor ba las skyo bar bya ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:210b-27: nyon mongs pa yongs su gcad par bya ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:210b-28: theg pa gsum myur du yongs su rdzogs par bya
K10D0239_H0240:210b-29: ba'i phyir shes pa brda sprod pa chen po gnas
K10D0239_H0240:211a-0: pa dang / spyod par mi bya ba'i chos 'di la gnas par bya ba 'di dag @211a *//
K10D0239_H0240:211a-2: khyod kyis sngon 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
K10D0239_H0240:211a-3: las shes pa brda sprod pa chen po gnas pa
K10D0239_H0240:211a-4: dang / spyad par mi bya ba'i chos 'di la
K10D0239_H0240:211a-5: gnas par bya ba 'di rdzogs par thos pa de
K10D0239_H0240:211a-6: ngas kyang sems can thams cad yongs su smin par
K10D0239_H0240:211a-7: dang / bya ba dang / 'khor ba las skyo bar bya ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:211a-9: nyon mongs pa yongs su gcad pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:211a-10: theg pa gsum myur du yongs su rdzogs par bya
K10D0239_H0240:211a-11: ba'i phyir shes pa brda sprod pa chen po gnas
K10D0239_H0240:211a-12: pa dang / spyad par mi bya ba'i chos 'di
K10D0239_H0240:211a-13: la gnas par bya ba 'di la bstan par bya
K10D0239_H0240:211a-14: pa dang / yi / de bas na skyes bu
K10D0239_H0240:211a-15: dam pa khyod kyis legs par nyon la yid la
K10D0239_H0240:211a-16: zungs shig dang bstan par bya'o //
K10D0239_H0240:211a-18: de ltar bgyi'o zhes gsol nas /
K10D0239_H0240:211a-19: tshangs pa chen po lha'i snying po bcom ldan 'das la phyir nyan to //
K10D0239_H0240:211a-20: bcom ldan 'das kyis tshangs pa chen po lha'i snying po la bka' stsal pa /
K10D0239_H0240:211a-22: spyad par mi bya ba'i chos rnam pa bcu yod de /
K10D0239_H0240:211a-23: gal te rnal 'byor can dag spyod pa ngan pa
K10D0239_H0240:211a-24: 'di las 'ga' tsam gyi rjes su zhugs na'ang 'dod
K10D0239_H0240:211a-25: pa'i khams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba tsam yang yongs
K10D0239_H0240:211a-27: ji ste sngar grub na'ang de ma thag tu phyir stor cing nyams par gyur na gzugs dang /
K10D0239_H0240:211a-28: gzugs med pa'i ting nge 'dzin nas theg pa gsum dang /
K10D0239_H0240:211b-0: theg pa gcig gi bar du thob par 'gyur ba @211b lta ci smos /
K10D0239_H0240:211b-3: 'jig rten na kha cig ting nge 'dzin sgom 'dod
K10D0239_H0240:211b-4: kyang 'tsho ba'i yo byad kyis brel pas tshol ba'i
K10D0239_H0240:211b-5: rkyen gyis nyon mongs pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:211b-6: kha cig ni ting nge 'dzin sgom 'dod kyang tshul
K10D0239_H0240:211b-7: khrims nyams shing kha na ma thob mang po byed
K10D0239_H0240:211b-8: pa dang / kha cig ni ting nge 'dzin sgom
K10D0239_H0240:211b-9: 'dod kyang phyin ci log tu lta zhing 'jig rten
K10D0239_H0240:211b-10: gyi ltas bzang ngan la chags te lus dang /
K10D0239_H0240:211b-12: kha cig ni ting nge 'dzin sgom 'dod kyang sems
K10D0239_H0240:211b-13: g-yo zhing rgod pas 'phags pa la ma gzhol te
K10D0239_H0240:211b-15: kha cig ni ting nge 'dzin sgom 'dod kyang phra
K10D0239_H0240:211b-16: ma byed pa la dga' bas dbyen byed pa dang
K10D0239_H0240:211b-17: / kha cig ni ting nge 'dzin sgom 'dod kyang
K10D0239_H0240:211b-18: ngag rtsub pos 'phags pa la smod cing dbang za
K10D0239_H0240:211b-19: / ba dang / kha cig ni ting nge 'dzin sgom 'dod kyang tshig kyal pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:211b-21: kha cig ni ting nge 'dzin sgom 'dod kyang 'dod chags dang /
K10D0239_H0240:211b-22: phrag dog gis gzhan gyi khe dang /
K10D0239_H0240:211b-24: rnyed pa la mi dga' ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:211b-25: kha cig ni ting nge 'dzin sgom 'dod kyang zhe
K10D0239_H0240:211b-26: sdang dang bcas pas sems can la gnod sems skyes
K10D0239_H0240:211b-27: pa dang / kha cig ni ting nge 'dzin sgom
K10D0239_H0240:211b-28: 'dod kyang log par lta ba dang bcas pas rgyu
K10D0239_H0240:211b-29: dang 'bras bu med par lta ba'o //
K10D0239_H0240:211b-31: de ltar shes par bya ste /
K10D0239_H0240:211b-33: spyad par mi bya ba'i chos rnam pa bcu zhes bya'o //
K10D0239_H0240:212a-0: gal te ting nge 'dzin sgom pa dag spyod pa ngan pa 'di @212a *//
K10D0239_H0240:212a-1: dag las 'ga' tsam gyi rjes su zhugs na 'dod
K10D0239_H0240:212a-2: pa'i khams kyi dge ba'ang yongs su mi 'grub bo
K10D0239_H0240:212a-3: // ji ste sngar grub na'ang de ma theg tu stor cing nyams par 'gyur na gzugs dang /
K10D0239_H0240:212a-4: gzugs med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K10D0239_H0240:212a-6: gcig thob par 'gyur pa lta ci smos /
K10D0239_H0240:212a-10: spyad par mi bya ba'i chos rnam pa bcu yod do /
K10D0239_H0240:212a-11: ting nge 'dzin sgom pa dag spyod pa ngan pa
K10D0239_H0240:212a-12: 'di dag las 'ga' zhig dang ldan na ting nge
K10D0239_H0240:212a-14: ji ste sngar grub na'ang de ma thag tu stor cing nyams par 'gyur ro //
K10D0239_H0240:212a-17: las su bya ba'i dngos po la dga' zhing chags pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:212a-18: bre mo'i gtam la dga' zhing chags pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:212a-19: gnyid kyis log pa la dga' zhing chags pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:212a-20: zang zing tshol ba la dga' zhing chags pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:212a-21: gzugs bzang po la dga' zhing chags pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:212a-22: sgra snyan pa la dga' zhing chags pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:212a-23: dri zhim po la dga' zhing chags pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:212a-24: ro zhim po la dga' zhing chags pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:212a-25: reg bya 'jam po la dga' zhing chags pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:212a-27: dpyod pa la dga' zhing chags pa'o; ;tshangs pa chen po /
K10D0239_H0240:212a-28: de ltar shes par bya ste /
K10D0239_H0240:212a-30: spyad par mi bya ba'i chos rnam pa bcu po
K10D0239_H0240:212a-31: de ting nge 'dzin sgom pa dag spyod pa ngan
K10D0239_H0240:212b-0: pa 'di las 'ga' zhig dang ldan @212b na'ang ting
K10D0239_H0240:212b-1: nge 'dzin dag yongs su mi 'grub bo //
K10D0239_H0240:212b-2: ji ste sngar grub na'ang de ma thag tu stor cing nyams par 'gyur ro //
K10D0239_H0240:212b-3: gal te ting nge 'dzin ma bsgrubs na dge ba'i
K10D0239_H0240:212b-4: tshogs gzhan ci bsags kyang de ni don du mi
K10D0239_H0240:212b-5: 'gyur te / gang bdag gi longs spyod dang /
K10D0239_H0240:212b-6: dad pas sbyin pa bsgrub pa'i phyir sems dang /
K10D0239_H0240:212b-7: sems las byung ba'i chos ngan pa skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10D0239_H0240:212b-8: de'i rkyen gyis rgyal po dang; blon po chen po'i khrims dang yang 'gal bar byed do //
K10D0239_H0240:212b-9: kha cig la ni gshe shing spyod ba'ang byed do //
K10D0239_H0240:212b-10: kha cig la ni lcag gis gzhu ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:212b-11: kha cig la ni lus kyi yan lag dang /
K10D0239_H0240:212b-12: nying lag gcod cing gcod par yang byed do //
K10D0239_H0240:212b-13: de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis nad drag pos 'debs shing yun ring por sdug bsngal myong ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:212b-15: 'chi 'phos nas kyang ngan song gsum gang yang rung
K10D0239_H0240:212b-16: ba gcig gi nang du skye ba nas mtshams med
K10D0239_H0240:212b-17: pa'i sems can dmyal ba'i bar du ltung bar 'gyur
K10D0239_H0240:212b-20: de shu ku ba la ki dang /
K10D0239_H0240:212b-21: lhas byin la sogs pa dang 'dra bar bsam gtan las nyams pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:212b-22: mtshams med pa'i sems can dmyal ba'i bar du ltung
K10D0239_H0240:212b-23: zhing rnam pa tshad med pa snyed kyi sdug bsngal
K10D0239_H0240:212b-24: chen po mi bzod pa kun myong bar 'gyur ro
K10D0239_H0240:212b-25: // de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan
K10D0239_H0240:212b-26: pa cang shes koondi n+ya la 'di skad ces bka'
K10D0239_H0240:213a-0: bas mthar gnas shing ting nge 'dzin sgom pa'i dge slong @213a *//
K10D0239_H0240:213a-1: dag gnas khang mchog dag na gnas shing mal cha mchog dang /
K10D0239_H0240:213a-2: kha zas mchog la spyod cing dge 'dun gyi las thams cad mi byed par gnang ngo //
K10D0239_H0240:213a-4: ting nge 'dzin sgom pa dag gal te 'tsho ba'i yo byad kyis brel bar gyur na sems dang /
K10D0239_H0240:213a-5: sems las byung ba'i chos ngan pa skye zhing ting
K10D0239_H0240:213a-6: nge 'dzin thams cad mi 'grub pa nas mtshams med
K10D0239_H0240:213a-7: pa'i sems can dmyal ba'i bar du ltung zhing mi
K10D0239_H0240:213a-8: bzad pa'i sdug bsngal chen po rnam pa tshad med
K10D0239_H0240:213a-10: ting nge 'dzin sgom pa dag gal te 'tsho ba'i
K10D0239_H0240:213a-11: yo byad dang ldan na ting nge 'dzin mang po
K10D0239_H0240:213a-12: ma grub pa'ang grub pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:213a-13: sngar grub pa dag kyang mi nyams so //
K10D0239_H0240:213a-14: de'i dbang gis mi dge ba'i chos thams cad mi
K10D0239_H0240:213a-15: skye ba nas gzhung de bzhin du rgyas par mi
K10D0239_H0240:213a-17: dpyod pa'i bar du mi skye ba la mtho ris
K10D0239_H0240:213a-18: kyi lhar skye ba nas mya ngan 'da' ba'i bar
K10D0239_H0240:213a-20: ting nge 'dzin sgom pa dag gal te ting nge
K10D0239_H0240:213a-21: 'dzin mang po ma grub na nam gyi stod dang
K10D0239_H0240:213a-22: / nam gyi smad la mi nyal bar byas te brtson 'grus su bslab cing bsgom pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:213a-23: 'du 'dzi yongs su spangs te 'dod pa nyung zhing chog shes par bya ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:213a-24: ci la'ang mi chags pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:213b-5: bag med pa thams cad yongs su spong ngo //
K10D0239_H0240:213b-6: gang de ltar nan tan byed pa de ni brgya byin dang; tshangs pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:213b-8: 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po la sogs pas bstod pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:213b-13: bsnyen bkur la sogs pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:213b-14: sbyin pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong snyed kyang blang bar bya na /
K10D0239_H0240:213b-17: rje'u rigs la sogs pa'i mchod pa len pa lta ci smos /
K10D0239_H0240:213b-18: ting nge 'dzin ma thob pa dag kyang de dag gi bstod pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:213b-25: mchod pa bdag gir byed du dbang na ting nge 'dzin thob pa lta smos kyang ci dgos /
K10D0239_H0240:213b-26: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa /
K10D0239_H0240:213b-27: ting 'dzin bsgoms pas the tshom gcod 'gyur te //
K10D0239_H0240:213b-28: de ma gtogs par gzhan gyis nus ma yin //
K10D0239_H0240:213b-29: de bas ting 'dzin bsgom pa mchog yin gyi //
K10D0239_H0240:213b-30: mkhas pa dag gis de la mchod pa bya //
K10D0239_H0240:213b-31: de nas tshangs pa chen po lha'i snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10D0239_H0240:213b-33: sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ba dag gal te rgyal rigs sam /
K10D0239_H0240:213b-36: dbyug pa la sogs pas gzhus sam /
K10D0239_H0240:214a-1: sam; gal te btson rar bcug gam /
K10D0239_H0240:214a-5: srog dang phral te bkum na de ci rigs pa lags sam /
K10D0239_H0240:214a-7: bcom ldan 'das kyis tshangs pa chen po lha'i snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10D0239_H0240:214a-9: sems can gang zhig nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas skra dang /
K10D0239_H0240:214a-11: ngur smrig gi tshal bu gyon na tshul khrims srung ngam /
K10D0239_H0240:214a-13: tshul khrims med kyang rung ste /
K10D0239_H0240:214a-16: lha ma yin la sogs pa thams cad kyis kyang
K10D0239_H0240:214a-17: khyim pa'i chos nyid dang sbyar du'ang mi gnang na
K10D0239_H0240:214a-19: dbyig pa la sogs pas lus la gzhu zhing 'tshog pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:214a-23: lus kyi yan lag gtub pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:214a-24: 'tsho ba'i dbang po dang phral ba /
K10D0239_H0240:214a-25: chos ma yin pa dang sbyor ba lta ci smos /
K10D0239_H0240:214a-27: tshul khrims srung zhing mang du thos pa dang ldan pa lta zhog la /
K10D0239_H0240:214a-28: nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas tshul khrims
K10D0239_H0240:214a-29: nyams te mi dge ba'i chos spyod pas nang rul
K10D0239_H0240:214a-30: cing mi gtsang bas gang ba'i srin kva lva dang
K10D0239_H0240:214a-31: 'dra ba / dge sbyong ma yin par dge sbyong du khas 'che ba /
K10D0239_H0240:214a-32: tshangs par spyod pa ma yin par tshangs par spyod par khas 'che ba /
K10D0239_H0240:214a-33: nyon mongs pa rnam pa sna tshogs las pham pa /
K10D0239_H0240:214b-1: khas bub pa de lta bu'i tshul khrims nyams pa'i dge slong ngan pa'ang lha dang /
K10D0239_H0240:214b-10: mi ma yin pa la sogs pa thams cad kyi ston pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:214b-12: yon tan rin po che dpag tu med pa'i gter du 'gyur ro //
K10D0239_H0240:214b-14: rigs kyi bu; nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung
K10D0239_H0240:214b-15: ba dag tshul khrims nyams kyang sems can dag gzugs
K10D0239_H0240:214b-16: mthong ba tsam gyis lhag pa'i bsam pa rnam pa
K10D0239_H0240:214b-17: bcu skye bas na yon tan rin po che'i phung

K10D0239_H0240:215a-6: ba'i grong khyer chen po la 'jug pa'i bar du

K10D0239_H0240:215a-14: de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis phra ma yongs su spong ba dang /

K10D0239_H0240:215a-18: bral ba yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i grong
K10D0239_H0240:215a-19: khyer chen po la 'jug pa'i bar du 'gyur ro

K10D0239_H0240:215a-26: pa nas 'jigs pa med pa'i yongs su mya ngan
K10D0239_H0240:215b-0: las 'da' ba'i grong khyer chen @215b po la 'jug

K10D0239_H0240:215b-5: de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis ri dang /
K10D0239_H0240:215b-7: bas mtha' dgon pa la mos shing nyin mtshan du

K10D0239_H0240:215b-10: 'da' ba'i grong khyer chen po la 'jug pa'i bar
K10D0239_H0240:215b-11: du 'gyur ro // la las mthong nas shes rab
K10D0239_H0240:215b-12: rjes su dran pa la lhag pa'i bsam pa skye'o
K10D0239_H0240:215b-13: du 'gyur ro // // de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis dam pa'i chos nyan pa dang /

K10D0239_H0240:215b-16: chen po la 'jug pa'i bar du 'gyur ro //

K10D0239_H0240:215b-21: spro bzhin du gtam zer ba dang /

K10D0239_H0240:215b-27: grong khyer chen po la 'jug pa'i bar du 'gyur
K10D0239_H0240:215b-29: nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ba dag tshul khrims nyams kyang sems can dag gzugs dang /
K10D0239_H0240:216a-0: cha lugs mthong ba tsam gyis lhag @216a *//
K10D0239_H0240:216a-1: pa'i bsam pa rnam pa 'di bcu skye ste /
K10D0239_H0240:216a-2: yon tan rin po che'i phung po tshad med pa thob par 'gyur ro //
K10D0239_H0240:216a-3: de bas na rgyal po dang /
K10D0239_H0240:216a-5: dbang po la sogs pas de la lcag dang /
K10D0239_H0240:216a-6: dbyig pa la sogs pas gzhu zhing 'tshog pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:216a-9: lus kyi yan lag gtub pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:216a-10: 'tsho ba'i dbang po dang bral ba la sogs pa bya bar mi rigs so //
K10D0239_H0240:216a-13: nga la skyabs su song ste /
K10D0239_H0240:216a-14: rab tu byung ba dag tshul khrims nyams te mi
K10D0239_H0240:216a-15: dge ba'i chos spyod pa nang rul cing mi gtsang

K10D0239_H0240:216a-19: nyon mongs pa rnam pa mang po las pham pa /

K10D0239_H0240:216a-30: 'dren pa'i dge ba'i gshes gnyen byed cing yon tan dpag tu med pa'i gter du 'gyur ro //

K10D0239_H0240:216a-34: spyod lam 'phags pa rnams dang mthun te /

K10D0239_H0240:216b-21: dge slong de ngas bstan pa'i 'dul ba las mi
K10D0239_H0240:216b-22: ro lta bu'o zhes gsungs mod kyi /
K10D0239_H0240:216b-25: yon tan lhag ma'i mthu yod do //

K10D0239_H0240:216b-30: mod kyi / khyu mchog la gi wang yod pa dang /

K10D0239_H0240:217b-33: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa /
K10D0239_H0240:217b-34: tsampa ka yi me tog rnyis gyur kyang //

K10D0239_H0240:218a-1: slong tshul khrims nyams shing sdig spyod kyang //

K10D0239_H0240:218a-9: ched du bsams te dgra bcom pa bsad pa dang /

K10D0239_H0240:218b-13: bsnyen par rdzogs su mi gnang ste /

K10D0239_H0240:218b-27: ba'i sdig pa yin la mtshams med pa ma yin
K10D0239_H0240:218b-28: pa'ang yod do // la la ni mtshams med pa
K10D0239_H0240:218b-29: yin la rtsa ba'i sdig pa ma yin pa'ang yod

K10D0239_H0240:219a-20: de la ji ltar na mtshams med pa ni yin la rtsa ba'i sdig ma yin pa zhe na /
K10D0239_H0240:219a-22: gang zag gang zhig dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su song ngam /
K10D0239_H0240:219a-24: khrims bcu 'dzin ba dag mtshams med pa lnga las
K10D0239_H0240:219a-25: gcig tsam byas pa dag ni mtshams med pa'i sdig
K10D0239_H0240:219b-0: yin la / rtsa ba'i @219b sdeg ma yin pa zhes bya'o //
K10D0239_H0240:219b-1: gang zag de ni rab tu dbyung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs su mi rung ste /
K10D0239_H0240:219b-2: gal te rab tu byung ngam /
K10D0239_H0240:219b-3: bsnyan par rdzogs pa byin na 'di'i slob dpon sdig pa dang bcas pa yin te /
K10D0239_H0240:219b-4: nga'i bstan pa las bskrad par bya'o //
K10D0239_H0240:219b-5: de la ji ltar na rtsa ba'i sdig kyang ma
K10D0239_H0240:219b-6: yin la mtshams med pa'ang ma yin pa zhe na
K10D0239_H0240:219b-8: gang zag gang zhig dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su song ngam /
K10D0239_H0240:219b-9: khrims lnga bcung ba las sangs rgyas dang /
K10D0239_H0240:219b-11: dge 'dun la the tshom za ba'i sems skye ste /
K10D0239_H0240:219b-12: mu stegs can la skyabs su song nas ston pa'i
K10D0239_H0240:219b-13: slob dpon du 'dzin tam; ltas su blta ba sna
K10D0239_H0240:219b-14: tshogs la ltas su 'dzin cing 'jig rten gyi lhar
K10D0239_H0240:219b-15: rjed pa'o // gang zag gang zhig de bzhin gshegs
K10D0239_H0240:219b-16: pas gsungs pa'i dam pa'i chos nyan thos kyi theg
K10D0239_H0240:219b-17: pa dang ldan pa'i dam pa'i chos dang /
K10D0239_H0240:219b-18: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang ldan pa'i dam pa'i chos dang /
K10D0239_H0240:219b-19: theg pa chen po dang ldan pa'i dam pa'i chos la skur cing sgro 'dogs pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:219b-22: bdag yid mi shes shing yid dpas pha rol po
K10D0239_H0240:219b-23: gzhan dag kyang de las zlog cing bar chad byed
K10D0239_H0240:219b-24: pa dang / gzhan dag klog ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:219b-26: glegs bam du 'dri ba'i tshigs bcad gcig tsam gyi yang bar du gcod cing bgegs byas na /
K10D0239_H0240:219b-27: de ni rtsa ba'i sdig kyang ma yin la mtshams med pa'ang ma yin te /
K10D0239_H0240:220a-0: kha nam thob che po'i las mtshams med pa dang nye ba @220a *//
K10D0239_H0240:220a-2: gang zag de kha na mtho ba'i sdig pa'i las chen po dag mthol ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:220a-3: bshags pa ma byas kyi bar du rab tu 'byung ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:220a-4: bsnyen par rdzogs su mi rung ste /
K10D0239_H0240:220a-5: la la zhig gis rab tu phyung nga /
K10D0239_H0240:220a-6: bsnyen par rdzogs pa byin na /
K10D0239_H0240:220a-7: de'i slob dpon de sdig pa dang bcas pa yin pas nga'i bstan pa las bskrad par bya'o //
K10D0239_H0240:220a-8: gang zag de rab tu byung ngam bsnyen par rdzogs
K10D0239_H0240:220a-9: nas kha na ma tho ba'i sdig ba de mthol
K10D0239_H0240:220a-10: ba dang / bshags pa'i las ma byas na de
K10D0239_H0240:220a-11: ni ngas bstan pa'i 'dul ba las myur du bsgrad
K10D0239_H0240:220a-12: ba dang / dgos so // de ci'i phyir zhe na /
K10D0239_H0240:220a-13: gang zag rnam pa de gnyis ni dam pa'i chos kyi mig med par byed pa /
K10D0239_H0240:220a-14: dam pa'i chos kyi sgron ma nub par byed pa /
K10D0239_H0240:220a-15: dkon mchog gi gdung yongs su gcod pa ste lha dang /
K10D0239_H0240:220a-16: mi la sogs pas don med pa /
K10D0239_H0240:220a-17: phan pa med pa'i sdug bsngal spyod du 'dzug cing ngan song du ltung bar byed pa yin no //
K10D0239_H0240:220a-18: gang zag rnam pa gnyis po de ni bdag nyid
K10D0239_H0240:220a-19: kyi dam pa'i chos la skur cing 'phags pa rnam
K10D0239_H0240:220a-21: pha rol po gzhan dag kyang dam pa'i chos la
K10D0239_H0240:220a-22: skur cing 'phags pa rnams la smod du 'dzud pa
K10D0239_H0240:220a-23: ste / tshe 'phos ma thag tu mtshams med pa'i
K10D0239_H0240:220a-24: sems can dmyal ba chen por ltung zhing bskal ba'i
K10D0239_H0240:220a-25: bar du sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur te phyir gsor
K10D0239_H0240:220a-26: ste / mi rung ngo // tshangs pa chen po /
K10D0239_H0240:220a-28: bcas pa'i sdig la mi gnas pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:220b-0: mi bya ba'ang yod @220b la; rang bzhin gyi sdig la mi gnas pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:220b-2: rang bzhin gyi sdig la rtsa ba'i sdig tu 'gyur ba mi gnas pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:220b-4: de la ji ltar na rtsa ba'i sdig la mi gnas pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:220b-5: mi bya ba'i chos gang zhe na /
K10D0239_H0240:220b-7: dge slong gang zhig mi tshangs par spyod pas rtsa ba'i sdig byas pa dang ched du bsams te /
K10D0239_H0240:220b-8: skye bo mi'i srog bcad nas rtsa ba'i sdig byas pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:220b-9: dkon mchog gsum gyi dkor ma byin pa brkus nas rtsa ba'i sdig byas pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:220b-10: rdzun chen po smras nas rtsa ba'i sdig byas pa ste /
K10D0239_H0240:220b-11: dge slong gang zhig rtsa ba'i sdig rnam pa 'di
K10D0239_H0240:220b-12: bzhi las 'ga' zhig byas na dge slong gis las
K10D0239_H0240:220b-13: bya ba'i nang du mi chud de /
K10D0239_H0240:220b-15: phyogs bzha'i dge 'dun gyi nor la spyod du mi dbang mod kyi /
K10D0239_H0240:220b-17: lcag gis brdeg cing gzhu ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:220b-19: spyi zhing gshe ba dang lus kyi yan lag gtub pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:220b-20: 'tsho ba'i dbang po dang phral ba la sogs pa thams cad byed du mi gnang ngo //
K10D0239_H0240:220b-21: de dag ni rang bzhin gyi sdig gi nad na rtsa ba'i sdig lce'i ba ste /
K10D0239_H0240:220b-24: ci'i phyir de la rtsa ba'i sdig ces bya zhe na /
K10D0239_H0240:220b-25: gang zag gang gis chos rnam pa de bzhin byas na /
K10D0239_H0240:220b-26: tshe 'phos ma thag tu ngan song du ltung bar 'gyur te /
K10D0239_H0240:220b-27: ngan song du 'gro ba'i rtsa ba yin pas na rtsa ba'i sdig ces bya'o //
K10D0239_H0240:220b-28: de la ci'i phyir mtshams med pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:221a-1: med pa la nye ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:221a-2: rtsa ba'i sdig pa mi gnas pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:221a-3: mi bya ba'i kha na mtho ba chen po'i las ngan pa zhes gsungs zhe na /
K10D0239_H0240:221a-7: ro nye'i dbu ni steng gi nam mkha' la bor
K10D0239_H0240:221a-8: na cung zad kyang mi sdod par de mthag tu
K10D0239_H0240:221a-9: phyi yang sa la ltung ngo //
K10D0239_H0240:221a-11: mtshams med pa la nye ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:221a-13: dam pa'i chos la skur ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:221a-14: dkon mchog gsum la the tshom za ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:221a-15: gang zag sdig ba na rnam gnyis po'ang de dang 'dra ste /
K10D0239_H0240:221a-16: gang zag gang gi sdig pa rnam pa bcu gcig
K10D0239_H0240:221a-17: po de las 'ga' zhig byas na tshe 'phos ma
K10D0239_H0240:221a-18: thag tu thogs pa med par mtshams med pa'i sems
K10D0239_H0240:221a-19: can dmyal ba chen por gdon mi za bar skye
K10D0239_H0240:221a-20: zhing sdug bsngal chen po myong bar 'gyur te /
K10D0239_H0240:221a-21: de bas na mi gnas pa dang mi bya ba'i
K10D0239_H0240:221a-22: kha na ma tho ba chen po'i las ngan pa
K10D0239_H0240:221a-23: zhes bya'o // mi gnas pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:221a-24: mi bya ba'i kha na mtho ba chen po las
K10D0239_H0240:221a-25: ngan pa 'di dag byas pa'i gang zag ni lus
K10D0239_H0240:221a-26: 'di nyid la nyon mongs pa zad par byed mi
K10D0239_H0240:221a-28: ting nge 'dzin yang mi'i grub na yang dag pa
K10D0239_H0240:221a-29: mi 'gyur ba la zhugs pa thob pa lta ci
K10D0239_H0240:221a-30: smos te / tshe 'phos ma thag tu gdon mi
K10D0239_H0240:221a-31: za bar sems can dmyal bar skye zhing sdug bsngal
K10D0239_H0240:221b-0: rigs kyi bu mo gang gis bsam @221b ba dag
K10D0239_H0240:221b-1: pas nga'i bstan pa la dad nas nyan thos kyi
K10D0239_H0240:221b-3: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la zhugs sam /
K10D0239_H0240:221b-4: theg pa chen po la zhugs te ngas bstan pa
K10D0239_H0240:221b-5: la dad pas khyim nas khyim ma yin par rab
K10D0239_H0240:221b-6: tu phyung ste bsnyen par rdzogs par bslab pa'i gnas
K10D0239_H0240:221b-7: mang po la shin tu bkur ste dang /
K10D0239_H0240:221b-8: ri ma gror bya ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:221b-9: rtsa ba'i sdig pa bzhi bsrung ba la shin tu 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus chen po brtsam par bya'o //
K10D0239_H0240:221b-10: gang zag de la ni rtag tu lha dang /
K10D0239_H0240:221b-12: mi ma yin pa la sogs pa rjes su 'brang zhing srung ste de ni lha dang /
K10D0239_H0240:221b-13: mi la sogs pa'i mchod pa'ang chud mi za'o //
K10D0239_H0240:221b-14: theg pa gsum gang la spro zhing dga' ba bzhin
K10D0239_H0240:221b-15: de ma thag tu mtha'i gnas byed par 'gyur ro
K10D0239_H0240:221b-16: // de bas na yang dag pa mya ngan las 'da' bar 'dod pa dag lus dang /
K10D0239_H0240:221b-18: chos rnam pa de bzhi nyams par mi bya'o //
K10D0239_H0240:221b-20: so so'i skye bo dag ni rgyu rnam pa 'di
K10D0239_H0240:221b-21: gsum gyis mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bde ba thob
K10D0239_H0240:221b-24: de bzhin gshegs pa la brten pa'i rgyu dang /
K10D0239_H0240:221b-25: 'phags pas bstan pa la brten pa'i rgyu dang /
K10D0239_H0240:221b-26: nga'i nye gnas la brten pa'i rgyu ste gsum mo //
K10D0239_H0240:221b-27: so so'i skye bo dag rgyu rnam pa 'di gsum
K10D0239_H0240:221b-28: la brten te btson 'grus su nan tan byas nas
K10D0239_H0240:221b-29: mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bde bar thob par 'gyur
K10D0239_H0240:221b-30: ro // gang zag gang gis chos rnam pa de
K10D0239_H0240:221b-31: bzhi nyams na nga'ang de'i ston pa ma yin la
K10D0239_H0240:222a-2: gang zag gang gis chos rnam pa de bzhin nyams
K10D0239_H0240:222a-3: na de ni ngas bstan pa'i shin tu zab pa
K10D0239_H0240:222a-4: / rgya che ba'i mi rtag pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:222a-7: bdag med pa dang ldan pa /
K10D0239_H0240:222a-8: sems can thams cad la phan pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:222a-9: bde ba'i don du 'gyur bar bstan pa so sor thar ba las 'gal ba'o //
K10D0239_H0240:222a-10: gal te ngas bstan pa'i so sor thar pa las 'gal na de ni bsam gtan dang /
K10D0239_H0240:222a-11: ting nge 'dzin thams cad la ldongs shing 'thom par 'gyur te /
K10D0239_H0240:222a-12: gzhol zhing 'jug mi nus pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:222a-13: nyon mongs pa mang pos dkris shing glags te theg
K10D0239_H0240:222a-14: pa gsum gyi chos kyi snod kyang ma yin pas
K10D0239_H0240:222a-15: ngan song du ltung zhing sdug bsngal chen po myong
K10D0239_H0240:222a-17: rigs kyi bu mo gang gis ngas bstan pa'i so
K10D0239_H0240:222a-18: so'i thar pa las rtsa ba bzhi ma nyams te
K10D0239_H0240:222a-19: yongs su dag na nga'ang de'i ston pa yin la
K10D0239_H0240:222a-20: / de'ang nga'i nyan thos yin pas nga'i gsung gi rjes su 'brang ba /
K10D0239_H0240:222a-21: nga'i chos la bde bar gnas pa /
K10D0239_H0240:222a-22: bya ba thams cad kyi mthar phyin pa yin pas
K10D0239_H0240:222a-23: gang zag de ni tshul khrims kyi phung po la
K10D0239_H0240:222a-24: shin tu gnas pas na dge ba'i chos thams cad
K10D0239_H0240:222a-25: la legs par gnas pa yin no //
K10D0239_H0240:222a-26: nyan thos kyi theg pa phun sum tshogs pa la gnas pa yin no //
K10D0239_H0240:222a-27: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa phun sum tshogs phal gnas pa yin no //
K10D0239_H0240:222a-28: theg pa chen po phun sum tshogs pa la gnas pa yin no //
K10D0239_H0240:222b-0: gal te rang bzhin @222b gyi sdig pa'i rtsa ba rnam pa bzhi po de bsrungs na /
K10D0239_H0240:222b-1: de ni zag pa dang bcas pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:222b-2: zag pa med pa'i dge ba'i chos thams cad kyi
K10D0239_H0240:222b-3: rgyu mchog dam pa rnam par gzhag pa yin no
K10D0239_H0240:222b-4: // de bas na chos rnam pa 'di bzhi srung
K10D0239_H0240:222b-5: ba ni dge ba'i chos thams cad kyi rtsa ba
K10D0239_H0240:222b-7: sa chen po la brten nas rtsi shing dang /
K10D0239_H0240:222b-10: nags tshal la sogs pa thams cad skye'o //
K10D0239_H0240:222b-11: de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi rtsa ba bzhi po
K10D0239_H0240:222b-12: 'di srung ba la brten nas dge ba'i chos thams
K10D0239_H0240:222b-15: sa chen po la brten nas ri thams cad dang /
K10D0239_H0240:222b-17: ri khong yug chen po dang /
K10D0239_H0240:222b-18: ri rab ri'i rgyal po la sogs pa thams cad bde bar gnas so //
K10D0239_H0240:222b-19: de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi rtsa ba bzhi po
K10D0239_H0240:222b-20: srung ba la brten nas nyan thos kyi theg pa
K10D0239_H0240:222b-21: dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:222b-22: bla na med pa'i theg pa chen po bde bar gnas par 'gyur ro //
K10D0239_H0240:222b-24: sa chen po la brten nas 'jig rten gyi ro bro ba'i mchog thams cad btsal gyis rnyed do //
K10D0239_H0240:222b-25: de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi rtsa ba bzhi po srung ba la brten nas dran pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:222b-28: dang des pa'i bzod pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:222b-30: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du thob par 'gyur ro //
K10D0239_H0240:222b-32: sa chen po ni gtsang ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:223a-0: mi gtsang ba thams cad snyoms par 'dzin @223a *//
K10D0239_H0240:223a-1: to; ;tshul khrims kyi rtsa ba bzhi shin tu srung ba'i rigs kyi bu dang /
K10D0239_H0240:223a-2: rigs kyi bu mo dag kyang de bzhin du chos kyi snod du gyur pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:223a-3: chos kyi snod du ma gyur pa la sems mnyam par bzhag ste de la mi brnyas /
K10D0239_H0240:223a-7: co mi 'dri na dge ba'i chos thams cad skye ba'i gnas su 'gyur ro //
K10D0239_H0240:223a-9: sa chen po 'di la ni sems can thams cad de la longs spyod cing bde bar 'tsho'o //
K10D0239_H0240:223a-10: de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi rtsa ba bzhi shin tu srung ba'i rigs kyi bu dang /
K10D0239_H0240:223a-11: rigs kyi bu mo dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas
K10D0239_H0240:223a-12: bstan pa yang dag pa'i chos la shin tu spro
K10D0239_H0240:223a-13: ba dang / mchog dam pa'i bsam bdag pas sems
K10D0239_H0240:223a-14: can thams cad la bye brag gi 'du shes med
K10D0239_H0240:223a-15: par bsdu ba rnam pa bzhi'i chos kyis mnyam par
K10D0239_H0240:223a-16: ba dang / bsdus te / sems can thams cad
K10D0239_H0240:223a-17: chos kyi dga' ba la longs spyod cing bde bar
K10D0239_H0240:223a-19: de nas tshe dang ldan pa au pa lis bcom
K10D0239_H0240:223a-20: ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa 'di dag thos nas 'dug
K10D0239_H0240:223a-22: gos tshags bcos nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la
K10D0239_H0240:223a-23: spyi bos gtugs te bla gos phyogs gcig tu byas
K10D0239_H0240:223a-24: / pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas thal mo sbyar ba btud de /
K10D0239_H0240:223a-25: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10D0239_H0240:223a-26: bcom ldan 'das kyi gsungs pa ltar tshul khrims kyi
K10D0239_H0240:223b-0: rtsa ba bzhi shin tu srung pa'i rigs kyi @223b
K10D0239_H0240:223b-1: bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo dag chos kyi
K10D0239_H0240:223b-2: snod du gyur pa'i chos kyi snod du ma gyur
K10D0239_H0240:223b-3: pa kun la sems mnyam par bzhag ste /
K10D0239_H0240:223b-8: glo bur du nyes pa mi gleng ngo zhes gsungs na /
K10D0239_H0240:223b-9: de lta na ni ma mchis pa'i dus na dge
K10D0239_H0240:223b-10: slong tshul khrims nyams shing mi dge ba spyod pa
K10D0239_H0240:223b-11: / dge sbyong ma lags par dge spyong du khas 'che ba /
K10D0239_H0240:223b-12: tshangs par spyod pa ma lags par tshangs par spyod
K10D0239_H0240:223b-13: par khas 'che ba dag la dge slong gi dge
K10D0239_H0240:223b-14: 'dun gyis ji lta bu'i thabs kyis gleng zhing dgar
K10D0239_H0240:223b-15: bar bgyi / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa au pa li la bka' stsal pa /
K10D0239_H0240:223b-17: khyim pa rnams kyis dge slong gi nyes pa gleng du ni gnang ba'i skabs med do //
K10D0239_H0240:223b-18: dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis kyang chos bzhin ma yin pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:223b-19: ma rtogs par tshul khrims nyams pa'i dge slong gi nyes pa gleng du ma gnang na dga' ba'am /
K10D0239_H0240:223b-21: chos bzhin ma yin pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:223b-22: ma rtogs par tshul khrims nyams pa'i dge slong gi nyes pa glengs sam /
K10D0239_H0240:223b-23: gal te bskrad na kha na ma tho ba chen po'i sdig pa 'thob bo //
K10D0239_H0240:223b-26: chos bzhin ma yin pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:223b-27: ma rtogs pa rnam pa 'di bcus tshul khrims nyams
K10D0239_H0240:223b-28: ba'i dge slong gi nyes pa glengs na kha na
K10D0239_H0240:223b-29: ma tho ba'i sdig pa chen po thob par 'gyur
K10D0239_H0240:223b-30: gyi / mkhas ba dag gis ni de ltar mi bya'o //
K10D0239_H0240:224a-0: dge 'dun ma dad par rgyal po'i spyan sngar ma rtogs @224a *//
K10D0239_H0240:224a-1: bzhin du tshul khrims nyams pa'i dge slong gi nyes pa gleng ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:224a-2: dge 'dun ma dad par kun tu rgyu ba'i mdun
K10D0239_H0240:224a-3: du tshul khrims nyams pa'i dge slong gi nyes pa
K10D0239_H0240:224a-4: gleng ba dang / dge 'dun ma dad par blon
K10D0239_H0240:224a-5: po'i mdun du tshul khrims nyams pa'i dge slong gi

K10D0239_H0240:224a-20: nyes pa gleng na kha na ma tho ba'i sdig

K10D0239_H0240:224b-0: @224b te; kha na ma tho ba'i sdig pa chen

K10D0239_H0240:224b-19: tshul khrims nyams pa'i nyes pa glengs na kha na

K10D0239_H0240:224b-21: ro // ji ste bden pa yang dag pa la

K10D0239_H0240:225a-1: tshul khrims nyams pa dag dge slong gi dge 'dun
K10D0239_H0240:225a-2: gyi nang na dge 'dun dang lhan cig tu gnas

K10D0239_H0240:225a-6: gos tshags bcos la ba sti stang dang bcas pas
K10D0239_H0240:225a-7: dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi rkang pa la phyag
K10D0239_H0240:225a-8: 'tshal la; de nas tshul khrims nyams pa'i dge slong
K10D0239_H0240:225a-9: gi mdun du song la nyes pa gleng ngo zhes
K10D0239_H0240:225a-11: tshe dang ldan pa dgongs shig /

K10D0239_H0240:225a-22: bde ba'i gnod pa ma yin pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:225a-23: de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi mig dang /
K10D0239_H0240:225a-24: chos kyi sgron ma yun du gnas par bya ba'i phyir gleng ngo //

K10D0239_H0240:225a-27: gang zag des gleng du gnang na ni chos bzhin du gleng bar bya'o //
K10D0239_H0240:225a-28: gal te gleng du ma gnang na phyir yang gnas brtan dang /
K10D0239_H0240:225a-29: dge 'dun gyi rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te bsti stang dang bcas bas 'di skad ces gsol cig /

K10D0239_H0240:225b-0: bdag gis chos lnga la @225b brten te gleng bar 'tshal lo zhes gsol cig /

K10D0239_H0240:225b-2: brtan gyis shin tu rtogs la gleng pa bas ci
K10D0239_H0240:225b-3: gleng ba dang / nyes pa ci byas pa dang /

K10D0239_H0240:225b-11: gang du mthun pa de dang /

K10D0239_H0240:225b-20: snyems sam / nor gyi mthu snyems sam /

K10D0239_H0240:225b-28: kyang nyan du mi btub pa'i dge slong de la
K10D0239_H0240:225b-29: ji ltar chad pas gcad par bgyi /
K10D0239_H0240:225b-30: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10D0239_H0240:226a-0: dge slong gnas brtan sde snod gsum 'dzin @226a *//
K10D0239_H0240:226a-1: pas dge 'dun la dad pa dris te /
K10D0239_H0240:226a-3: blon po chen po la mthu btsal ba'i pho nya
K10D0239_H0240:226a-4: thong la gdod chos bzhin du chad pas chod cig
K10D0239_H0240:226a-5: / au pa lis yang gsol pa /
K10D0239_H0240:226a-7: gal te sdig pa bgyis pa'i dge slong de nor dbyig gi mthu dang /
K10D0239_H0240:226a-8: mang du thos pa'i mthu dang /

K10D0239_H0240:226a-11: blon po'ang dga' bar bgyis te /
K10D0239_H0240:226a-12: thams cad chos ma lags par bgyis pa /
K10D0239_H0240:226a-13: tshul khrims nyams pa'i dge slong gi grogs bgyid de /
K10D0239_H0240:226a-14: tshul khrims ngan pa tsam gyi dge slong de dag
K10D0239_H0240:226a-15: sdig pa nyam rangs su bgyid du stsal nas chos
K10D0239_H0240:226a-16: bzhin du chad pas gcad du'ang mi ster na /
K10D0239_H0240:226a-17: de'i tshe de la dge 'dun gyis ji ltar bgyi /

K10D0239_H0240:226a-19: gal te dge slong de mi gnas pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:226a-20: mi bya ba la brten te /
K10D0239_H0240:226a-21: dge 'dun gyi nang du gnas nas sdig pa chen po mngon sum du mi snang na /
K10D0239_H0240:226a-22: de'i tshe dge 'dun gyis skad cig gzhag go /

K10D0239_H0240:226a-24: mi bya ba'i sdig pa chen po mngon sum du
K10D0239_H0240:226a-25: snang bzhin du dge 'dun gyi nang na gnas na

K10D0239_H0240:226b-6: tu 'dor ro // de bzhin du mi gnas ba dang /

K10D0239_H0240:226b-8: khyim pa dang mthu rnam pa mang po snyems te

K10D0239_H0240:226b-23: dge slong [?] ro dang 'dra ba dang lhan cig

K10D0239_H0240:227a-18: sa'i snying pos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces

K10D0239_H0240:227a-21: de'i tshe de na gnas pa'i sems can dag nyon

K10D0239_H0240:227a-27: tshong dpon gdol pa can dang /

K10D0239_H0240:227b-4: glen pa dag shes pa snyems shing 'jig rten phyi

K10D0239_H0240:227b-6: dge ba'i bshes gnyen spong ba /

K10D0239_H0240:227b-8: rnyed pa'i phyir tshul khrims nyams pa sdig pa bgyid
K10D0239_H0240:227b-9: pa'i dge slong dang sten cing chos ma yin pa
K10D0239_H0240:227b-10: la spyod pa'i grogs su gyur nas /
K10D0239_H0240:227b-11: thams cad gdon mi za bar mtshams med pa'i sems
K10D0239_H0240:227b-12: can dmyal ba la 'jug cing 'bab pa'i gnas de

K10D0239_H0240:227b-23: dpa' chen po sa'i snying po la 'di skad ces
K10D0239_H0240:227b-24: // bka' stsal to // rigs kyi bu /

K10D0239_H0240:227b-26: kyi zhing 'dir sems can dag nyon mongs pas yongs
K10D0239_H0240:227b-27: su gdungs nas sdig pa spyod cing byis pa gti
K10D0239_H0240:227b-28: mug can gdul dka' bar gyur pa gang rgyal rigs
K10D0239_H0240:228a-1: blon po gdol pa can dang /
K10D0239_H0240:228a-2: khyim bdag gdol pa can dang /

K10D0239_H0240:228a-4: dge sbyong gdol pa can dang /
K10D0239_H0240:228a-5: bram ze gdol pa can la sogs pa dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ba /
K10D0239_H0240:228a-9: gti mug can shes ba snyems pa can /
K10D0239_H0240:228a-10: dge ba'i bshes gnyen spong ba /
K10D0239_H0240:228a-11: smras pa'i tshig bden pa med pa /
K10D0239_H0240:228a-12: dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis bstan pa la mi 'jug pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:228a-14: tshig ngan pas rnam par 'thing ba /
K10D0239_H0240:228a-15: dam pa'i chos la the tshom za zhing log par lta ba /
K10D0239_H0240:228a-16: 'jig rten phyi ma'i sdug bsngal gyi 'bras bu la mi 'jigs pa /
K10D0239_H0240:228a-17: rtag tu dang tshul ngan pa can dag la sten par dga' ba /
K10D0239_H0240:228a-18: srog gcod pa nas log par lta ba'i bar du spyod pa la dga' zhing g-yo dang /
K10D0239_H0240:228a-21: gzhan la gnod pa byed pa'i rgyal rigs gdol pa
K10D0239_H0240:228a-22: can nas bram ze gdol pa can gyi bar du
K10D0239_H0240:228a-24: nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung na'ang tshul khrims
K10D0239_H0240:228a-25: nyams shing 'jig rten gyi 'du 'dzi'i las byed par
K10D0239_H0240:228a-26: spro ba la rgyal rigs dang /

K10D0239_H0240:228a-29: du smra zhing spyod pa dang mi ldan pa phan
K10D0239_H0240:228a-30: tshun du phrin can gyi ge skyel ba la dga'
K10D0239_H0240:228b-0: khe spogs byed cing @228b 'jig rten rgyang pa na pa'i gtsug lag slob pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:228b-1: zhing rmo ba'i las la dga' ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:228b-2: nor rin po cheg sog cing sped pa dang /

K10D0239_H0240:228b-20: cing bsti stang dang bcas pas mchod pa byed de
K10D0239_H0240:228b-21: / de dag gi ngag kyang nyan to //
K10D0239_H0240:228b-22: tshul khrims nyams bde dag kyang rgyal rigs gdol pa
K10D0239_H0240:228b-23: can nas bram ze gdol pa can gyi bar du
K10D0239_H0240:228b-24: de dag la sten par dga' zhing bkur sti dang
K10D0239_H0240:228b-25: / rim gro byed de de'i ngag nyan to //
K10D0239_H0240:228b-26: gal te gang zag 'ga' zhig nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas tshul khrims dang /
K10D0239_H0240:228b-29: mi slob pa la nan tan byed pa nas 'bras bu'i mthar byin gyi bar du gyur pa la /
K10D0239_H0240:228b-30: rgyal rigs gdol ba can nas bram ze gdol pa
K10D0239_H0240:228b-31: can gyi bar du de dag gis de la phrag

K10D0239_H0240:229a-3: mchod ba mi byed cing slar dag nyan bar yang mi byed do //

K10D0239_H0240:229a-13: rin thang med pa'i rin po che rnam pa sna
K10D0239_H0240:229a-14: tshogs bor nas nor bu mching bu len pa ltar
K10D0239_H0240:229a-15: de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i dus na sangs rgyas

K10D0239_H0240:229a-24: mi slob pa'i gang zag dang /

K10D0239_H0240:229a-40: mchod pa byed de de'i ngag nyan to //
K10D0239_H0240:229b-0: de ltar sdig @229b pa can de dag ni slob dpon dang /
K10D0239_H0240:229b-1: slob mar bcas te gdon mi za bar mtshams med
K10D0239_H0240:229b-2: pa'i sems can nga myal bar lhung bar 'gyur ro
K10D0239_H0240:229b-4: sdig pa'i 'khor lo rnam pa bcu yod de /

K10D0239_H0240:229b-6: rje'u rigs gdol pa can dang /
K10D0239_H0240:229b-7: khyim bdag gdol pa can dang /

K10D0239_H0240:229b-10: rnam pa bcu po las 'ga' zhig dang ldan nam
K10D0239_H0240:229b-11: / gal te kun dang ldan na sngon bsags pa'i
K10D0239_H0240:229b-12: dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang tshig ste thal

K10D0239_H0240:229b-14: lus kyi yan lag kyang du ma bur bcad pa

K10D0239_H0240:229b-18: med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen por ltung bar
K10D0239_H0240:229b-21: de ltar tshul khrims nyams pa sdig pa spyod pa'i
K10D0239_H0240:229b-22: dge slong dag gi ngan par lta ba ni rgyal
K10D0239_H0240:229b-23: rigs dang / blon po la sogs pas bzod la /

K10D0239_H0240:229b-25: dag pa mthong na de la 'di skad zer ro
K10D0239_H0240:229b-27: 'di ltar dge slong 'di dag ni glen pa gti mug can /
K10D0239_H0240:229b-28: tshul 'chos shing 'jig rten slu ba yin te /
K10D0239_H0240:230a-3: grags pa 'dod pa'i phyir bdag ni bstod /
K10D0239_H0240:230a-4: gzhan la ni smod cing phrag dog gis dkrugs ma byed do //
K10D0239_H0240:230a-6: grags pa la spro zhing chog mi shes pa yin
K10D0239_H0240:230a-7: pas bskrad par 'os pa de dag gi tshig kyang
K10D0239_H0240:230a-9: dge slong de dag ni rdzun 'ba' zhig smra zhing
K10D0239_H0240:230a-10: bden pa'i chos dang bral bas 'brang bu thob ba'ang
K10D0239_H0240:230a-11: med / 'dod pa dang bral zhing zag pa yongs su zad pa'ang ma yin la /
K10D0239_H0240:230a-14: mchod pa tsam 'dod pa'i phyir bas mthar gnas shing
K10D0239_H0240:230a-15: yon tan can du ston pa dag la mchod pa
K10D0239_H0240:230a-20: bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag pa'am /
K10D0239_H0240:230a-21: lam la nan tan byed pa ni ma yin no zhes skur to //
K10D0239_H0240:230a-22: de nas rgyal rigs gdol pa can nas bram ge
K10D0239_H0240:230a-23: gdol ba can gyi bar du thams cad kyi bas
K10D0239_H0240:230a-24: mthar gnas pa'i dge slong yongs su dag pa la
K10D0239_H0240:230a-27: bsti stang bya ba'i sems med do //
K10D0239_H0240:230a-29: bsnyen bkur byed pa la mi mos shing /
K10D0239_H0240:230a-30: ji skad du bstan de'i tshig mi nyan te de la brnyas shing smod do //

K10D0239_H0240:230a-32: dag pa la brnyas smod pa nyid chos kyi mig

K10D0239_H0240:230b-0: smod pa ma yin @230b bas de'i tshe yul de
K10D0239_H0240:230b-4: lha la sogs pa dkon mchog gsum la bsam pa

K10D0239_H0240:230b-21: bdag cag deng phyin chad de dag gi skyabs mi bya'o //

K10D0239_H0240:230b-25: slid kyang mi bsrung ngo zhes zer te lha dang /

K10D0239_H0240:230b-28: la mi skyo ba mi 'go ste yal bar gtong
K10D0239_H0240:230b-29: ngo // de bas na rgyal rigs gdol ba can la sogs pa'i yul dang /

K10D0239_H0240:231a-7: bsod nams kyi zhing du 'gyur ba thams cad kyis

K10D0239_H0240:231a-13: phyi'i dgra gnyi ga ldang ste /

K10D0239_H0240:231a-15: nad dang; mu ge la sogs pa'ang de'i dbang gis 'byung ngo //

K10D0239_H0240:231a-29: 'dzem pa med par mchod rten gyi nor dang /

K10D0239_H0240:231b-2: dmangs gcig la gcig gnod pa byed cing 'kho na dang /

K10D0239_H0240:231b-5: g-yul sprod pa na'ang 'og ma sems mi mthun pa'i phyir g-yul yang nyes par 'gyur ro //

K10D0239_H0240:231b-29: glen pa gti mug can shes pa snyems pa /

K10D0239_H0240:232a-9: snyam du bdag las mkhas shing shes pa med do

K10D0239_H0240:232a-18: bar glen po'i rang bzhin can du gyur pas 'di
K10D0239_H0240:232a-19: snyam du bdag las shes shes mkhas pa med do

K10D0239_H0240:233b-12: ma 'dod pa nyung zhing chog shes pa /

K10D0239_H0240:238b-27: te / ces smras so // drang srong chen po'i rgyal mtshan na bza' 'di //
K10D0239_H0240:239a-0: mkhas pa thams cad shin tu @239a *//

K10D0239_H0240:239a-16: thal mo sbyar nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa
K10D0239_H0240:239a-17: / khyod ni drang srong chen po'i gos gyon te //
K10D0239_H0240:239a-18: shin tu bsod nams zhing du gyur pa yin //
K10D0239_H0240:239a-19: de bas bdag cag khyod la mchod pas na //
K10D0239_H0240:239a-20: srid pa'i bcings pa las ni thar bar shog /
K10D0239_H0240:239a-21: de'i tshe na'ang srin mo chen mo mtshon cha'i gdong
K10D0239_H0240:239a-22: zhes bya ba'ang 'khor lnga stong dang bcas te dur
K10D0239_H0240:239a-24: srin mo des kyang mi de bcing ba lngas bcings pa skra dang /
K10D0239_H0240:239a-25: kha spu bregs pa chos gos kyi tshal bu mgul du btags pa mthong nas bskor te /
K10D0239_H0240:239a-26: bsti stang dang bcas pas phyag btsal nas thal mo
K10D0239_H0240:239b-0: sbyar te tshigs su bcad pas 'di skad ces @239b
K10D0239_H0240:239b-1: smras so // khyod ni btags pa'i chos gos gyon pas na //
K10D0239_H0240:239b-2: mya ngan 'da' ba'i bde ba thob tu nges //
K10D0239_H0240:239b-3: de bas khyod la bdag cag gnod byed na //
K10D0239_H0240:239b-4: sangs rgyas kun gyis rnam par smod kyis dogs //

K10D0239_H0240:239b-6: bdag cag rtag tu mi yi mdangs 'phrog cing //

K10D0239_H0240:239b-11: ji ste skra dang kha spu bregs pa yi //
K10D0239_H0240:239b-12: chos gos gyon pa 'di la gnod byas na //
K10D0239_H0240:239b-13: nges par mtshams med sems can dmyal bar ltung //
K10D0239_H0240:239b-14: yun ring sdug bsngal chen po'i snod du 'gyur //
K10D0239_H0240:239b-15: de nas srin mo bu rnams dang 'khor du bcas
K10D0239_H0240:239b-16: pas bskor nas bsti stang dang bcas pas phyag btsal
K10D0239_H0240:239b-17: te / thal mo sbyar nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K10D0239_H0240:239b-18: bdag cag sems can dmyal bas rab 'jigs te //
K10D0239_H0240:239b-19: de bas khyod kyi srog la gnod mi bgyid //
K10D0239_H0240:239b-20: bcings pa 'di yang bkrol te khyod btang gi /
K10D0239_H0240:239b-21: dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal kun las thar bar shog /
K10D0239_H0240:239b-22: de'i tshe srin mo bu smad 'khor dang bcas pa
K10D0239_H0240:239b-23: snying rje'i sems bskyed nas mi de'i bcings pa bkrol
K10D0239_H0240:239b-25: spro ba bskyed pa byas nas phyir btang ngo //

K10D0239_H0240:239b-27: du 'ongs nas dngos po de dag rgyus kyis zhib
K10D0239_H0240:240a-0: tu gsol to // de'i tshe rgyal po dgra las @240a *//
K10D0239_H0240:240a-1: rgyal ba 'khor dang bcas pas de skad thos nas
K10D0239_H0240:240a-2: dngangs te ngo mtshar rmad du gyur nas khrims su
K10D0239_H0240:240a-3: bcas te yul gyi mi rnams la bkar btags pa
K10D0239_H0240:240a-4: / deng phyin chad nga'i yul na gnas pa sangs rgyas kyi slob ma tshul khrims srung ngam /
K10D0239_H0240:240a-6: chung ngu na tshul khrims med par skra dang /
K10D0239_H0240:240a-7: kha spu bregs te dur smrig gyon pa la su
K10D0239_H0240:240a-8: zhig kyal ka 'am; gnod pa byas na thams cad
K10D0239_H0240:240a-9: gsad do zhes khrims su bcas so //
K10D0239_H0240:240a-10: de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis mi mang po'ang bsod nams
K10D0239_H0240:240a-11: la dga' bas thams cad bags kyis bstan pa la
K10D0239_H0240:240a-12: phyogs nas dzambu'i gling na rgyal po de dbang ba'i
K10D0239_H0240:240a-13: mi thams cad bsam pa des pas dkon mchog gsum
K10D0239_H0240:240a-16: de ltar 'das pa'i dus na srin mo yi dvags kyi rgyud du skyes pa /
K10D0239_H0240:240a-21: snying rje med pa'ang de lta bu'i tshul khrims med ba skra dang /
K10D0239_H0240:240a-22: kha sbu bregs pa chos gos kyi tshal bu mgul du btags pa de la bskor ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:240a-27: tshigs su bcad pas bstod de /
K10D0239_H0240:240a-28: gnod pa byed pa'i sems med na phyi ma ma
K10D0239_H0240:240a-29: 'ongs pa'i dus su rgyal rigs gdol pa can dang
K10D0239_H0240:240a-34: bram ze gdol pa can la sogs pa gdug pa'i sems 'chang zhing snying rje med pa /
K10D0239_H0240:240b-1: srin po bas thu bar sdig pa byed do //
K10D0239_H0240:240b-2: glen zhing gti mug can dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs
K10D0239_H0240:240b-3: su gcod pa de nga'i bstan ba la rab tu
K10D0239_H0240:240b-4: byung ba'i chos kyi snod du gyur pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:240b-5: chos kyi snod du ma gyur pa'ang rung /
K10D0239_H0240:240b-7: kha spu bregs te gos ngur smig gyon pa'i slob ma la dad pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:240b-11: nan la 'dor zhing btson rar gzhug pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:240b-12: 'tsho ba'i dbang po dang phral ba'i bar du byed pa de ni 'das pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:240b-14: da ltar gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad
K10D0239_H0240:240b-15: kyis bstan pa'i kha na ma tho ba chen po
K10D0239_H0240:240b-17: dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsregs nas rgyun bcad
K10D0239_H0240:240b-18: bas gdon mi za bar mtshams med pa'i sems can
K10D0239_H0240:240b-19: dmyal ba chen por ltung bar 'gyur bas mkhas pa
K10D0239_H0240:240b-20: rnams kyis yongs su sdang bar bya'o //
K10D0239_H0240:240b-22: sngon rgyal po bsod nams chen bo zhes bya ba zhig yod de /
K10D0239_H0240:240b-23: rgyal po de snying rje che bas nyes pa byas
K10D0239_H0240:240b-24: pas gsad pa la thug pa dag kyang gsod du
K10D0239_H0240:240b-25: mi dga'o // de'i tshe blon po blo dang ldan
K10D0239_H0240:240b-26: pa gcig gis rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol
K10D0239_H0240:240b-29: rgyal pos kyang srog gcod pa'i sdig pa mi 'thob la /
K10D0239_H0240:240b-30: gshed mas kyang 'gum mi 'tshal bar mi de 'gum
K10D0239_H0240:240b-31: pa'i thabs mchis so zhes gsol nas blon po chen
K10D0239_H0240:241a-0: po des gsad pa la thug pa'i mi de @241a
K10D0239_H0240:241a-1: *// bal glang rmis pa ma rungs pa'i mdun du bzhag go /
K10D0239_H0240:241a-2: de nas bal glang rmis pa des mi de snas
K10D0239_H0240:241a-3: bzung ste mar bteg nas sa la brdabs ba las
K10D0239_H0240:241a-4: / mi de gos dmar po gyon pa mthong nas chos gos yin no snyam ste /
K10D0239_H0240:241a-5: bsam pa dag pa'i dad pa skyes nas dal gyis
K10D0239_H0240:241a-6: sa la bzhag cing de la 'gyod nas sa la
K10D0239_H0240:241a-7: btud te / mi de'i rkang ba la snas 'phye
K10D0239_H0240:241a-8: zhing bsti stang dang bcas pas mig mi 'dzum par
K10D0239_H0240:241a-10: blon po chen po des de lta bur gyur ba mthong nas brgyugs te /
K10D0239_H0240:241a-11: rgyal po de la de bzhin du gsol to //
K10D0239_H0240:241a-12: rgyal pos de skad ces thos nas dngangs te ngo mtshar rmad du gyur nas /
K10D0239_H0240:241a-13: mi yongs la deng phyin chad dkon mchog gsum la bsti stang gyis shig par bkas btags so //
K10D0239_H0240:241a-14: de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis srog gcod pa'ang spangs te dzambu'i gling la dbang byed par gyur to //
K10D0239_H0240:241a-16: de ltar 'das pa'i dus na bal glang rmis pa
K10D0239_H0240:241a-17: byol song gi skye gnas su gyur pa'ang chos gos
K10D0239_H0240:241a-18: la gus pas sdig pa mi byed na /
K10D0239_H0240:241a-19: ma 'ongs pa'i dus na rgyal rigs gdol ba can dang /
K10D0239_H0240:241a-24: bram ze gdol pa can la sogs pa sems gdugs pa can snying rje'i sems med pa /
K10D0239_H0240:241a-25: bal glang rmis pa bas thu bar sdig pa'i las byed do //
K10D0239_H0240:241a-26: bus pa glen pa can de dag nga'i bstan pa
K10D0239_H0240:241b-0: la rab tu byung ba chos kyi snod du @241b
K10D0239_H0240:241b-1: gyur pa'am / chos kyi snod ma yin pa'ang rung /
K10D0239_H0240:241b-3: kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig gyon pa la dad pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:241b-7: gzhu zhing 'tshog ba dang; btson rar gzhug pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:241b-8: 'tsho ba'i dbang po dang phral ba'i bar du byed pa las 'das pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:241b-10: da ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams
K10D0239_H0240:241b-11: cad kyi bstan pa'i kha na ma tho ba chen
K10D0239_H0240:241b-12: po dang 'gal bar byed pas dge ba'i rtsa ba
K10D0239_H0240:241b-13: bsregs nas rgyun gcad pas gdon mi za bar mtshams
K10D0239_H0240:241b-14: med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen por ltung bar
K10D0239_H0240:241b-15: 'gyur bas mkhas pa rnams kyis spang bar bya'o //
K10D0239_H0240:241b-16: gal te rgyal rigs gdol pa can nas dge sbyong dang /
K10D0239_H0240:241b-17: bram ze gdol pa can gyi bar du sdig pa'i 'khor lo gsum po 'di dang ldan pas /
K10D0239_H0240:241b-18: de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis yul srung ba'i lha dang /
K10D0239_H0240:241b-20: gnod sbyin la sogs pa dkon mchog gsum la bsam
K10D0239_H0240:241b-21: pa dag cing dad pa mi phyed pa thams cad
K10D0239_H0240:241b-22: rgyal rigs gdol pa can nas dge sbyong dang /
K10D0239_H0240:241b-23: bram ze gdol pa can gyi bar du gdol pa
K10D0239_H0240:241b-24: de dag la khro zhing zhe sdang ba'i sems skye
K10D0239_H0240:241b-25: ba nas gzhung de bzhin du rgyas par rgyal rigs
K10D0239_H0240:241b-31: bram ze la sogs pa gdol pa can de dag
K10D0239_H0240:241b-32: thams cad ring po mi thogs par lus kyi yan
K10D0239_H0240:241b-33: lag du ma bur chad cing zhag mang du lce
K10D0239_H0240:242a-1: shin tu mi bzad pa'i nab dang /
K10D0239_H0240:242a-2: tsha ba'i sdug bsngal chen po myong bar 'gyur ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:242a-3: 'chi 'phos nas kyang mtshams med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen por ltung bar 'gyur ro //
K10D0239_H0240:242a-6: phyi ma ma 'ongs pa'i dus na sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir rgyal rigs gdol pa can dang /
K10D0239_H0240:242a-11: bram ze gdol pa can la sogs pa sdig pa'i bshes gnyen la sten pa /
K10D0239_H0240:242a-12: dge ba'i rtsa ba chung zhing zhan pa nas de
K10D0239_H0240:242a-13: bzhin du rgyas par 'jig rten phyi ma'i sdug bsngal
K10D0239_H0240:242a-14: ma mthong ba dag phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi nor
K10D0239_H0240:242a-15: dang / gtsug lag khang gi nor dang /
K10D0239_H0240:242a-16: gtsug lag khang du bsngos ba'i nor dang /
K10D0239_H0240:242a-17: skyed shing gi ra ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:242a-18: skyed shing gi ra bar bsngos pa'i nor dang /
K10D0239_H0240:242a-20: zhing 'brog tu bsngos pa'i nor dang /
K10D0239_H0240:242a-21: gtsug lag khang so so'i rung bar byed par gtogs pa'i skyes pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:242a-28: nad kyi rkyen sman phrogs pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:242a-29: de ma yin pa'i 'tsho ba'i yo byad rnam pa sna tshogs la 'phrog pa ste /
K10D0239_H0240:242a-30: de ltar phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun la phul ba'i nor de ni tshul khrims dang ldan pa /
K10D0239_H0240:242b-1: mi slob pa la nan tan du byed pa nas
K10D0239_H0240:242b-2: mtha'i gnas byas pa'i 'bras bu thob pa'i bar gyi
K10D0239_H0240:242b-3: dge slong yongs su dag pa spyod du gnang bar
K10D0239_H0240:242b-4: zad na / rgyal rigs gdol pa can nas dge sbyong dang /
K10D0239_H0240:242b-5: bram ze gdol pa can gyi bar du gdol ba can de dag gis mthu dang /
K10D0239_H0240:242b-6: dpung snyems te nan gyis phrogs nas /
K10D0239_H0240:242b-7: dge slong tshul khrims dang ldan pa yongs su dag pa dag ni spyod du mi ster gyi /
K10D0239_H0240:242b-8: tshul khrims nyams pa sdig pa spyod pa'i dge slong
K10D0239_H0240:242b-9: khyim na gnas shing khyim pa'i las byed pa dag
K10D0239_H0240:242b-10: la byin nas kha cig ni thun mong du spyod
K10D0239_H0240:242b-11: / kha cig ni khud par yang spyod do //
K10D0239_H0240:242b-12: tshul khrims nyams pa'i dge slong dag gis de dag
K10D0239_H0240:242b-13: thos nas kyang kha cig ni thun mong du spyod
K10D0239_H0240:242b-14: / kha cig ni khud par yang spyod do //
K10D0239_H0240:242b-15: kha cig ni khyim pa la byin nas de dang yang thun mong du spyod do //
K10D0239_H0240:242b-16: de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis yul srung ba'i lha dang /
K10D0239_H0240:242b-18: gnod sbyin la sogs pa dkon mchog gsum la bsam
K10D0239_H0240:242b-19: pa dag cing dad pa mi byed pa dag rgyal
K10D0239_H0240:242b-20: rigs gdol pa can nas dge sbyong dang; bram ze
K10D0239_H0240:242b-21: gdol pa can gyi bar du gdol pa can de
K10D0239_H0240:242b-22: dag la khros te zhe sdang gi sems skye ba
K10D0239_H0240:242b-23: nas de bzhin du rgyas par rgyal rigs gdol pa
K10D0239_H0240:242b-25: khyim bdag dang; tshong dpon dang /
K10D0239_H0240:242b-27: bram ze la sogs pa gdol pa can de dag
K10D0239_H0240:242b-28: ring po mi thogs par lus kyi yan lag dum
K10D0239_H0240:242b-30: zhag mang du lce ldibs pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:243a-1: tu mi bzad pa'i na ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:243a-2: tsha ba'i sdug bsngal chen po myong zhing 'chi 'phos
K10D0239_H0240:243a-3: nas kyang gdon mi za bar mtshams med pa'i sems
K10D0239_H0240:243a-4: can dmyal ba chen por ltung bar 'gyur ro //
K10D0239_H0240:243a-7: ma 'ongs pa'i dus na sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir rgyal rigs gdol ba can dang /
K10D0239_H0240:243a-11: dge sbyong dang; bram ze gdol pa can la sogs
K10D0239_H0240:243a-12: pa sdig pa'i bshes gnyen la sten pa dge ba'i
K10D0239_H0240:243a-13: rtsa ba chung zhing zhan pa nas de bzhin du
K10D0239_H0240:243a-14: rgyas par 'jig rten phyi ma'i sdug bsngal gyi 'bras
K10D0239_H0240:243a-15: bu ma mthong ba dag gis nga'i bstan pa la
K10D0239_H0240:243a-17: shes rab rno ba mang du thos pa /
K10D0239_H0240:243a-19: don rdzogs par smra ba dang ldan pa /
K10D0239_H0240:243a-20: nyan thos kyi theg pa'i chos ston nus pa'am /

K10D0239_H0240:258a-7: ji ltar rlung gis 'jig pa byung ste //
K10D0239_H0240:258a-8: ri rnams thams cad 'jig pa bzhin du //
K10D0239_H0240:258a-9: nga yi chos la srung ba de yang; ;kun nas nyon mongs thams cad 'joms 'gyur //
K10D0239_H0240:258a-10: ji ltar chu yi 'jig pa byung tshe //
K10D0239_H0240:258a-11: sa chen chu yis g-yengs te 'jig 'gyur //
K10D0239_H0240:258a-12: de bzhin nga yi chos srung ba yang //
K10D0239_H0240:258a-14: ji ltar rin chen yid bzhin nor bus //
K10D0239_H0240:258a-15: 'dod pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs byed //
K10D0239_H0240:258a-16: de bzhin theg pa gsum gyi chos kyang //
K10D0239_H0240:258a-17: sems can kun gyi smon pa rdzogs byed //
K10D0239_H0240:258a-18: gang gis bum pa bzang po rnyed na //
K10D0239_H0240:258a-19: dbul dang bral te bde skyid thob 'gyur //
K10D0239_H0240:258a-20: de bzhin sangs rgyas chos dang phrad pa //
K10D0239_H0240:258a-21: the tshom gcod cing byang chub thob 'gyur /
K10D0239_H0240:258a-22: ji ltar bco lnga'i zla ba nya na //
K10D0239_H0240:258a-23: 'od kyis nam mkha' thams cad kun snang //
K10D0239_H0240:258a-24: de bzhin chos srung ba yi gang zag /
K10D0239_H0240:258a-25: shes rab kyis chos dbyings kun khyab //
K10D0239_H0240:258a-26: ji ltar nam mkha' kun tu mnyam la //
K10D0239_H0240:258a-27: rdzas kyang med cing mtshan ma med pa //
K10D0239_H0240:258a-28: de bzhin chos srung ba yi gang zag /
K10D0239_H0240:258a-29: thams cad chos ni ro gcig par shes //
K10D0239_H0240:258a-30: ji ltar nyi ma'i 'od ni bkye ba //
K10D0239_H0240:258b-0: 'jig rten mun pa @258b thams cad kun sel //
K10D0239_H0240:258b-1: de bzhin chos srung ba yi gang zag /
K10D0239_H0240:258b-2: rtag tu 'jig rten kun tu bde byed //
K10D0239_H0240:258b-3: shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo sa'i snying po 'khor lo bcu pa zhes bya ba las /
K10D0239_H0240:258b-4: gnas shing spyad par mi bya ba'i le'u ste gsum mo ////
K10D0239_H0240:258b-5: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
K10D0239_H0240:258b-6: rdo rje snying po zhes bya ba 'khor gyi dkyil
K10D0239_H0240:258b-7: 'khor de'i nang na 'dug pa las langs te /

K10D0239_H0240:258b-12: 'phags pa'i snod min pa yis sras ma yin zhes gsungs //
K10D0239_H0240:258b-13: dge sbyong chos nyid spangs shing thal ba 'dra ba
K10D0239_H0240:258b-14: dag ;nga yi rnam dag 'khor 'dir gnas pa mdzes
K10D0239_H0240:258b-15: pa min // dri ma gsum gyis bsgos shing 'gog dang lam stor ba'i //
K10D0239_H0240:258b-16: khyad par can gyi mchod pa gang yang des mi zhu //
K10D0239_H0240:258b-17: phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun dbang bar bsngos pa'i nor dag la //
K10D0239_H0240:258b-18: cha shas cung zad tsam yang spyod du ngas ma gnang //
K10D0239_H0240:258b-19: tshul khrims rtsa ba bzhi las gcig tsam nyams pa dag /
K10D0239_H0240:258b-20: dge 'dun 'khor du mi chud rgya mtsho'i ro dang mtshungs //
K10D0239_H0240:258b-21: ci yi slad du deng 'dir dge slong sdig can la //
K10D0239_H0240:258b-22: snying rjes dang du blangs te chad pas mi gcod par //
K10D0239_H0240:258b-23: phyir yang de la mchod pa byos zhes skul mdzad cing //
K10D0239_H0240:259a-1: snying rje can gyis ngan sems yongs spongs la //
K10D0239_H0240:259a-2: de la bsti stang bcas te bstan pa'i chos mnyan na //
K10D0239_H0240:259a-3: bsod nams ye shes tshogs thob snying rje chen po can //
K10D0239_H0240:259a-4: mngon shes 'jig rten skyong bas mdo sde gzhan dag la //
K10D0239_H0240:259a-5: phra la zab par gyur pa'i yang dag byang chub lam //
K10D0239_H0240:259a-6: theg pa chen po de la khyed kyis dad byas shing //
K10D0239_H0240:259a-7: theg pa gnyis kyis grol ba'i lam de spongs zhes gsungs //
K10D0239_H0240:259a-8: ci yi slad du deng 'dir theg pa gsum bshad de //
K10D0239_H0240:259a-9: kun gyis de la nyan cing mchod pa bgyi bar bskul //
K10D0239_H0240:259a-10: dbang po stobs dang byang chub dge sbyong 'bras bu yang //
K10D0239_H0240:259a-11: mdo sde 'di las 'byung gi gzhan du gsungs pa med //
K10D0239_H0240:259a-12: dpe med 'phags pa'i lam ni yan lag brgyad pa 'dir //
K10D0239_H0240:259a-13: theg pa rnam gsum kun kyang lam der 'jug byed
K10D0239_H0240:259a-14: de; ;rnam par grol bar 'dod pas brtson 'grus rab
K10D0239_H0240:259a-15: bskyed na // so sor re ba bzhin du byang chub 'thob par 'gyur //
K10D0239_H0240:259a-16: 'gro ba kun gyis gtso bos 'di dag rnam dbye ba /
K10D0239_H0240:259a-17: snga phyir bstan pa 'di dag mi 'gal bstan pa na //
K10D0239_H0240:259a-18: lha dang mi dang byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor thams cad //

K10D0239_H0240:259a-20: theg pa chen po bshad pas gang la phan 'gyur dang //
K10D0239_H0240:259a-21: theg pa chen po bshad pas gang la gnod par 'gyur //
K10D0239_H0240:259a-22: nyan thos theg pas rnam par grol ba bcu po'i sa //
