K10D0239_H0240:259b-1: gang zhig chos 'di thos pas gong nas gong du 'phar //
K10D0239_H0240:259b-2: gang gis chos 'di thos pas phyir zhing ltung bar 'gyur //
K10D0239_H0240:259b-3: ji ltar 'dus byas kun gyi skyon gyis skyo bas na //
K10D0239_H0240:259b-4: rga dang 'chi ba'i rgya mtsho myur du skems par 'gyur //
K10D0239_H0240:259b-5: nyin mtshan dge ba rnams la shin tu brtson pa dag /
K10D0239_H0240:259b-6: don mchog gang la gnas shing theg pa gang bgrod pas //
K10D0239_H0240:259b-7: shin tu yangs shing zab pa'i chu bo bzhi las sgrol //
K10D0239_H0240:259b-8: 'jig rten skyong bas rnam par phye ste kun srungs shig /

K10D0239_H0240:259b-10: sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying po la 'di
K10D0239_H0240:259b-11: skad ces bka' stsal to; ;legs so //
K10D0239_H0240:259b-14: khyod skye bo tshad med pa la phan pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:259b-15: bde ba'i don gyi phyir lha dang /
K10D0239_H0240:259b-17: lha ma yin la sogs pa'i don chen po'i phyir
K10D0239_H0240:259b-18: de bzhin gshegs pa la shin tu zab mo'i don

K10D0239_H0240:259b-21: ngas khyod la rnam par phye ste bshad do zhes bka' stsal nas /
K10D0239_H0240:259b-22: byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying pos bcom ldan 'das la slar nyan to //
K10D0239_H0240:259b-23: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10D0239_H0240:259b-25: gang zag rnam pa bcu po 'di dag ni 'khor
K10D0239_H0240:259b-26: bar 'khor zhing mi lus shin tu rnyed par dka'o
K10D0239_H0240:259b-27: // gang zag rnam pa bcu gang zhen /

K10D0239_H0240:260b-13: spyad par mi bya ba dag byed do //

K10D0239_H0240:261a-6: bya ba thams cad kyi nang du mi chud la

K10D0239_H0240:261b-0: 'di ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i snod @261b dang ldan pa'o //

K10D0239_H0240:264a-18: slong kha cig ni lam ston pa'i dge slong gi

K10D0239_H0240:272b-9: pa chen po pa'o zhes khas 'che ba de dag
K10D0239_H0240:272b-10: nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i
K10D0239_H0240:272b-11: chos kyi snod du'ang ma gyur na bla na med
K10D0239_H0240:272b-12: pa theg pa chen po'i chos kyi snod du gyur
K10D0239_H0240:272b-17: mchod pa 'dod pa'i phyir 'jig rten pa glen zhing
K10D0239_H0240:272b-18: gti mug can thams cad bslus nas bdag ni theg
K10D0239_H0240:272b-19: pa chen po pa'o zhes zer te /
K10D0239_H0240:272b-20: de bzhin gshegs pa'i theg pa gnyis kyi dam pa'i chos la 'phya zhing bskur ba 'debs so //
K10D0239_H0240:272b-21: de ltar gang zag glen zhing gti mug can g-yo dang /
K10D0239_H0240:272b-22: sgyus 'tsho zhing nge rgyal gyis mngon par zin pa ser sna dang /
K10D0239_H0240:272b-24: 'dod chags kyis kun nas bslang bas de'i rgyu de'i
K10D0239_H0240:272b-25: rkyen gyis nga'i chos kyi mig ma rung ba dang
K10D0239_H0240:272b-26: / myur du med par byas so //
K10D0239_H0240:272b-27: des ni dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
K10D0239_H0240:272b-28: thams cad kyi dam tshig las 'gal ba'i kha na
K10D0239_H0240:272b-29: ma tho ba chen po byed pa yin no //
K10D0239_H0240:272b-30: dus gsum gyi byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi
K10D0239_H0240:272b-31: dam tshig las 'gal ba'i kha na ma tho ba
K10D0239_H0240:272b-32: chen po byas pa yin no //
K10D0239_H0240:273a-1: gyi nyan thos thams cad kyi dam tshig las 'gal
K10D0239_H0240:273a-2: ba'i kha na ma tho ba chen po'i sdig byed
K10D0239_H0240:273a-3: pa yin te / ring po mi thogs par lus
K10D0239_H0240:273a-4: kyi yan lag kun zhig pa dang; nad ma rungs
K10D0239_H0240:273a-5: pa chen po rnam pa mang pos btab par 'gyur
K10D0239_H0240:273a-6: pa yin te / ro // rgyal rigs gdol ba can nas rje'u rigs dang /
K10D0239_H0240:273a-8: gdol ba can gyi skyes pa'am /
K10D0239_H0240:273a-9: bud med 'di dag thams cad sdig pa'i las byed
K10D0239_H0240:273a-10: cing phyin ci log tu lta ba'i dbang gis dge
K10D0239_H0240:273a-11: ba'i rtsa ba thams cad bcad pa bas /
K10D0239_H0240:273a-12: gal te dus gzhan du sbyin pa'i bsod nams mang
K10D0239_H0240:273a-13: du byas su zin kyang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na
K10D0239_H0240:273a-15: byol song gi khams su skye ste phyug po'i bde ba myong bar mi 'gyur ro //
K10D0239_H0240:273a-16: lus de nyid kyi gzugs dang /
K10D0239_H0240:273a-17: gzugs med pa'i khams su skye ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ngu'ang bskyed mi nus na /
K10D0239_H0240:273a-20: bla na med pa'i theg pa chen po lhun gyis
K10D0239_H0240:273a-21: grub pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes
K10D0239_H0240:273a-22: kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sa bon skyed pa lta
K10D0239_H0240:273a-24: de'i lce la rtag tu nad kyis gnon par 'gyur zhing /
K10D0239_H0240:273a-25: nyin zhag du mar lce lkugs shing smra mi nus pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:273a-26: shin tu mi bzad pa'i na ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:273a-27: tsha ba'i sdug bsngal chen po myong ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:273a-28: 'chi 'phos nas kyang mtshams med pa'i sems can dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur ro //
K10D0239_H0240:273b-0: de bas na de bzhin gshegs pas rgyal rigs dge ba @273b nas rje'u rigs dang /
K10D0239_H0240:273b-1: dmangs rigs la sogs pa'i skyes pa'am /
K10D0239_H0240:273b-2: bud med de dag la yun ring por phan pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:273b-3: bde ba'i don gyi phyir yang dang /
K10D0239_H0240:273b-5: khyed kyis nga'i bstan pa la skra dang /
K10D0239_H0240:273b-6: kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig gi tshal bu
K10D0239_H0240:273b-7: gyon cing rab tu byung ba la gnod pa dang
K10D0239_H0240:273b-8: / gshe zhing spyo ba la sogs pa ma byed cig /
K10D0239_H0240:273b-9: ngas bstan pa'i theg pa gsum gyi dam pa'i chos la 'phya zhing skur ba 'debs pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:273b-12: bgegs ma byed cig ces gsungs so //
K10D0239_H0240:273b-13: ngas bstan pa las ched du 'gal bar byas na
K10D0239_H0240:273b-14: [?] sdig pa'i rnam par smin pa ni ji ltar
K10D0239_H0240:273b-15: rgyas par bshad pa bzhin no //
K10D0239_H0240:273b-17: nga'i bstan pa la skyabs su song ste /
K10D0239_H0240:273b-19: kha spu bregs nas gos ngur smrig gyon cing rab
K10D0239_H0240:273b-20: tu byung ba'i cha lugs can de la 'das pa
K10D0239_H0240:273b-22: da ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang /
K10D0239_H0240:273b-23: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis thugs rje chen po'i byin gyi rlabs kyis yongs su bzung ba'o //
K10D0239_H0240:273b-25: kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig gyon cing rab
K10D0239_H0240:273b-26: tu byung ba'i spyod lam can de ni 'phags pa
K10D0239_H0240:273b-27: rnams kyi rnam par grol ba'i rgyal mtshan yin no
K10D0239_H0240:273b-28: // nyan thos thams cad kyis rnam par grol bas
K10D0239_H0240:273b-29: longs spyod pa'i chos kyi ro'i rgyal mtshan yin no
K10D0239_H0240:273b-30: // // rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa thams cad
K10D0239_H0240:273b-31: kyis rnam par grol ba'i longs spyod pa'i chos kyi
K10D0239_H0240:274a-1: theg pa chen po pa thams cad kyis rnam par
K10D0239_H0240:274a-2: grol bas longs spyod pa'i chos kyi ro'i rgyal mtshan
K10D0239_H0240:274a-3: yin no // de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i theg pa gsum gyi dam pa'i chos yin no //
K10D0239_H0240:274a-4: dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas dang /
K10D0239_H0240:274a-5: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi thugs rje chen
K10D0239_H0240:274a-6: po'i byin gyi rlabs kyis yongs su bzung ba yin
K10D0239_H0240:274a-7: no // 'phags pa rnams kyi rnam par grol ba'i gnas yin no //
K10D0239_H0240:274a-8: nyan thos kyi theg pa ba thams cad kyi rnam
K10D0239_H0240:274a-9: par grol bas longs spyod pa'i chos kyi ro'i gnas
K10D0239_H0240:274a-10: yin no; ;rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams
K10D0239_H0240:274a-11: cad kyis rnam par grol bas longs spyod pa'i chos
K10D0239_H0240:274a-13: theg pa chen po pa thams cad kyis rnam par
K10D0239_H0240:274a-14: grol bas longs spyod pa'i chos kyi ro'i gnas yin
K10D0239_H0240:274a-16: de lta bas na rnam par grol ba tshol ba
K10D0239_H0240:274a-17: dag nga'i bstan pa la skyabs su song ba skra
K10D0239_H0240:274a-18: dang / kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig gyon
K10D0239_H0240:274a-19: pa rab tu byung ba'i gang zag la bsnyen bkur
K10D0239_H0240:274a-22: bdag gis sngar nyan thos kyi theg pa'i chos la dad de /
K10D0239_H0240:274a-23: bdag nyan cing gzungs su 'dzin na gzhan yang nyan cing 'dzin du gzhug go /
K10D0239_H0240:274a-24: bdag klog cing kha ton byed na gzhan yang klog cing 'don du gzhug go /
K10D0239_H0240:274b-0: bdag glegs ba ma du 'dri na gzhan yang glegs bam du 'drir @274b gzhug go /
K10D0239_H0240:274b-1: bdag sbyin pa byed na gzhan yang sbyin pa byed du gzhug go /
K10D0239_H0240:274b-2: bdag ston cing 'chad na gzhan yang ston cing 'chad pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:274b-5: rgya cher spel du gzhug go /
K10D0239_H0240:274b-6: ji ltar rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i chos la dad cing yid ches te /
K10D0239_H0240:274b-7: bdag nyan cing gzungs su 'dzin na gzhan yang nyan cing 'dzin du gzhug go /
K10D0239_H0240:274b-8: bdag klog cing kha ton byed na gzhan yang klog cing 'don du gzhug go /
K10D0239_H0240:274b-9: bdag glegs bam du 'dri na gzhan yang glegs bam du 'drir gzhug go /
K10D0239_H0240:274b-10: bdag sbyin pa byed na gzhan yang sbyin pa byed du gzhug go /
K10D0239_H0240:274b-11: bdag ston cing 'chad na gzhan yang ston cing 'chad pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:274b-14: rgya cher sprel du gzhug go /
K10D0239_H0240:274b-15: 'di ltar theg pa chen po la dad cing yid ches te /
K10D0239_H0240:274b-16: bdag nyan cing gzungs su 'dzin na gzhan yang nyan cing 'dzin du gzhug go /
K10D0239_H0240:274b-17: bdag klog cing kha ton byed na gzhan yang klog cing 'don du gzhug go /
K10D0239_H0240:274b-18: bdag glegs bam du 'dri na gzhan yang glegs bam du 'drir gzhug go /
K10D0239_H0240:274b-19: bdag sbyin pa byed na gzhan yang sbyin pa byed du gzhug go /
K10D0239_H0240:274b-20: bdag ston cing 'chad na gzhan yang ston cing 'chad pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:274b-23: rgya cher spel du gzhug go /
K10D0239_H0240:274b-24: gal te snod du ma gyur na bdag kyang mi nyan /
K10D0239_H0240:274b-25: gzhan yang nyan du mi gzhug pa nas gzhung de bzhin du rgyas par bshad pa bzhin no //
K10D0239_H0240:275a-2: sdig pa'i grogs po spang ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:275a-3: dge ba'i bshes gnyen la sten pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:275a-4: pha rol tu phyin pa drug la brtson zhing su
K10D0239_H0240:275a-5: nan tan byed pa dang mi dge ba'i las thams
K10D0239_H0240:275a-6: cad yang dang / yang 'gyod cing mthol ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:275a-7: ci la mos pa bzhin du yang dag pa'i smon lam gdab par bya'o //
K10D0239_H0240:275a-8: gang de ltar byed pa ni lus 'di nyid kyis nyan thos kyi theg pa'i snod du'ang 'gyur la /
K10D0239_H0240:275a-9: rang sangs rgyas kyi rigs las kyang phyir mi ldog /
K10D0239_H0240:275a-10: theg pa chen po'i rigs las kyang phyir mi ldog pa'i gnas yod do //
K10D0239_H0240:275a-11: de bas na theg pa gsum char la'ang bslab cing nan tan bya yi /
K10D0239_H0240:275a-12: nga rgyal gyis theg pa chen po pa'o zhes khas 'che zhing /
K10D0239_H0240:275a-13: nyan thos kyi theg pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:275a-14: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i chos la 'phya zhing skur bar mi bya'o //
K10D0239_H0240:275a-15: ngas sngon theg pa chen po'i chos kyi snod du
K10D0239_H0240:275a-16: gyur pa brtan par spyod pa 'ba' zhig la de
K10D0239_H0240:275a-17: skad du theg pa chen po sgom pa 'ba' zhig
K10D0239_H0240:275a-18: gis mtha'i gnas byed par 'gyur ro zhes bshad pa
K10D0239_H0240:275a-20: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di dag gsal
K10D0239_H0240:275a-21: bar bzlas pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa 'di gsungs
K10D0239_H0240:275a-22: so // 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i mngon sum //
K10D0239_H0240:275a-23: rdo rje'i snying pos nga la zhus pa //
K10D0239_H0240:275a-24: tshul khrims nyams pa'i dge slong dag la //
K10D0239_H0240:275a-25: ci phyir mchod pa gyis shig ces skul //
K10D0239_H0240:275a-26: sbyangs pa'i yon tan kun kyang nyams nas //
K10D0239_H0240:275b-0: glen zhing @275b ngan par lta ba 'dzin pa //
K10D0239_H0240:275b-1: chos kyi snod min lam sun 'byin la //
K10D0239_H0240:275b-2: spyo 'am chad pas gcad du mi gnang //
K10D0239_H0240:275b-3: de las theg pa gsum gyi dam chos //
K10D0239_H0240:275b-4: yang dag pa yi rnam par grol ba //
K10D0239_H0240:275b-5: sman bzang lta bu bshad pa thos na //
K10D0239_H0240:275b-6: zhi ba'i mya ngan 'das 'gyur zhes gsungs //
K10D0239_H0240:275b-7: ci yi phyir na mdo sde gzhan las //
K10D0239_H0240:275b-8: theg pa chen po gcig gi 'grol 'gyur //
K10D0239_H0240:275b-9: theg pa gnyis kyi chos la slob spangs //
K10D0239_H0240:275b-10: yang 'dir theg pa gsum bshad ci phyir //
K10D0239_H0240:275b-11: sems can kun la thugs brtse can gyis //
K10D0239_H0240:275b-12: ngan par lta ba'i las kun spangs te //
K10D0239_H0240:275b-13: phan pa dang ni bde ba'i don phyir //
K10D0239_H0240:275b-14: rnam par grol zhing the tshom gcod gsol //
K10D0239_H0240:275b-15: rgyal rigs rgyal po dag la phan pa //
K10D0239_H0240:275b-16: rje'u rigs dmangs rigs par du bde phyir //
K10D0239_H0240:275b-17: dge slong dag la gnod byed mi gnang //
K10D0239_H0240:275b-18: kha na ma tho chen po'i sdig gyur //
K10D0239_H0240:275b-19: kha spu bregs shing ngur smrig gos gyon //
K10D0239_H0240:275b-20: sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos kyi rgyal mtshan //
K10D0239_H0240:275b-21: rnam par grol ba'i lam gyi mig yin //
K10D0239_H0240:275b-22: sangs rgyas kun gyis byin gyis brlabs pa //
K10D0239_H0240:275b-23: spyod lam mang po yongs su nyams kyang //
K10D0239_H0240:275b-24: rnam par grol ba yongs su spangs min //
K10D0239_H0240:275b-25: ngan par lta ba'i sdig pa spangs pas //
K10D0239_H0240:275b-27: ji ltar sman rab 'khus par gyur kyang //
K10D0239_H0240:275b-28: nad rnams kun la shin tu phan 'gyur //
K10D0239_H0240:275b-29: de bzhin spyod lam nyams pa de yang //
K10D0239_H0240:275b-30: pha rol sdug bsngal zhi bar byed 'gyur //
K10D0239_H0240:275b-31: zhi ba'i las dang gso sbyin dag tu //
K10D0239_H0240:275b-32: dge sbyong de ni der 'dug ma gnang //
K10D0239_H0240:276a-1: dam pa'i chos ston dbang ste //
K10D0239_H0240:276a-2: gnyi gas bsod nams chen po thob 'gyur //
K10D0239_H0240:276a-3: dkon mchog gsum la dad cing phyogs te //
K10D0239_H0240:276a-4: nga la ston pa chen por 'dzin pa //
K10D0239_H0240:276a-5: mi dge sdig pa mang po spong 'gyur //
K10D0239_H0240:276a-6: mu stegs mang po gang bas de mchog /
K10D0239_H0240:276a-7: ji ltar srin mo'i gling du 'khyams pa'i //
K10D0239_H0240:276a-8: 'jigs shing skrag pa'i tshong pa de dag /
K10D0239_H0240:276a-9: kun gyis rta spu nyag re bzung bas //
K10D0239_H0240:276a-10: rgya mtsho las brgal bgegs dang bral ba //
K10D0239_H0240:276a-11: de ltar tshul khrims nyams pa de ni //
K10D0239_H0240:276a-12: mi dge ngan par lta ba spangs te //
K10D0239_H0240:276a-13: dad pa gcig gi rgyu yi mthus na //
K10D0239_H0240:276a-14: nyon mongs pa yi srin las thar 'gyur //
K10D0239_H0240:276a-15: rnam par grol ba'i rgyal mtshan bsrungs te //
K10D0239_H0240:276a-16: sangs rgyas mang pos byin gyis brlabs pa'i //
K10D0239_H0240:276a-17: tshul khrims nyams la gnod mi byed na //
K10D0239_H0240:276a-18: kha na ma tho'i sdig lci spong 'gyur //
K10D0239_H0240:276a-19: bsod nams chen po la ni mos shing //
K10D0239_H0240:276a-20: yang dag rnam par grol la dga' ba //
K10D0239_H0240:276a-21: snod dang snod min kun la mnyam srung //
K10D0239_H0240:276a-22: des ni rnam grol thob par mi dka'/
K10D0239_H0240:276a-23: glen pa nga rgyal theg pa chen por //
K10D0239_H0240:276a-24: khas 'che de ni shes pa'i mthu med //
K10D0239_H0240:276a-25: theg pa gnyis kyi chos la rmongs na //
K10D0239_H0240:276a-26: theg pa chen por rig 'gyur ci smos //
K10D0239_H0240:276a-27: dper na mig gi 'bras bu nyams na; ;kha dog rnam pa mthong bar mi 'gyur //
K10D0239_H0240:276a-28: de bzhin dad pa nyams shing med na //
K10D0239_H0240:276a-29: theg pa chen po shes par mi nus //
K10D0239_H0240:276a-30: chu bran btung ba'i mthu yang med na //
K10D0239_H0240:276b-0: rgya mtsho chen po ga la rdub @276b nus; ;theg pa gnyis kyang goms mi nus na //
K10D0239_H0240:276b-1: theg pa chen po ga la slob nus //
K10D0239_H0240:276b-2: theg pa gnyis kyi chos la dad nas //
K10D0239_H0240:276b-3: theg pa chen po la ni dad 'gyur //
K10D0239_H0240:276b-4: theg chen chos la dad pa med par //
K10D0239_H0240:276b-5: tshig du smra bas don du mi 'gyur //
K10D0239_H0240:276b-6: nang ni yang dag chad par lta zhig /
K10D0239_H0240:276b-7: theg pa chen po can zhes khas 'che //
K10D0239_H0240:276b-8: mi dge gsum gyi las ni mi srung //
K10D0239_H0240:276b-9: nga yi dam chos ma rung 'jig byed //
K10D0239_H0240:276b-10: gang zag de ni tshe 'phos gyur nas //
K10D0239_H0240:276b-11: mtshams med sems can dmyal bar ltung nges //
K10D0239_H0240:276b-12: de bas dbang po brtan cing bshad bya'i //
K10D0239_H0240:276b-13: snod du ma gyur pa la ma yin //
K10D0239_H0240:276b-14: byams pa'i sems med nga rgyal dregs zhing; ;gtum zhing brlang ba dbang po zhan pa //
K10D0239_H0240:276b-15: de ni chad par lta ba yin par //
K10D0239_H0240:276b-16: mkhas pa rnams kyis de dag shes bya //
K10D0239_H0240:276b-17: nyan thos dang ni rang rgyal ba dang //
K10D0239_H0240:276b-18: theg pa chen po'i snod ma yin no //
K10D0239_H0240:276b-19: sangs rgyas kun la smad cing skur bas //
K10D0239_H0240:276b-20: nges par mtshams med dmyal bar ltung 'gyur //
K10D0239_H0240:276b-22: slob dpon 'chab cing sdug bsngal 'jigs pa //
K10D0239_H0240:276b-23: mkhas pa dag gis shes par gyis shig /
K10D0239_H0240:276b-24: de ni nyan thos theg pa yin no //
K10D0239_H0240:276b-25: sbyin la dga' zhing skye 'gag rtog pa //
K10D0239_H0240:276b-26: bas mtha'i gnas la dga' ba dag ni //
K10D0239_H0240:276b-27: rang rgyal ba yi theg pa yin par //
K10D0239_H0240:276b-28: mkhas pa dag gis shes par gyis shig /
K10D0239_H0240:276b-29: dge ba'i rtsa ba kun dang ldan zhing //
K10D0239_H0240:276b-30: byams pa dang ni snying rje'i sems kyis //
K10D0239_H0240:276b-31: rtag tu phan pa'i don la dga' ba /
K10D0239_H0240:276b-32: de ni theg pa chen po yin no //
K10D0239_H0240:277a-2: sems can dag la mi 'tshe mi gnod //
K10D0239_H0240:277a-3: stong pa nyid kyi chos la brtson pa //
K10D0239_H0240:277a-4: theg pa chen po yin par shes bya //
K10D0239_H0240:277a-5: thams cad chos la sems kyis bzod cing //
K10D0239_H0240:277a-6: smra ba'i tshig 'jam 'jungs pa med pa //
K10D0239_H0240:277a-7: chos la rtag tu dga' zhing spro ba //
K10D0239_H0240:277a-8: de yang theg pa chen po yin no //
K10D0239_H0240:277a-9: chos kyi snod dang snod min kun la //
K10D0239_H0240:277a-10: bsam pa mnyam pas phan pa'i don byed //
K10D0239_H0240:277a-11: 'jig rten chos kyis mi gos pa dag /
K10D0239_H0240:277a-12: de yang theg chen yin par shes bya //
K10D0239_H0240:277a-13: de bas mkhas pa blo can dag ni //
K10D0239_H0240:277a-14: theg pa gsum la shin tu dad bskyed //
K10D0239_H0240:277a-15: dge 'dun dag la gnod mi byed na //
K10D0239_H0240:277a-16: myur du bla med byang chub 'grub 'gyur //
K10D0239_H0240:277a-26: dmangs rigs la sogs pa'i skyes pa'am /
K10D0239_H0240:277a-27: bud med de dag gnas pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:277a-28: spyad par bya ba'i 'khor lo rnam pa bcu dang
K10D0239_H0240:277a-29: ldan na lus 'di nyid kyis nyan thos kyi theg
K10D0239_H0240:277a-30: pa'i rigs las ldog cing nyams par mi 'gyur ba
K10D0239_H0240:277a-31: dang / tshe 'di nyid la nyan thos kyi theg pa'i 'phags pa'i chos kyi snod du 'gyur te /
K10D0239_H0240:277a-32: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:277a-33: theg pa chen po'i snod du ni ma yin no //
K10D0239_H0240:277a-36: bsam pa yongs su dag pa'i dad pas dge ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:277b-0: mi dge ba'i las kyi 'bras bu yod par yid @277b ches pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:277b-3: ldan pas mi dge ba'i grogs dang /
K10D0239_H0240:277b-4: ngan par lta ba thams cad yongs su spong ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:277b-5: sdom pa la shin tu gnas te /
K10D0239_H0240:277b-6: srog gcod pa yongs su spong ba nas bag med
K10D0239_H0240:277b-7: par 'gyur ba'i khu ba 'thung ba'i bar du yongs
K10D0239_H0240:277b-9: byams pa'i sems la gnas te zhe sdang dang /
K10D0239_H0240:277b-10: khong khro ba thams cad yongs su spong ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:277b-11: snying rje'i sems la gnas te sems can nyam thag pa thams cad sgrol ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:277b-12: dga' ba'i sems la bde bar gnas te /
K10D0239_H0240:277b-13: ngag gi las mi dge ba bzhi yongs su spong ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:277b-14: btang snyoms kyi sems la gnas te; 'dod chags dang /
K10D0239_H0240:277b-16: phrag dog thams cad yongs su spong ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:277b-17: yang dag pa la phyogs te slu [?] ba'i ltas
K10D0239_H0240:277b-18: bzang ngan kun yongs su spong zhing log pa mu
K10D0239_H0240:277b-19: stegs can la mi sten pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:277b-20: shin tu 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus dang ldan te dge ba'i chos kun la nan tan byed pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:277b-21: rtag tu gnas dgon pa la dga' zhing chos kyi don tshol ba la mi skyo bar spro ba'o //
K10D0239_H0240:277b-23: rgyal rigs dge ba nas rje'u rigs dang /
K10D0239_H0240:277b-24: dmangs rigs la sogs pa'i skyes pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:277b-25: bud med de dag gnas pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:277b-26: spyad par bya ba'i 'khor lo bcu po 'di dag
K10D0239_H0240:277b-27: dang ldan na tshe 'di nyid la nyan thos kyi
K10D0239_H0240:277b-28: theg pa pa'i rigs las ldog cing nyams par mi
K10D0239_H0240:277b-29: 'gyur ba dang / tshe 'di nyid la nyan thos
K10D0239_H0240:277b-30: kyi theg pa'i 'phags pa'i chos mngon du gyur ba
K10D0239_H0240:278a-0: 'gyur ba dang / dang / nyan thos kyi 'phags pa'i @278a *//
K10D0239_H0240:278a-1: chos kyi snod du gyur te /
K10D0239_H0240:278a-2: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:278a-3: theg pa chen po'i 'phags pa'i chos mngon du gyur pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:278a-4: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:278a-5: theg pa chen po'i snod du 'gyur ba ni ma yin no //
K10D0239_H0240:278a-6: gzhung des rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:278a-7: theg pa chen po'ang shes par bya'o //
K10D0239_H0240:278a-10: spyad par ldan pa'i 'khor lo bcu po de dag ni nyan thos dang /
K10D0239_H0240:278a-13: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi thun mong du yod pa'o //
K10D0239_H0240:278a-16: spyad par bya ba'i 'khor lo rnam pa bcu nyan thos dang thun mong ma yin pa /
K10D0239_H0240:278a-19: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang thun mong pa yod do //
K10D0239_H0240:278a-20: gang rgyal rigs dge ba nas rje'u rigs dang /
K10D0239_H0240:278a-21: dmangs rigs la sogs pa'i skyes pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:278a-22: bud med de dag gnas pa dang spyad par bya
K10D0239_H0240:278a-23: ba'i 'khor lo bcu po 'di dag dang ldan na
K10D0239_H0240:278a-24: tshe 'di nyid kyis rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i
K10D0239_H0240:278a-25: rigs las kyang nyam par mi 'gyur ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:278a-27: lus 'di nyid la rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i 'phags pa'i chos rigs pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:278a-28: rang sangs rgyas kyi 'phags pa'i chos kyi snod du 'gyur ro //
K10D0239_H0240:278a-33: yid kyi las rnam par dag par spyod pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:278b-0: @278b ngo tsha ba dang ldan te /
K10D0239_H0240:278b-1: bdag gi lus kyis skyo ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:278b-2: nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la shin tu 'jigs pa skyed pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:278b-3: 'khor ba'i 'dod pa las shin tu brgal dka' bar lta ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:278b-4: rtag tu dben pa'i gnas la dga' zhing 'du 'dzi yongs su spong ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:278b-5: bas mtha' dgon pa la dga' zhing gzhan gyi skyon mi gleng pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:278b-6: dbang po rnams sdom zhing sems rtag tu zhi bas ting nge 'dzin du byed pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:278b-7: rten cing 'brel te 'byung ba la mkhas pas rgyu dang /
K10D0239_H0240:278b-8: 'bras bu la shin tu rtog pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:278b-9: rtag tu bsam gtan la mnyam par 'jog par dga' ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:278b-10: kun nas ldang ba'i chos yongs su 'gog pa la mkhas pa'o //
K10D0239_H0240:278b-12: rgyal rigs dge ba nas rje'u rigs dang /
K10D0239_H0240:278b-13: dmangs rigs la sogs pa'i skyes pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:278b-14: bud med de dag gnas pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:278b-15: spyad par bya ba'i 'khor lo bcu po 'di dag
K10D0239_H0240:278b-16: dang ldan pas tshe 'di nyid kyis rang sangs rgyas
K10D0239_H0240:278b-17: kyi theg pa'i rigs las phyir mi ldog cing nyams
K10D0239_H0240:278b-18: pa yod par mi 'gyur ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:278b-19: tshe 'di nyid kyis rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i 'phags pa'i chos mngon du 'gyur ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:278b-20: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i 'phags pa'i chos kyi snod du 'gyur ba'o //
K10D0239_H0240:278b-23: rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gnas pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:278b-24: spyad par bya ba'i 'khor lo zhes bya ste /
K10D0239_H0240:278b-26: rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis 'khor lo 'di la
K10D0239_H0240:278b-27: gnas na myur du srid pa gsum gyi rgya mtsho
K10D0239_H0240:278b-28: las brgal te mya ngan las 'das pa'i grong khyer
K10D0239_H0240:279a-3: spyad par bya ba'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba'i tshig gi don gang lags /
K10D0239_H0240:279a-4: de la gnas pa zhes bya ba ni 'dzin pa dang bcas pa /
K10D0239_H0240:279a-5: bdag gi ba'i gnas su bcas pa /
K10D0239_H0240:279a-6: 'dud par byed pa dang bcas pa /
K10D0239_H0240:279a-7: 'brel bar byed pa dang bcas pa'o //
K10D0239_H0240:279a-8: de la spyod pa zhes bya ba ni phung po spyod pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:279a-11: 'brel ba dang bcas pa'i spyod pa'o //
K10D0239_H0240:279a-12: 'khor lo zhes bya ba ni bslab pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:279a-15: 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po ni shing rta'i 'khor lo'am /
K10D0239_H0240:279a-16: 'khor lo de gtso bor spyod do //
K10D0239_H0240:279a-17: de bzhin du nyan thos dang /
K10D0239_H0240:279a-18: rang sangs rgyas thams cad 'khor lo 'di la brten nas mya ngan las 'da' ba'i lam tshol te /
K10D0239_H0240:279a-19: de bas na rnam pa 'di gnyis ni theg pa chen po'i snod ma yin no //
K10D0239_H0240:279a-21: de dag ni spyod pa dma' zhing zhan pa la
K10D0239_H0240:279a-22: rten pas theg pa chen po'i snod ma yin no
K10D0239_H0240:279a-23: // bdag phung po rnams spyod pa la 'dzin par
K10D0239_H0240:279a-24: byed pa dang bcas pa la skyo zhing 'jigs te
K10D0239_H0240:279a-25: // / bdag 'ba' zhig sdug bsngal thams cad las
K10D0239_H0240:279a-26: rnam par grol ba tshol gyi sems can thams cad
K10D0239_H0240:279a-27: rnam par dgrol ba'i phyir nan tan byed pa ma
K10D0239_H0240:279a-28: yin pas theg pa chen po'i snod ma yin no
K10D0239_H0240:279a-29: // / // bdag khams rnams spyod pa la gnas su bcas pas skyo zhing 'jigs te /
K10D0239_H0240:279b-0: bdag sdug bsngal thams cad @279b las rnam par grol ba tshol gyi /
K10D0239_H0240:279b-1: sems can thams cad rnam par dgrol ba'i phyir nan
K10D0239_H0240:279b-2: tan byed pa ma yin pas na theg pa chen
K10D0239_H0240:279b-4: bdag skye mched mngon par 'du bya ba rnams spyod
K10D0239_H0240:279b-5: pa la sdud par byed pa dang bcas pas skyo
K10D0239_H0240:279b-6: zhing 'jigs te / bdag sdug bsngal thams cad las rnam par grol ba tshol gyi /
K10D0239_H0240:279b-7: sems can thams cad rnam par dgrol ba'i phyir nan
K10D0239_H0240:279b-8: tan byed pa ma yin pas na theg pa chen
K10D0239_H0240:279b-10: de dag 'brel ba dang bcas pa'i spyod pa la
K10D0239_H0240:279b-11: 'brel ba'i dbang gis gnas shing brten nas gnas shing
K10D0239_H0240:279b-12: brten pa mngon par 'du byed de /
K10D0239_H0240:279b-13: sems can thams cad sdud pa la mi dga' zhing byams pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:279b-14: snying rje med de 'brel pa dang bcas pa'i phyir theg pa chen po'i snod ma yin no //
K10D0239_H0240:279b-15: gzhan dag sdug bsngal mang po myong bar mthong yang
K10D0239_H0240:279b-16: yal bar btang ste mi skyo ba la bdag 'ba'
K10D0239_H0240:279b-17: zhig rnam par grol ba tshol ba'i phyir theg pa
K10D0239_H0240:279b-18: chen po'i snod ma yin no //
K10D0239_H0240:279b-19: de dag bdag gi kun nas nyon mongs pa'i mgo
K10D0239_H0240:279b-20: bcad pas sems can thams cad kyi kun nas nyon
K10D0239_H0240:279b-21: mongs pa'i mgo bcad pa la mi spro bas theg
K10D0239_H0240:279b-22: pa chen po'i snod ma yin no //
K10D0239_H0240:279b-23: de dag theg pa chen po'i 'khor los byang chub
K10D0239_H0240:279b-24: la 'bab pa ma yin pas na theg pa chen
K10D0239_H0240:279b-26: de dag 'od chen po'i 'khor los byang chub la
K10D0239_H0240:279b-27: 'bab pa ma yin pas na theg pa chen po'i
K10D0239_H0240:280a-1: de dag gcig pu zla med par mya ngan las
K10D0239_H0240:280a-2: 'das pa'i grong khyer du 'gro ba la dga' zhing
K10D0239_H0240:280a-3: nan tan byed pas na theg pa chen po'i snod
K10D0239_H0240:280a-4: ma yin no // rigs kyi bu /
K10D0239_H0240:280a-5: sems can gang nyan thos kyi theg pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:280a-6: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i chos la nan tan ma bya pa /
K10D0239_H0240:280a-7: brtson 'grus ma brtsams pa dag ni dbang po yongs su ma smin te /
K10D0239_H0240:280a-9: brtson 'grus chung ba dag la gal te shin tu
K10D0239_H0240:280a-10: zab mo theg pa chen po'i dam pa'i chos bstan
K10D0239_H0240:280a-12: nyan pa gnyis ka kha na ma tho ba chen po'i sdig thob par 'gyur te /
K10D0239_H0240:280a-13: de ni sangs rgyas thams cad la 'khus pa yin no //
K10D0239_H0240:280a-15: sems can gang nyan thos kyi theg pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:280a-16: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i chos la nan tan ma byas shing brtson 'grus ma brtsams te /
K10D0239_H0240:280a-19: brtson 'grus chung ba dag shin tu zab pa theg
K10D0239_H0240:280a-20: pa chen po'i dam pa'i chos mnyan na sems can
K10D0239_H0240:280a-21: de ni yang dag par glen pa /
K10D0239_H0240:280a-23: de ni bdag shes par khas 'che'ang chad pa'i mtha' dang /
K10D0239_H0240:280a-24: log pa'i 'du shes su 'gyur ba dang; rgyu med
K10D0239_H0240:280a-25: par smra zhing las kyi 'bras bu rnams la med
K10D0239_H0240:280a-26: par 'dzin pas dge ba byas pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:280a-27: sdig pa byas pa thams cad la med par 'dzin pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:280b-0: theg pa chen po @280b la brdzun du smra zhing nga'i dam pa'i chos ma rungs par byed pa /
K10D0239_H0240:280b-1: chos ma yin pa la ni chos yin par 'chad pa /
K10D0239_H0240:280b-2: chos la ni chos ma yin par 'chad pa /
K10D0239_H0240:280b-3: dge sbyong ma yin pa la dge sbyong yin par 'chad pa /
K10D0239_H0240:280b-4: dge sbyong yang dag pa la ni dge sbyong ma yin par 'chad pa /
K10D0239_H0240:280b-5: 'dul ba ma yin pa la ni 'dul bar 'chad pa /
K10D0239_H0240:280b-6: 'dul ba yang dag pa la ni 'dul ba ma yin par 'chad de /
K10D0239_H0240:280b-7: glen pa gti mug gi rang bzhin can nga rgyal gyis mngon par zin pa /
K10D0239_H0240:280b-9: ser snas yongs su bsten pa /
K10D0239_H0240:280b-10: theg pa chen po'i chos la bstod cing srung ba
K10D0239_H0240:280b-11: dang; kun du rgyas par byed kyang nyan thos kyi
K10D0239_H0240:280b-12: theg pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i chos
K10D0239_H0240:280b-13: la 'phya zhing skur nas rgyas par mi byed do
K10D0239_H0240:280b-14: theg pa dang / // de ni nyan thos kyi theg pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:280b-15: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:280b-16: bla na med pa yang dag pa'i theg pa la brten te /
K10D0239_H0240:280b-17: khyim nas khyim ma yin par rab tu byung nas
K10D0239_H0240:280b-18: bsnyen par rdzogs kyang dge slong nyid du 'gyur bar
K10D0239_H0240:280b-19: yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du mi shes
K10D0239_H0240:280b-20: pa dang / dge ba'i chos thams cad mngon par
K10D0239_H0240:280b-21: sdud pa'i rgyu yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin
K10D0239_H0240:280b-22: du mi shes pas nga'i slob ma chos kyi snod
K10D0239_H0240:280b-24: chos kyi snod du ma gyur pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:280b-26: mi slob pa la nan tan byed pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:280b-27: mtha'i gnas byas pa'i 'bras bu thob pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:280b-28: dge ba'i skye bo tshul khrims srung ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:281a-2: tshul khrims med pa dag la rnam pa sna tshogs kyis spyo zhing gshe ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:281a-6: 'tsho ba'i yo byad la spyod du mi ster ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:281a-7: bzung zhing bcing pa'ang byed do //
K10D0239_H0240:281a-9: 'bras bu thams cad med par lta zhing chad par smra ba dag ni mi'i nang na gnas kyang /
K10D0239_H0240:281a-10: de ni yang dag par srin po zhes bya ste /
K10D0239_H0240:281a-11: ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bskal pa chen po grangs med pa'i bar du'ang mi'i lus thob par dka'o //
K10D0239_H0240:281a-12: sems can dmyal bar tshad med pa'i sdug bsngal myong bar yang sla yi /
K10D0239_H0240:281a-13: mi'i nang na chad par lta ba ni ma yin no //
K10D0239_H0240:281a-14: de ltar gang zag glen pa de ni ring po
K10D0239_H0240:281a-15: mi thogs par lus kyi yan lag dum bur chad
K10D0239_H0240:281a-16: cing nyin zhag du mar lce lkugs shing smra mi
K10D0239_H0240:281a-17: nus pa dang / shin tu mi bzad pa'i na ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:281a-18: tsha ba'i sdug bsngal chen po myong ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:281a-19: tshe 'phos nas gdon mi za bar mtshams med pa'i
K10D0239_H0240:281a-20: sems can dmyal bar ltung zhing ngan song kun tu
K10D0239_H0240:281a-21: 'khor lo bzhin du 'khor la sdug bsngal mang po
K10D0239_H0240:281a-22: len te thar pa'i dus med do //
K10D0239_H0240:281a-23: bskal pa brgya stong gi bar du'ang mi'i lus thob par dka'o //
K10D0239_H0240:281a-24: gal te bskal pa tshad med grangs med pa 'das
K10D0239_H0240:281a-25: nas mi'i lus thob na'ang sangs rgyas mi bzhugs pa
K10D0239_H0240:281a-26: / rnyog pa lnga'i 'jig rten gyi khams su skye ste /
K10D0239_H0240:281b-3: nad rnam pa sna tshogs kyis gzir ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:281b-4: lus thung zhing mi sdug bas kun gyi yid du mi 'ong ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:281b-5: smra mi mkhas shing chig rnar mi 'ong ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:281b-6: sems rtag tu myos shing ci'ang mi shes pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:281b-7: dbul phongs pa'i rigs su skyes nas ci'ang mi rnyed pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:281b-8: dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang mi phrad pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:281b-9: sdig pa'i bshes gnyen gyi rjes su sdig pa'i las byed pa la dga' ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:281b-10: ngan par lta ba la chags shing mtshams med pa'i
K10D0239_H0240:281b-11: sdig pa byed pa la dga' bas phyir yang mtshams
K10D0239_H0240:281b-12: med pa'i sems can dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur te
K10D0239_H0240:281b-13: / ngan song las shin tu thar par dka'o //
K10D0239_H0240:281b-14: de ltar glen pa gti mug can chad pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:281b-15: 'gog par smra ba des nga'i dam pa'i chos ma
K10D0239_H0240:281b-16: rung bar byas nas nga'i slob ma tshul khrims srung
K10D0239_H0240:281b-17: ba dang / tshul khrims nyams pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:281b-18: tshul khrims med pa la nan tan gyis chad pas
K10D0239_H0240:281b-19: gcod cing dge ba'i phyogs la bde bar spyod du
K10D0239_H0240:281b-20: mi ster te / de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis bskal
K10D0239_H0240:281b-21: pa brgya stong gi bar du ngan song du ltung
K10D0239_H0240:281b-22: nas mun pa nas mun par rgyu ste /

K10D0239_H0240:286b-17: de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dang /

K10D0239_H0240:286b-19: dam pa'i chos ston pa la dbu ma'i nan tan

K10D0239_H0240:287a-5: pa med pa ltar ting nge 'dzin tshad med pas

K10D0239_H0240:287a-8: theg pa gsum las gang dang mthun pa bzhin du 'dzud do //

K10D0239_H0240:287a-10: sems dpa' chen pos gzhan la chos ston pa'ang de
K10D0239_H0240:287a-11: bzhin te / sems can rnams la mchog dam pa

K10D0239_H0240:287b-10: rang sangs rgyas ni bdag nyid kyi nyon mongs pa'i nad bsal ba'i phyir gzhan la chos ston to //

K10D0239_H0240:288a-0: rang sangs rgyas ni sems can @288a *//

K10D0239_H0240:288a-8: // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni

K10D0239_H0240:288a-10: bya ba'i phyir gzhan la chos ston to //
K10D0239_H0240:288a-12: rang sangs rgyas ni bdag 'ba' zhig la chos kyi
K10D0239_H0240:288a-13: ros khyab par bya ba'i phyir gzhan la chos ston
K10D0239_H0240:288a-14: to // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
K10D0239_H0240:288a-15: ni sems can thams cad rgyal ba'i chos kyi 'od
K10D0239_H0240:288a-16: thob par bya ba'i phyir gzhan la chos ston to

K10D0239_H0240:288a-19: kyi 'od thob par bya ba'i phyir gzhan la chos

K10D0239_H0240:288a-26: grags pa chen po 'thob pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:288b-0: yang dag pa ji lta bzhin du @288b thams cad

K10D0239_H0240:288b-4: rang sangs rgyas ni sdom pa cung zad kyis bsag

K10D0239_H0240:288b-7: grags pa cung zad 'thob pa dang /

K10D0239_H0240:288b-10: gzhan la chos ston to; ;rigs kyi bu /
K10D0239_H0240:288b-12: rang sangs rgyas ni gzhan la yang dag par dmigs pa med do //

K10D0239_H0240:288b-19: pha rol la yang dag par g-yo dang /

K10D0239_H0240:288b-22: bde ba sgrub pa ma yin no //
K10D0239_H0240:288b-23: gzhan la yang dag par lus dang /

K10D0239_H0240:288b-28: gir dmigs pa gang yang yang dag par med pa

K10D0239_H0240:289a-1: gzhan la gnod pa skyed pa gang yang med do ////
K10D0239_H0240:289a-5: sems can gang rang bzhin gyis gdug pa /
K10D0239_H0240:289a-8: gti mug gi rang bzhin can /

K10D0239_H0240:289a-11: gzhan dag gi khe dang; bkur sti dang /
K10D0239_H0240:289a-13: grags pa rnyed pa mthong na phrag dog skyed pa /
K10D0239_H0240:289a-17: grags pa tshol bas mi ngoms pa /
K10D0239_H0240:289a-18: bdag bstod cing gzhan la smod pa /
K10D0239_H0240:289a-21: yid kyi las mi sdom pa /
K10D0239_H0240:289a-22: sdig pa thams cad spyod pa la rtag tu dga' ba /
K10D0239_H0240:289a-27: gzhan la 'tshe ba la dga' ba /
K10D0239_H0240:289a-28: bsod nams kyi zhing la bzang ngan du rnam par 'byed pa /
K10D0239_H0240:289a-29: nga'i bstan pa la zhugs pa rab tu byung ba
K10D0239_H0240:289a-30: la skyon tshol zhing gnod par glags lta ba la
K10D0239_H0240:289a-31: dga' ba / skyon cung zad tsam byung na bden nam /
K10D0239_H0240:289a-32: rdzun ma brtags par 'phya zhing skur te gshe zhing sbyo ba /
K10D0239_H0240:289a-35: rab tu byung ba la 'tshe bar dga' ba /
K10D0239_H0240:289a-36: bdag gi skyon la mi sems shing gzhan la 'phya ba /
K10D0239_H0240:289a-37: theg pa chen po'i yon tan dang /
K10D0239_H0240:289b-0: bsnangs pa brjod @289b pa thos na 'tsho zhing 'jug pa'i sems skye mod kyi /
K10D0239_H0240:289b-1: kha na ma tho ba'i sdig lci ba spyad pa la dga' ba /
K10D0239_H0240:289b-3: gzhan la bslu ba'i phyir theg pa chen po'i chos

K10D0239_H0240:289b-10: tan du ma bslabs pas don khong du chud pa

K10D0239_H0240:290a-5: zhes sengge'i sgra sgrogs pas glen pa gti mug can

K10D0239_H0240:290a-11: mthong na; de seng ge nyid yin par 'dzin to
K10D0239_H0240:290a-12: // de nas des sgra phyung ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:290a-13: thams cad kyis bong bu yin par shes nas kun gyis mtshil mas btab ste /
K10D0239_H0240:290a-15: 'di ko mi gtsang ba za ba'i sdig to bong
K10D0239_H0240:290a-16: bu lta na zhes ti nan pa sna tshogs kyis
K10D0239_H0240:290a-18: de ltar na de bzhin du ngas bshad pa'i gang
K10D0239_H0240:290a-19: zag mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam spyod pa
K10D0239_H0240:290a-21: mi thams cad kyi sa bon bsreg pa yin te /
K10D0239_H0240:290a-23: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i chos las kyang phyir
K10D0239_H0240:290a-24: ldog pa yin na theg pa chen po'i snod du
K10D0239_H0240:290a-26: de ltar glen pa gtig mug can nga rgyal gyis
K10D0239_H0240:290a-27: mngon par zin te bdag theg pa chen po pa'o
K10D0239_H0240:290a-28: zhes pha rol la sgyus brjod cing khe dang /
K10D0239_H0240:290a-29: bkur sti sdug pa de ni /

K10D0239_H0240:290a-32: brgal ba'i phyir g-yul du zhugs kyang bdag nyon mongs
K10D0239_H0240:290a-33: pa las don du 'grub pa med do //
K10D0239_H0240:290a-34: de ltar de bzhin du theg pa chen po par
K10D0239_H0240:290b-0: sgyus khas 'che ba de'ang @290b 'di ltar dad pa'i
K10D0239_H0240:290b-1: lag pa dang / tshul khrims kyi rkang pa ma tshang bar rang gi las dang /
K10D0239_H0240:290b-2: spyod pa la mi dpog cing nyon mongs pa'i g-yul
K10D0239_H0240:290b-3: chen po la rgol bar chas pa ni ba nyon
K10D0239_H0240:290b-4: mongs pa tsam las don du mi 'gyur ro //

K10D0239_H0240:290b-8: snod ma yin pas sems can thams cad kyi nyon
K10D0239_H0240:290b-9: mongs pa'i dgra shin tu gnas pa tshoms par ram

K10D0239_H0240:290b-16: / phul du gyur pa'i dge ba'i mchog spyod par ldan pa /
K10D0239_H0240:290b-17: phul du gyur pa'i khrel pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:290b-19: 'jig rten phyi ma'i sdug bsngal gyi 'bras bu la shin tu lta zhing 'jigs pa'o //
K10D0239_H0240:290b-20: mi dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su spong zhing
K10D0239_H0240:290b-21: dge ba'i chos thams cad la nan tan byed pa
K10D0239_H0240:290b-22: la spro ba'o // byams pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:290b-23: snying rjes sems can thams cad la khyab pa'o //
K10D0239_H0240:290b-24: sems can thams cad la phan pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:290b-25: bde ba'i don bya ba'i phyir rtsol ba'o //
K10D0239_H0240:291a-0: sems can thams cad 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las sgrol zhing 'don @291a *//
K10D0239_H0240:291a-1: pa'o; ;bdag gis lus kyi bde ba la mi lta bar sems can thams cad la phan pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:291a-2: bde ba'i don stobs pa ste /
K10D0239_H0240:291a-3: de dag ni theg pa chen po la gnas pa zhes bya'o //
K10D0239_H0240:291a-5: mtshan nyid gang dag dang ldan na nyan thos kyi theg pa zhes bya ba zhe na /
K10D0239_H0240:291a-6: gang dag yang dag pa'i dran pa la bde bar
K10D0239_H0240:291a-7: gnas shing ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par 'jog pas
K10D0239_H0240:291a-10: sgyu spangs shing las kyi 'bras bu la yid ches pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:291a-11: 'dod pa lnga la mi chags shing 'jig rten gyi chos brgyad kyis mi gos pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:291a-12: mgo'i thod la me 'bar ba bzhin du dge ba la shin tu brtson pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:291a-15: skye mched la shin tu rtog pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:291a-16: 'phags pa'i rigs la bde bar gnas par rtag tu mos pa ste /
K10D0239_H0240:291a-17: mtshan nyid 'di dag dang ldan pa ni nyan thos kyi theg pa zhes bya ste /
K10D0239_H0240:291a-18: gang zag 'di rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i snod
K10D0239_H0240:291a-19: du'ang mi 'gyur na theg pa chen po'i snod du
K10D0239_H0240:291a-22: mtshan nyid gtang dag dang ldan pas rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa zhes bya zhe na /
K10D0239_H0240:291a-23: sems can gang dag nyan thos kyi yon tan de
K10D0239_H0240:291a-24: dag thams cad dang yang ldan la gzhan yang nye
K10D0239_H0240:291a-25: bar len pa'i phung po lnga la yang dang /
K10D0239_H0240:291a-26: yang du mi rtag par rjes su rtog pa la gnas pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:291b-0: skye zhing 'gog @291b pa la yang dang /
K10D0239_H0240:291b-1: yang du rjes su rtog pa la gnas pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:291b-2: rten cing 'brel te 'byung ba'i chos rnams ni 'gog pa'i chos can du shin tu rtog pa ste /
K10D0239_H0240:291b-3: mtshan nyid 'di dang ldan na rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa zhes bya ste /
K10D0239_H0240:291b-4: sems can de theg pa chen po'i chos kyi snod ni ma yin no //
K10D0239_H0240:291b-5: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don de dag bzlas
K10D0239_H0240:291b-6: pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad de gsungs pa; gal te
K10D0239_H0240:291b-7: dge ba'i rgyal rigs rgyal po dang //
K10D0239_H0240:291b-8: rje'u rigs dmangs rigs shin tu dge ba'i bar //
K10D0239_H0240:291b-9: dad la sogs pa'i 'khor lo bcu bsgoms nas //
K10D0239_H0240:291b-10: nyan thos theg pa'i snod du de 'gyur ro //
K10D0239_H0240:291b-11: rang rgyal theg pa'i sgo gsum rnam par dag /
K10D0239_H0240:291b-12: khrul dang 'dzem dang ldan zhing phung pos 'jigs //
K10D0239_H0240:291b-13: nyes pa'i skyon shes bas mtha'i gnas la dga'//
K10D0239_H0240:291b-14: dran pas dbang po srung zhing sems kyang zhing //
K10D0239_H0240:291b-15: rten cing 'brel pa rtogs pas bsam gtan sgom /
K10D0239_H0240:291b-16: phung po khams dang skye mched rtogs la mkhas //
K10D0239_H0240:291b-17: gnas dang spyod lam 'khor lo 'di bcus na //
K10D0239_H0240:291b-18: theg pa mchog gi snod 'gyur srid mtsho rgal //
K10D0239_H0240:291b-19: theg pa gsum min gnyis kyi 'khor lo yis //
K10D0239_H0240:291b-20: bdag nyid nyon mongs rnam par grol rtsol zhing //
K10D0239_H0240:291b-21: bag chags mi gtong sems can ma sgrol ba'i //
K10D0239_H0240:291b-22: gang zag da ni theg chen snod ma yin //
K10D0239_H0240:291b-23: byis pa dbang po zhan pa'i le lo can //
K10D0239_H0240:291b-24: theg pa gnyis la nan tan mi byed pa //
K10D0239_H0240:291b-25: theg pa chen po'i 'khor lo ldan mi 'gyur //
K10D0239_H0240:292a-0: @292a *// de ni rgya chen theg chen snod ma yin //
K10D0239_H0240:292a-1: byis pa gcig pu rnam par grol tshol ba //
K10D0239_H0240:292a-2: blo dang spyod par zhan cing byams sems med //
K10D0239_H0240:292a-3: chad par lta la chags pa ngan song gzhol //
K10D0239_H0240:292a-4: yang dag chos spong chos ma yin pa ston //
K10D0239_H0240:292a-5: theg pa gnyis la skur cing sdom pa spong //
K10D0239_H0240:292a-6: bsnyen par rdzogs shing theg chen khas 'che ba //
K10D0239_H0240:292a-7: nga yi chos 'jig sems can kun la slu //
K10D0239_H0240:292a-8: de yi dbang gis mi lus thob par dka'//
K10D0239_H0240:292a-9: nga yi bstan la zhugs pa'i 'phags pa dang //
K10D0239_H0240:292a-10: ngur smrig gyon la 'tshe'am gnod byed dam //
K10D0239_H0240:292a-11: gshe'am spyos sam lhung bzed gos phrogs na //
K10D0239_H0240:292a-12: lha dang mi yi bde ba yun du stor //
K10D0239_H0240:292a-13: de bas gang zhig mi lus thob 'dod cing //
K10D0239_H0240:292a-14: 'chi ba'i dus na lkugs pa'i skyon spangs shing //
K10D0239_H0240:292a-15: rtag tu sangs rgyas kun dang phrad 'dod pa //
K10D0239_H0240:292a-16: theg gsum chos rnams kun tu bsrung bar byos //
K10D0239_H0240:292a-17: theg pa gsum las theg pa mchog 'dod pa //
K10D0239_H0240:292a-18: theg pa gsum chos rtog la mkhas pa ste //
K10D0239_H0240:292a-19: dga' zhing spro bas gzhan la rgyas ston na //
K10D0239_H0240:292a-20: nges par sangs rgyas 'gyur la the tshom spongs //
K10D0239_H0240:292a-21: tshol khrims nyams shing 'dzungs pa nga rgyal can //
K10D0239_H0240:292a-22: bdag bstod gzhan smod theg chen khas 'che ba //
K10D0239_H0240:292a-23: de dag spangs te mkhas la bsten par bya //
K10D0239_H0240:292a-24: nges par 'tshang rgya khams gsum 'da' bar 'gyur //
K10D0239_H0240:292a-25: theg pa gsum las gang dang mthun pa bzhin //
K10D0239_H0240:292b-0: byams @292b dang snying rje'i theg pa gsum chos ston //
K10D0239_H0240:292b-1: mi de bzhin du yongs su rdzogs byas na //
K10D0239_H0240:292b-2: nges par 'tshang rgyar 'gyur la the tshom spongs //
K10D0239_H0240:292b-3: phung po khams dang skye mched zhi bar shes //
K10D0239_H0240:292b-4: nam mkha' bzhin du ci la'ang mi gnas te //
K10D0239_H0240:292b-5: chos bstan sems can mang po kun yang sdud //
K10D0239_H0240:292b-6: dpag med ye shes blo gros dam pa thob //
K10D0239_H0240:292b-7: tshul khrims nyams par dga' la sdig pa can //
K10D0239_H0240:292b-8: theg pa chen po'i yon tan mchog thos nas //
K10D0239_H0240:292b-9: khe dang grags phyir theg khas 'che ba //
K10D0239_H0240:292b-10: bong bu seng ge'i bags pa gyon pa bzhin //
K10D0239_H0240:292b-11: deng 'dir thams cad 'khor la bka' stsal pa //
K10D0239_H0240:292b-12: gang zhig myur du byang chub mchog 'dod na //
K10D0239_H0240:292b-13: dge bcu'i las kyi lam la nan tan byos //
K10D0239_H0240:292b-14: nga yi chos la mi smad shin tu bsrung //
K10D0239_H0240:292b-15: ngas sngon mdo sde gzhan dag las gsungs la //
K10D0239_H0240:292b-16: byang chub chen po 'dod pas theg chen spyad //
K10D0239_H0240:292b-17: nyan thos rang rgyal theg pa spongs shig pa //
K10D0239_H0240:292b-18: de ni rnam dag 'khor lo bstan pa'i chos //
K10D0239_H0240:292b-19: sangs rgyas tshad med bye ma mchod byas pas //
K10D0239_H0240:292b-20: sdig pa spangs nas rnam dag sems sbyong ba //
K10D0239_H0240:292b-21: shin tu brtson ba'i skye bo de dag la //
K10D0239_H0240:292b-22: gnyis su med de theg pa gcig pu bshad //
K10D0239_H0240:292b-23: da lta'i 'khor 'di theg pa gsum snod can //
K10D0239_H0240:292b-24: la la nyan thos theg pa'i chos dang ldan //
K10D0239_H0240:292b-25: las kyi dngos po mang pos 'jigs pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:292b-26: de ni byang chub mchog gi snod ma yin //
K10D0239_H0240:292b-27: la la dbang par dga' zhing rang byang chub //
K10D0239_H0240:293a-0: de yang byang chub mchog gi @293a *//
K10D0239_H0240:293a-2: la la ye shes mchog la bkod 'os pa //
K10D0239_H0240:293a-3: de bas mos pa bzhin du theg gsum shod //
K10D0239_H0240:293a-4: sbyangs pa'i yon tan tsam gyis grol 'dod pa //
K10D0239_H0240:293a-5: theg chen bshad pa thos na ngan song ltung //
K10D0239_H0240:293a-6: bad kan nad la 'o ma 'thung bcug bzhin //
K10D0239_H0240:293a-7: de phyir dug tu 'gyur gyi nad mi sel //
K10D0239_H0240:293a-8: de bzhin snod min nyan thos theg pa dag /
K10D0239_H0240:293a-9: theg chen bshad pa thos na rmongs 'gyur zhing //
K10D0239_H0240:293a-10: chad par smra la ngan song ltung 'gyur bas //
K10D0239_H0240:293a-11: de bas dbang po brtags te chos bstan to //
K10D0239_H0240:293a-12: shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo sa'i snying po'i 'khor lo bcu pa zhes bya ba las /
K10D0239_H0240:293a-14: spyad pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o ////
K10D0239_H0240:293a-15: de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa
K10D0239_H0240:293a-16: de dag gsungs pa na 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de'i
K10D0239_H0240:293a-17: nang na sems can tshad med pa brgya stong snyed
K10D0239_H0240:293a-18: sngon chos thos pa las yid gol te stong pa
K10D0239_H0240:293a-19: yin par go nas rgyu dang /
K10D0239_H0240:293a-20: 'bras bu med par lta zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba
K10D0239_H0240:293a-21: yongs su bcad nas ngan song du ltung bar 'gyur
K10D0239_H0240:293a-22: ba dag mdo sde 'di bshad pa thos nas phyir
K10D0239_H0240:293a-23: yang yang dag pa'i lta ba dang ldan par gyur
K10D0239_H0240:293a-24: ro // de nas de dag 'dug pa las langs te /
K10D0239_H0240:293a-25: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar shin tu 'dzem pa bskyed de /
K10D0239_H0240:293a-26: so sor bshags pa bya ba'i phyir thal mo sbyar ba btud de phyag btsal nas /
K10D0239_H0240:293b-0: bcom ldan 'das la 'di @293b skad ces gsol to //
K10D0239_H0240:293b-2: bdag cag sngon nyan thos kyi theg pa'i rigs su
K10D0239_H0240:293b-3: dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa las nyan thos kyi
K10D0239_H0240:293b-4: theg pa de'ang yongs su ma smin par rang sangs
K10D0239_H0240:293b-5: rgyas kyi theg pa'i chos thos so //
K10D0239_H0240:293b-6: de la'ang rmongs shing mngon du ma gyur pas stong par lta zhing rgyu dang /
K10D0239_H0240:293b-8: de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis lus dang /
K10D0239_H0240:293b-10: yid kyi sgo nas sdig pa mi dge ba'i las
K10D0239_H0240:293b-11: tshad med pa bgyis pas ngan song dag tu ltung
K10D0239_H0240:293b-12: bar 'gyur ba las deng bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan
K10D0239_H0240:293b-13: sngar mdo sde 'di bshad pa thos nas slar yang
K10D0239_H0240:293b-14: yang dag pa'i lta ba rnyed de shin tu 'dzem
K10D0239_H0240:293b-15: pa dang / ngo tsha ba'i sems kyis so sor
K10D0239_H0240:293b-16: bshags te ma bcabs pas de dag yongs su byang
K10D0239_H0240:293b-17: pa dang / bar gyur cig / deng slan chad
K10D0239_H0240:293b-18: ji snyed sgrib par 'gyur ba'i las rnams mi bgyid
K10D0239_H0240:293b-19: par yongs su bsrung bar 'tshal lo //
K10D0239_H0240:293b-20: bdag cag gi sdig pa de dag yongs su spyad pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:293b-23: thugs brtse bas rjes su gzung du gsol /
K10D0239_H0240:293b-24: bdag cag ma 'ongs pa na ngan song gi sdug
K10D0239_H0240:293b-25: bsngal myong bar 'gyur ba las thugs brtse bas bskyab
K10D0239_H0240:293b-26: tu gsol / bdag cag slar yang sngon spyad pa'i
K10D0239_H0240:293b-27: nyan thos kyi theg ba la spyod cing nan tan
K10D0239_H0240:293b-28: tu gsol / bgyid kyi / bcom ldan 'das /
K10D0239_H0240:293b-29: thugs brtse ba'i slad du bstan du gsol /
K10D0239_H0240:293b-30: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10D0239_H0240:294a-1: ngo tsha bas so sor bshags pa legs so //
K10D0239_H0240:294a-2: nga'i bstan pa la ma nyams pa'i skyes bu dam pa gnyis yod de /
K10D0239_H0240:294a-3: gcig ni rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag cing thog ma nas nyes pa mi byed pa'o //
K10D0239_H0240:294a-4: gcig ni nyes pa byas su zin kyang 'dzem pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:294a-5: ngo tsha bas so sor 'chags pa ste /
K10D0239_H0240:294a-6: skyes bu dam pa 'di gnyis ni nga'i chos la
K10D0239_H0240:294a-7: shin tu 'dun pa rnam par dag pa zhes bya'o
K10D0239_H0240:294a-8: // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag gi
K10D0239_H0240:294a-9: mos pa bzhin du 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi'i chos
K10D0239_H0240:294a-10: // bstan te / 'khor de'i nang na la las ni bzod pa tha ma thob /
K10D0239_H0240:294a-11: la las ni bzod pa bar ma thob /
K10D0239_H0240:294a-12: la las ni bzod pa mchog thob /
K10D0239_H0240:294a-13: la las ni 'jig rten gyi mchog gi chos thob /
K10D0239_H0240:294a-14: la las ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob /
K10D0239_H0240:294a-15: la las ni lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob /
K10D0239_H0240:294a-16: la las ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob bo //
K10D0239_H0240:294a-18: dge slong brgyad khri bzhi stong zag pa thams cad zad pa /
K10D0239_H0240:294a-20: blo shin tu rnam par dag pa'i dgra bcom par
K10D0239_H0240:294a-21: gyur nas dga' bzhin du sangs rgyas la phyag btsal
K10D0239_H0240:294a-22: te phyir yang so sor stan la 'khod do //
K10D0239_H0240:294a-23: yang 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de'i nang na sems can
K10D0239_H0240:294a-24: bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag lnga bcu rtsa
K10D0239_H0240:294a-25: bdun gyis sngon thos pa'i chos stong pa yin par
K10D0239_H0240:294b-2: dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bcad nas ngan song
K10D0239_H0240:294b-3: du ltung bar 'gyur ba nas mdo sde 'di bshad
K10D0239_H0240:294b-4: pa thos nas phyir yang yang dag pa'i lta ba
K10D0239_H0240:294b-5: rnyed de 'dug pa las langs nas bcom ldan 'das
K10D0239_H0240:294b-6: kyi zhabs la spyi bos gtugs te /
K10D0239_H0240:294b-7: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar shin tu 'dzem pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:294b-8: ngo tsha ba dang bcas pas so sor bshags te
K10D0239_H0240:294b-9: thal mo sbyar bar btud cing bcom ldan 'das la
K10D0239_H0240:294b-12: bdag cag sngon rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i rigs
K10D0239_H0240:294b-13: su dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa las rang sangs
K10D0239_H0240:294b-14: rgyas kyi theg pa'i snod du'ang yongs su ma smin
K10D0239_H0240:294b-15: par theg pa chen po'i chos thos nas dad pa
K10D0239_H0240:294b-16: dang / mos pa skyes kyang ma rig pas ldongs
K10D0239_H0240:294b-17: shing rtogs par ma gyur te stong par lta zhing
K10D0239_H0240:294b-18: dang / rgyu dang / 'bras bu med par bzung ngo //
K10D0239_H0240:294b-19: de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis lus dang /
K10D0239_H0240:294b-21: yid kyis sdig pa mi dge ba'i las tshad med
K10D0239_H0240:294b-22: pa dag bgyis pas bskal pa tshad med pa'i bar
K10D0239_H0240:294b-23: du shin tu mi bzad pa'i sdug bsngal rnam pa
K10D0239_H0240:294b-24: sna tshogs myong zhing ngan song du ltung bar 'gyur
K10D0239_H0240:294b-25: ba las / deng bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar
K10D0239_H0240:294b-26: mdo sde bshad pa thos nas slar yang dag pa'i
K10D0239_H0240:294b-29: ngo tsha bar ldan pa mi 'chab pa'i sems kyis so sor 'chags te /
K10D0239_H0240:295a-0: deng slan chad ji snyed sgrib par 'gyur ba'i las rnams @295a *//
K10D0239_H0240:295a-1: mi bgyid par yongs su bsrung bar 'tshal lo //
K10D0239_H0240:295a-3: thugs brtse ba can gyis bdag cag gi sdig pa de dag yongs su byang ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:295a-4: slan chad mi bgyid par rjes su gzung du gsol /
K10D0239_H0240:295a-5: bdag cag ma 'ongs pa na ngan song gi sdug
K10D0239_H0240:295a-6: bsngal myong bar 'gyur ba las bcom ldan 'das kyis
K10D0239_H0240:295a-8: bdag cag slar yang sngon spyad pa'i rang sangs rgyas
K10D0239_H0240:295a-9: kyi theg pa la spyod cing nan tan bgyid kyi
K10D0239_H0240:295a-11: thugs brtse ba can gyis bstan du gsol //
K10D0239_H0240:295a-12: bcom ldan 'das kyi legs so; ;zhes bka' stsal te legs so //
K10D0239_H0240:295a-15: ngo tsha bas so sor bshags pa legs so //
K10D0239_H0240:295a-16: nga'i bstan pa la ma nyams pa'i skyes bu gnyis
K10D0239_H0240:295a-17: yod de; gcig ni rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag
K10D0239_H0240:295a-18: cing thog ma nas nyes pa mi byed pa'o //
K10D0239_H0240:295a-19: gcig ni nyes pa byas su zin kyang 'dzem pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:295a-20: ngo tsha bas so sor 'chags pa ste /
K10D0239_H0240:295a-21: skyes bu dam pa 'di gnyis ni nga'i chos la
K10D0239_H0240:295a-22: shin tu 'dun pa rnam par dag pa zhes bya'o
K10D0239_H0240:295a-23: // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag gis
K10D0239_H0240:295a-24: mos pa bzhin du rten cing 'brel te 'byung ba'i
K10D0239_H0240:295a-25: chos bstan nas de dag thams cad rang sangs rgyas
K10D0239_H0240:295a-26: kyi theg pa la nan tan byas te /
K10D0239_H0240:295a-27: thams cad mthar gyis rgyal mtshan la dmigs pa zhes
K10D0239_H0240:295b-0: bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs @295b nas
K10D0239_H0240:295b-1: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa las phyir mi ldog
K10D0239_H0240:295b-3: bcom ldan 'das la phyag btsal nas phyir yang so so'i stan la 'khod do //
K10D0239_H0240:295b-4: yang 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de'i nang na sems can
K10D0239_H0240:295b-5: bye ba brgya stong phrag brgyad cu snyed sngon 'das
K10D0239_H0240:295b-6: pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos la skur ba nas chung
K10D0239_H0240:295b-7: du na sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa tshigs su bcad
K10D0239_H0240:295b-8: pa gcig tsam la smad pa de'i rgyu de'i rkyen
K10D0239_H0240:295b-9: gyis ngan song dag tu ltung zhing sdug bsngal mang
K10D0239_H0240:295b-10: po myong ste / slar mi'i lus thob na'ang thog
K10D0239_H0240:295b-11: ma nas lkugs pa dig lce ldib cing smra mi
K10D0239_H0240:295b-12: shes pa dag mdo sde 'di bshad pa thos nas
K10D0239_H0240:295b-13: yang dag pa'i lta ba rnyed de /
K10D0239_H0240:295b-14: de dag 'dug pa las langs nas bcom ldan 'das
K10D0239_H0240:295b-15: kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag btsal nas bcom ldan
K10D0239_H0240:295b-16: 'das kyi spyan sngar shin tu 'dzem pa dang; ngo
K10D0239_H0240:295b-17: tsha bas sngon gyi sdig pa'i las so sor bshags
K10D0239_H0240:295b-18: nas thal mo sbyar ba btud te /
K10D0239_H0240:295b-19: bcom ldan 'das la mig mi 'dzum par lta'o //
K10D0239_H0240:295b-20: bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag thams cad smra nus par byin gyis brlabs te /
K10D0239_H0240:295b-21: de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis mkhyen bzhin du de dag la bka' stsal pa /
K10D0239_H0240:295b-22: khyed rnams sngon mi dge ba'i las ci zhig byas
K10D0239_H0240:295b-23: na 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'di'i nang na smra mi
K10D0239_H0240:295b-24: shes par gyur / de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10D0239_H0240:296a-0: bdag cag kha cig gis ni sngon rnam @296a *//
K10D0239_H0240:296a-1: par gzigs de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa'i chos la /
K10D0239_H0240:296a-2: kha cig gis ni theg pa chen po'i chos la skur to //
K10D0239_H0240:296a-3: la la ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i chos la skur to //
K10D0239_H0240:296a-4: kha cig gis ni nyan thos kyi theg pa'i chos la skur to //
K10D0239_H0240:296a-5: de la chung du na tshigs su bcad pa gcig
K10D0239_H0240:296a-6: tsam la skur bas bdag cag la mi dge ba'i
K10D0239_H0240:296a-7: las de dag gi dbang gis bskal pa dgu bcu
K10D0239_H0240:296a-8: rtsa gcig gi bar du 'khor bar 'khor zhing rtag
K10D0239_H0240:296a-9: tu sems can dmyal ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:296a-10: byol song gi skye gnas dang /
K10D0239_H0240:296a-11: yi dvags kyi 'jig rten du skyes te /
K10D0239_H0240:296a-16: shin tu mi bzad pa'i sdug bsngal chen po myong ste /

K10D0239_H0240:301a-9: byas na de'i sdig pa ni sngar bshad pa'i mtshams
K10D0239_H0240:301a-10: med pa lnga'i sdig pa bas tshad med grangs med
K10D0239_H0240:301a-12: de bas na khyed kyis deng nga'i mdun du shin
K10D0239_H0240:301a-13: tu bsam pa dag cing lhag pa'i 'dzem pa dang
K10D0239_H0240:301a-15: sngon mi dge ba'i las kyi sgrib pa thams cad
K10D0239_H0240:301a-16: so sor bshags pa'i phyir khyed la thugs rje chen
K10D0239_H0240:301a-17: pos rjes su bzung bas khyed kyi sdig pa'i las
K10D0239_H0240:301a-18: kyi sgrib pa thams cad khad kyis byang bar gyur
K10D0239_H0240:301a-19: te / sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir bskal pa bzang
K10D0239_H0240:301a-20: po'i sangs rgyas stong 'byung ba thams cad la'ang khyed
K10D0239_H0240:301a-21: kyis 'di bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa de dag
K10D0239_H0240:301a-22: gi spyan sngar yang sdig pa'i las kyi sgrib pa
K10D0239_H0240:301a-23: thams cad shin tu so sor shogs shig /
K10D0239_H0240:301a-24: ma 'ongs pa'i nyes pa'ang shin tu bsrung bar gyis shig /
K10D0239_H0240:301a-25: bskal pa bzang po'i sangs rgyas stong gi tha ma snang mdzad ces bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa /
K10D0239_H0240:301b-0: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i @301b sangs rgyas /
K10D0239_H0240:301b-2: zhabs su ldan pa; bde bar gshegs pa /
K10D0239_H0240:301b-4: bla na med pa skyes bu 'dul zhing kha lo sgyur ba /
K10D0239_H0240:301b-7: bcom ldan 'das de'i spyan sngar yang sdig pa'i las
K10D0239_H0240:301b-8: kyi sgrib pa thams cad shin tu so sor shogs
K10D0239_H0240:301b-9: shig dang / lhag ma ma lus par yongs su byang bar 'gyur ro //
K10D0239_H0240:301b-10: de'i tshe nyan thos de dag dang /
K10D0239_H0240:301b-11: byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis gsol ba /
K10D0239_H0240:301b-14: bdag cag gal te 'di ltar sangs rgyas stong gi
K10D0239_H0240:301b-15: tha ma snang mdzad kyi tshe yang dag pa'i lta
K10D0239_H0240:301b-16: ba thob cing log par lta ba rnam par spangs
K10D0239_H0240:301b-17: te / sdig pa'i las kyi sgrib pa thams cad
K10D0239_H0240:301b-18: lhag ma ma lus par 'byang zhing sdug bsngal thams
K10D0239_H0240:301b-19: cad las rnam par grol bar 'gyur na /
K10D0239_H0240:301b-20: bdag cag bskal pa bzang po 'di la mtshams med pa'i sems can dmyal bar skyes te /
K10D0239_H0240:301b-21: sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs myong na'ang bzod do //
K10D0239_H0240:301b-22: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10D0239_H0240:301b-25: khyed kyis 'di ltar rtul phod pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:301b-26: shin tu 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus brtan pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:301b-27: smon lam gyi mthus gdon mi za bar sangs rgyas
K10D0239_H0240:301b-28: snang mdzad kyi tshe sngon gyi las kyi sgrib pa
K10D0239_H0240:301b-30: lhag pa'i bsam pas bsti stang dang bcas te bsnyen bkur dang /
K10D0239_H0240:301b-31: mchod pa gdon mi za bar byed par 'gyur ro //
K10D0239_H0240:302a-1: pa snang mdzad kyis kyang gdon mi za bar nyon
K10D0239_H0240:302a-2: mongs pa thams cad yongs su gcad pa'i dgra bcom
K10D0239_H0240:302a-4: gdon mi za bar ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo'i yon tan gyi khyad par thob par mdzad do //
K10D0239_H0240:302a-5: de nas nyan thos de dag dang /
K10D0239_H0240:302a-6: byang chub sems dpa' de dag dga' bzhin du bcom
K10D0239_H0240:302a-7: ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag btsal nas phyir yang
K10D0239_H0240:302a-9: de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa'
K10D0239_H0240:302a-10: sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying po la bka'
K10D0239_H0240:302a-12: ngas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten thams cad la brtags na /
K10D0239_H0240:302a-13: ma 'ongs pa'i dus na sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir
K10D0239_H0240:302a-14: tshad med grangs med bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong
K10D0239_H0240:302a-15: snyed kyi rgyal rigs gdol pa can dang /
K10D0239_H0240:302a-16: bram ze gdol pa can dang /
K10D0239_H0240:302a-17: blon po gdol pa can dang /
K10D0239_H0240:302a-18: khyim bdag gdol pa can dang /
K10D0239_H0240:302a-19: tshong dpon gdol pa can dang /
K10D0239_H0240:302a-20: dge sbyong gdol pa can dang /
K10D0239_H0240:302a-23: gdol pa can gyi skyes pa'am /
K10D0239_H0240:302a-24: bud med la sogs pa de dag dge ba'i rtsa
K10D0239_H0240:302a-25: ba chung ngu bskyed pas mi'i lus thob tu zin
K10D0239_H0240:302a-26: kyang mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang sten cing log
K10D0239_H0240:302a-27: pa'i lta ba bskyed pas sdig pa mi dge ba'i
K10D0239_H0240:302a-28: las kyis nga'i bla na med pa'i dam pa'i chos
K10D0239_H0240:302a-29: shin tu zab mo 'jig par byed do //
K10D0239_H0240:302a-30: nga'i bstan pa rgyas par mi byed /
K10D0239_H0240:302b-0: @302b rgyas pa rnams med par byed cing mos pa mi skyed /
K10D0239_H0240:302b-1: ngas bstan pa'i nyan thos kyi theg pa can gyi dam pa'i chos la 'phya zhing skur te /
K10D0239_H0240:302b-3: bar chad byed cing rgyas par mi byed pa dang
K10D0239_H0240:302b-4: bar bar ni ngas bstan pa'i rang sangs rgyas kyi
K10D0239_H0240:302b-5: theg pa can gyi dam pa'i chos la 'phya zhing
K10D0239_H0240:302b-7: bar chad byed cing rgyas par mi byed pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:302b-8: bar bar ni ngas bstan pa'i bla na med pa'i
K10D0239_H0240:302b-9: theg pa can gyi dam pa'i chos la 'phya zhing
K10D0239_H0240:302b-11: bar chad byed cing rgyas par mi byed pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:302b-12: bar bar ni ngas bstan pa la rab tu byung ba chos kyi snod dang /
K10D0239_H0240:302b-13: chos kyi snod ma yin pa la zhe sdang skyed cing gshe ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:302b-16: tshig rnam pa sna tshogs kyis gnod par glags lta ste /
K10D0239_H0240:302b-18: yon tan bcas nas nyes pa bsgrags te /
K10D0239_H0240:302b-19: de bzhin du smod pa'i sems kyis 'tshe ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:302b-20: gnod pa rnam pa sna tshogs byed do //
K10D0239_H0240:302b-21: de ltar gang zag 'phags pa'i chos kyi snod du
K10D0239_H0240:302b-22: ma gyur pa de'ang yang dag par glen zhing gti
K10D0239_H0240:302b-23: mug gi rang bzhin can yin te /
K10D0239_H0240:302b-24: cung zad tsam gyi shes pa snyems pa'i nga rgyal
K10D0239_H0240:302b-25: can de 'di nas tshe 'phos ma thag tu ngan
K10D0239_H0240:302b-27: tshad med pa snyed kyi shin tu mi bzad pa'i sdug bsngal chen po myong bar 'gyur ro //
K10D0239_H0240:302b-28: bskal pa tshad med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya
K10D0239_H0240:302b-29: stong gi bar du mi'i lus thob par dka' ba
K10D0239_H0240:303a-0: nas de bzhin du rgyas par gong du bshad @303a
K10D0239_H0240:303a-3: sems can de mtshams med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen po na 'dug ste /
K10D0239_H0240:303a-4: sdug bsngal chen po myong yang sla yi /
K10D0239_H0240:303a-5: de lta bu'i lus kyi sdig pa can nga rgyal gyis mngon par zin pa /
K10D0239_H0240:303a-6: sdig pa'i bshes gnyen gyi rjes su 'brang zhing mi dge ba'i las byed pas 'khor bar 'khor te /
K10D0239_H0240:303a-7: shin tu bsgral dka' ba rtag tu 'khor bar sdug
K10D0239_H0240:303a-8: bsngal gyis gdungs par gyur pa ni ma yin no
K10D0239_H0240:303a-9: // de'i tshe 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de'i nang na
K10D0239_H0240:303a-10: blo gros chen po can gyi sems can tshad med
K10D0239_H0240:303a-11: grangs med pa snyed stan las langs te /
K10D0239_H0240:303a-12: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag btsal nas /
K10D0239_H0240:303a-13: bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal
K10D0239_H0240:303a-14: mo sbyar te mchi ma blags nas bcom ldan 'das
K10D0239_H0240:303a-17: 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi sems can 'di dag mi'i
K10D0239_H0240:303a-18: lus shin tu thob par dka' ba rnyed kyang dad
K10D0239_H0240:303a-20: yang dag pa'i smon lam yongs su spong ngo //

K10D0239_H0240:303a-26: tshul khrims dag pa yongs su spong ngo //
K10D0239_H0240:303a-27: yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K10D0239_H0240:303a-28: yang dag pa'i shes rab yongs su spong ngo //
K10D0239_H0240:303b-0: sems can 'di dag @303b shin tu thob par dka' ba'i mi'i lus thob mod kyi /
K10D0239_H0240:303b-1: glen pa mi shes pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:303b-2: nga rgyal gyi dbang gis ji ltar gong du bshad pa'i sdig lci ba rnams kun bgyid de /
K10D0239_H0240:303b-3: bcom ldan 'das kyi dam pa'i chos la 'phya zhing skur ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:303b-4: bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ba'i nye gnas la 'tshe ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:303b-6: bdag cag deng bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar sems rtse gcig pas yang dag pa'i yi dam bca'o //
K10D0239_H0240:303b-7: bdag cag deng slan chad 'khor bar 'khor ba 'di
K10D0239_H0240:303b-8: phan chad nas nam rnam par grol ba ma thob
K10D0239_H0240:303b-9: kyi bar du de lta bu'i sdig pa'i grogs po
K10D0239_H0240:303b-11: de lta bu'i sdig pa'i las mi bgyid pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:303b-12: sangs rgyas kyi dam pa'i chos la mi skur ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:303b-13: rab tu byung ba'i gang zag la gnod pa mi bgyid pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:303b-14: sems can gyi chos kyi mig mi 'byin pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:303b-15: dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung rgyun mi 'chad par dam bcas pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:303b-17: bdag cag la thugs rtse ba'i slad du dam bcas pa de dag rjes su gzung bar gsol /
K10D0239_H0240:303b-18: de'i tshe 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de'i nang na sems
K10D0239_H0240:303b-19: can blo dang ldan pa tshad med pa bye ba
K10D0239_H0240:303b-20: khrag khrig brgya stong snyed stan las langs te /
K10D0239_H0240:303b-21: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag btsal
K10D0239_H0240:303b-22: nas thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das
K10D0239_H0240:304a-1: 'das kyi spyan sngar bsam pa nges par dam bca' bar 'tshal te /
K10D0239_H0240:304a-2: 'khor bar 'khor ba 'di phan chad nas nam chos
K10D0239_H0240:304a-3: kyi bzod pa ma thob kyi bar du rgyal por
K10D0239_H0240:304a-4: ma gyur cig / blon por ma gyur cig /
K10D0239_H0240:304a-5: yul gyi ston par ma gyur cig /
K10D0239_H0240:304a-8: grong 'dab kyi bdag por ma gyur cig /
K10D0239_H0240:304a-9: dmag la dbang ba'i bdag por ma gyur cig /
K10D0239_H0240:304a-10: tshong dpon du ma gyur cig /

K10D0239_H0240:304a-18: khyim pa'i lus su ma gyur cig /
K10D0239_H0240:304a-19: zhal che lce gcod pa'i dpang po ma gyur cig /
K10D0239_H0240:304a-21: btsan pa'i dbang por ma gyur cig /
K10D0239_H0240:304a-22: bdag cag chos kyi bzod pa ma thob par de
K10D0239_H0240:304a-23: lta bu'i gnas su skyes na de nyid sangs rgyas
K10D0239_H0240:304a-24: kyi bstan pa la mi dge ba'i rgyur 'gyur ba
K10D0239_H0240:304a-25: zhes bya ste / kha na ma tho ba'i sdig pa chen po byed pas /
K10D0239_H0240:304a-26: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i dam pa'i chos la 'phya zhing skur ba zhes bgyi'o //
K10D0239_H0240:304a-27: sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ba la 'tshe zhing gnod pa bgyid pa'o //
K10D0239_H0240:304a-28: sems can mang po'i chos kyi mig 'byin pa'o //
K10D0239_H0240:304a-29: dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung rgyun gcod pa'o //
K10D0239_H0240:304a-30: sems can tshad med pa la gnod pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:304b-1: de'i dbang gis gdon mi 'tshal bar mtshams med pa'i sems can dmyal bar ltung ste /
K10D0239_H0240:304b-2: ngan song du 'khor ba las thar pa'i dus ma mchis so //
K10D0239_H0240:304b-4: bdag cag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du smon lam 'di dag byin gyis brlab par gsol /
K10D0239_H0240:304b-5: de'i tshe 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor der 'dus pa'i lha dang /
K10D0239_H0240:304b-10: mi ma yin la sogs pa thams cad stan las langs te /
K10D0239_H0240:304b-11: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal
K10D0239_H0240:304b-12: nas mchi ma blags te thal mo sbyar ba btud
K10D0239_H0240:304b-13: nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to
K10D0239_H0240:304b-15: bdag cag thog ma ma mchis pa nas 'khor bar 'khor zhing glen pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:304b-17: nga rgyal gyi dbang gis mi dge ba'i las thams cad bskyed de /
K10D0239_H0240:304b-18: lus kyi las mi dge ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:304b-19: ngag gi las mi dge ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:304b-20: yid kyi las mi dge ba bdag gis bgyis pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:304b-21: gzhan bgyid du stsal pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:304b-23: thos pa la rjes su yi rang ba'i sdig pa
K10D0239_H0240:304b-24: de dag thams cad deng bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan
K10D0239_H0240:304b-26: mi 'chab pa'i sems kyis so sor bshags pas slan chad mi bgyid par yongs su bsrung ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:304b-27: ma mchis pa'i dus kyi sgrib par 'gyur ba'i sdig pa byang bar gyur cig /
K10D0239_H0240:305a-0: @305a *// lan gsum gyi bar du brjod do //
K10D0239_H0240:305a-1: deng slan chad 'khor ba'i mthas gtugs pa'i bar du
K10D0239_H0240:305a-2: rtag tu sdig pa'i grogs po dang mi phrad pa
K10D0239_H0240:305a-3: dang / mi dge ba'i dbang du ma gyur cig /
K10D0239_H0240:305a-4: gal te phrad na'ang de'i rjes su mi 'jug par bsam pa nges pas dam bca' bar 'tshal lo //
K10D0239_H0240:305a-5: sdig pa'i las de dag thams cad bgyid par ma gyur cig /
K10D0239_H0240:305a-6: bdag cag yun ring por sdug bsngal myong bar ma gyur cig /
K10D0239_H0240:305a-8: bdag cag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du smon lam 'di dag rjes su gzung bar gsol /
K10D0239_H0240:305a-9: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dus pa'i 'khor de dag thams cad la bka' stsal pa /
K10D0239_H0240:305a-12: khyed ma 'ongs pa'i sdug bsngal gyis 'jigs pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:305a-13: 'dzem pas so sor bshags pa legs so //
