K10D0239_H0240:311a-12: thams cad 'phags pa'i chos kyi ye shes rdo rje
K10D0239_H0240:311a-13: ltar sra la rno bas lhag ma ma lus par
K10D0239_H0240:311a-14: bcom ste rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu mi myong
K10D0239_H0240:311a-15: ba dang / gsar du sdig pa mi dge ba'i las thams cad mi byed pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:311a-17: sgyid lug pa med pa'i sems kyis bla na med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:311a-18: byang chub kyi yan lag rin po che sna bdun
K10D0239_H0240:311a-19: nan tan byed pa la skyo zhing sgyid lug ba
K10D0239_H0240:311a-21: sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i nad rnams
K10D0239_H0240:311a-22: 'jil pa la skyo zhing sgyid lug pa med pa'i
K10D0239_H0240:311a-23: sems kyis sems can thams cad kyi rten dang /
K10D0239_H0240:311a-24: gnas su 'gyur zhing nye bar 'tsho ba yin no //
K10D0239_H0240:311b-0: 'khor los @311b bsgyur ba'i rgyal po rin po che
K10D0239_H0240:311b-1: sna bdun dang ldan pa ni gar 'gro'ang rin po
K10D0239_H0240:311b-3: rin po che gzhan de'i phyi bzhin du 'brang ngo //
K10D0239_H0240:311b-4: gling bzhi kun tu rgyu zhing sems can thams cad kyi lus dang /
K10D0239_H0240:311b-5: sems kyi rnyog pa thams cad kyang bsal te /
K10D0239_H0240:311b-6: sems can thams cad kyi lus dang /
K10D0239_H0240:311b-7: sems kyi bde ba'ang skye zhing 'phel bar byed do //
K10D0239_H0240:311b-8: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang de bzhin
K10D0239_H0240:311b-9: du 'khor lo bcu po 'di dang ldan na nyan
K10D0239_H0240:311b-10: thos kyi theg pa la 'khrul pa med pa nas
K10D0239_H0240:311b-11: / sems can thams cad kyi rten dang /
K10D0239_H0240:311b-12: gnas su 'gyur zhing nye bar 'tsho ba'i bar du 'thob par 'gyur ro //
K10D0239_H0240:311b-15: shing rta chen po ni 'khor lo bzhi dang ldan te /
K10D0239_H0240:311b-16: mi mang po de'i nang du 'dug nas lam chen por 'gro'o //
K10D0239_H0240:311b-25: 'bras bu ji snyed yod pa thams cad shing rta'i
K10D0239_H0240:311b-26: 'khor lo de'i 'og tu song nas thams cad chag
K10D0239_H0240:311b-27: cing grugs te nor du mi rung bar byed do
K10D0239_H0240:311b-28: // de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
K10D0239_H0240:311b-29: chen po'ang 'khor lo rnam pa bcu dang ldan na
K10D0239_H0240:311b-30: nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:311b-31: sems can gyi sgrib pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:311b-32: chos kyi sgrib pa thams cad yongs su bcom ste /
K10D0239_H0240:311b-33: rnam par smin pa mi len par byed do //
K10D0239_H0240:312a-1: cig 'phangs pas phas rgol ba'i dgra'i mgo dang /
K10D0239_H0240:312a-3: de spyod pa'i mthu med par byed do //
K10D0239_H0240:312a-4: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
K10D0239_H0240:312a-5: po'ang 'khor lo rnam pa bcu po 'di dang ldan
K10D0239_H0240:312a-6: na rgyud lngar 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal chen po thams
K10D0239_H0240:312a-9: sdig pa'i las thams cad yongs su bcad de /
K10D0239_H0240:312a-10: rnam par smin pa len par mi byed do //
K10D0239_H0240:312a-13: me'i bskal pa byung ba'i tshe nyi ma lnga gcig car shar nas gling bzhi'i klung dang /
K10D0239_H0240:312a-16: chu'i khams su gtogs pa gsher ba thams cad gang yang mi skems pa med do //
K10D0239_H0240:312a-17: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
K10D0239_H0240:312a-18: po'ang 'khor lo rnam pa bcu po 'di dang ldan
K10D0239_H0240:312a-20: nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:312a-21: sems can gyi sgrib pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:312a-23: sdug bsngal gyi rtsa bar smin pa thams cad yongs su skems par byed do //
K10D0239_H0240:312a-26: rlung gi bskal pa byung ba'i tshe phyogs bzhi nas
K10D0239_H0240:312a-27: rlung chen po dus gcig tu langs pas 'jig rten
K10D0239_H0240:312a-28: gyi khams thams cad na ri bo che chung dang
K10D0239_H0240:312a-29: / sa chen po rnams thams cad 'jig cing 'thor bar 'gyur ro //
K10D0239_H0240:312a-30: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
K10D0239_H0240:312b-0: po'ang 'khor lo rnam pa 'di @312b bcu dang ldan
K10D0239_H0240:312b-1: na 'jig rten gyi phyin ci log bzhi dang /
K10D0239_H0240:312b-2: nga rgyal gyi ri bo thams cad mi shigs pa gang yang med pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:312b-3: sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:312b-4: sems can gyi sgrib pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:312b-6: sdug bsngal gyi rnam par smin pa'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang 'jig cing 'thor bar 'gyur ro //
K10D0239_H0240:312b-9: seng ge'i rgyal po ral pa can gyi skad thang
K10D0239_H0240:312b-10: cig phyung bas gcan gzan thams cad 'phur ba dang
K10D0239_H0240:312b-11: / 'gro ba thams cad skrag cing 'gul mi nus par 'gyur ro //
K10D0239_H0240:312b-12: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
K10D0239_H0240:312b-13: po'ang 'khor lo rnam pa 'di bcu dang ldan pa'i
K10D0239_H0240:312b-14: chos kyi sgra thang cig bsgrags pas mu stegs can
K10D0239_H0240:312b-15: dang / log par ston pa'i sdig pa'i grogs su
K10D0239_H0240:312b-16: gyur pa thams cad 'jig skrag nas smra ba'i tshig
K10D0239_H0240:312b-21: brgya byin lha'i dbang po lha ma yin dang 'thab
K10D0239_H0240:312b-22: pa'i tshe lha'i dmag gis bskor cing lag na rdo
K10D0239_H0240:312b-23: rje thogs te g-yul du zhugs na lha ma yin
K10D0239_H0240:312b-24: thams cad skrag pas ldog par 'gyur ro //
K10D0239_H0240:312b-25: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
K10D0239_H0240:312b-26: po'ang 'khor lo rnam pa 'di bcu dang ldan na
K10D0239_H0240:312b-27: log par lta ba'i mu stegs can thams cad dang
K10D0239_H0240:312b-28: / log par ston pa'i sdig pa'i grogs po thams cad skrag nas 'bros par 'gyur ro //
K10D0239_H0240:313a-2: yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che rgyal mtshan
K10D0239_H0240:313a-3: gyi rtse mo la btags na rin po che rnam
K10D0239_H0240:313a-4: pa sna tshogs char bzhin du 'bab ste /
K10D0239_H0240:313a-5: dbul phongs pa'i sems can thams cad la sbyin pa byed do //
K10D0239_H0240:313a-6: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
K10D0239_H0240:313a-7: po'ang 'khor lo rnam pa 'di bcu dang ldan te
K10D0239_H0240:313a-8: / rnam par dag pa'i tshul khrims kyi rgyal mtshan
K10D0239_H0240:313a-9: la gnas na chos chen po'i char rab tu 'bebs
K10D0239_H0240:313a-10: pas sems can tshad med pa snyed thams cad la
K10D0239_H0240:313a-14: mtshan mo'i dus su 'jig rten kun mun par gyur
K10D0239_H0240:313a-15: pas 'thom zhing 'brog bslad pa na zla ba nya
K10D0239_H0240:313a-16: ba shar bas mun pa thams cad bsal te /
K10D0239_H0240:313a-17: 'brog bslad pa rnams kyi lam mtshon par 'gyur ba de bzhin du /
K10D0239_H0240:313a-18: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang 'khor lo
K10D0239_H0240:313a-19: rnam pa 'di bcu dang ldan na sems can gang
K10D0239_H0240:313a-20: ma rig pa'i mun pas ldongs te 'phags pa'i lam
K10D0239_H0240:313a-21: yan lag brgyad stor ba rnams la byang chub sems
K10D0239_H0240:313a-22: dpa' dam pa'i chos bshad de /
K10D0239_H0240:313a-23: ma rig pa'i mun pa thams cad bsal nas /
K10D0239_H0240:313a-24: chos kyi snang ba skyes pa'i phyir 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mngon du gyur te /
K10D0239_H0240:313a-25: zag pa thams cad bcad nas sdug bsngal gyi mtha' zad par byed do //
K10D0239_H0240:313b-0: nyi ma'i dkyil @313b 'khor chen po 'jig rten du
K10D0239_H0240:313b-1: shar ba na lo tog thams cad skye zhing 'phel
K10D0239_H0240:313b-4: lo ma thams cad rgyas pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:313b-5: mnam zhing btsog pa thams cad sel ba dang; lo tog gi 'bru dang /
K10D0239_H0240:313b-6: sman gyi 'bras bu thams cad smin pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:313b-7: gangs kyi ri bo kun zhu bas 'babs chu kun brug ste /
K10D0239_H0240:313b-8: rim gyis rgya mtsho chen por 'bab par 'gyur ro //
K10D0239_H0240:313b-9: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
K10D0239_H0240:313b-10: po'ang 'khor lo rnam pa 'di bcu dang ldan te
K10D0239_H0240:313b-11: / lhag pa'i sbyin pa la gnas shing /
K10D0239_H0240:313b-13: bde ba'i bzod pa dang; brtson 'grus dang /
K10D0239_H0240:313b-19: spobs pa'i yon tan shin tu rgyas shing sems can thams cad la dam pa'i chos ston to //
K10D0239_H0240:313b-20: chos de'i 'od kyi gzi brjid kyis sems can thams
K10D0239_H0240:313b-21: cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba lhag pa'i lo tog
K10D0239_H0240:313b-22: rnam pa sna tshogs skye zhing 'phel ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:313b-23: lhag pa'i spyod pa pa dam pa'i me tog dang /
K10D0239_H0240:313b-24: lo ma rnam pa sna tshogs shin tu rgyas pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:313b-25: nyon mongs pa'i las ngan pa thams cad yongs su sel ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:313b-27: mya ngan las 'da' ba'i 'bras bu yongs su smin par 'gyur ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:313b-29: nga rgyal gyi ri bo thams cad zhu zhing 'bab pas yang dag pa'i dad pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:314a-1: ting nge 'dzin gyi chu rim gyis 'bab cing mya ngan las 'da' ba'i rgya mtsho 'gengs pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:314a-2: sems can thams cad yid bzhin du 'jigs pa med
K10D0239_H0240:314a-3: pa mya ngan las 'da' ba'i grong khyer du 'jug
K10D0239_H0240:314a-5: de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems
K10D0239_H0240:314a-6: dpa' chen po'i 'khor lo bcu po gang zhe na
K10D0239_H0240:314a-8: 'khor lo bcu zhes bya ba ni chos gzhan la mi gdags kyi /
K10D0239_H0240:314a-9: dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam nyid yin par shes par bya'o //
K10D0239_H0240:314a-10: 'khor lo rnam pa bcu po 'di dag dang ldan
K10D0239_H0240:314a-11: pas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
K10D0239_H0240:314a-12: zhes bya ste / sdig pa thams cad las rnam par grol ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:314a-13: dge ba'i chos thams cad yid bzhin du rdzogs pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:314a-14: myur du mya ngan las 'da' ba chen po'i rgya mtsho yongs su 'gengs pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:314a-15: thabs mkhas pa chen po'i ye shes kyi 'od kyis
K10D0239_H0240:314a-16: skye bo thams cad yongs su smin par byed cing
K10D0239_H0240:314a-17: thams cad la phan pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:314a-18: bde ba yongs su thob par byed do //
K10D0239_H0240:314a-21: snga ma 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams
K10D0239_H0240:314a-22: cad kyis kyang mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam
K10D0239_H0240:314a-24: dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam 'di la yongs su bsngags pas 'bras bu thob par gyur to //
K10D0239_H0240:314b-0: de bas na gang gis @314b dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam bshad pa 'di dag las /
K10D0239_H0240:314b-1: 'ga' zhig nam 'tsho'i bar du ma nyams par srung
K10D0239_H0240:314b-2: na 'bras bu khyad par can mchog tu 'gyur ba
K10D0239_H0240:314b-3: thams cad thob pa ni ji ltar bshad pa bzhin
K10D0239_H0240:314b-6: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang nam
K10D0239_H0240:314b-7: 'tsho'i bar du srog gcod pa yongs su spangs na
K10D0239_H0240:314b-8: de nyid sems can thams cad la mi 'jigs pa
K10D0239_H0240:314b-10: sems can dag la 'jigs shing bag tsha bar mi
K10D0239_H0240:314b-11: byed pas de'i 'jigs pa'i sdug bsngal mi skyed pa'i
K10D0239_H0240:314b-12: dbang gis dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad myur du
K10D0239_H0240:314b-14: thog ma med pa'i mtha' nas rgyud lngar 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor bying ba /
K10D0239_H0240:314b-15: srog gcod pa'i dbang gis lus dang /
K10D0239_H0240:314b-17: yid kyis sdig pa mi dge ba'i las bdag kyang
K10D0239_H0240:314b-18: byed la gzhan yang byed du 'jug cing mthong ba
K10D0239_H0240:314b-19: dang / thos pa'i rjes su yi rang ba las byung ba'i nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:314b-20: sems can gyi sgrib pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:314b-22: tshe'i sgrib pas bsgribs par gyur to //
K10D0239_H0240:314b-23: 'di ltar srog gcod pa yongs su spangs pa'i 'khor
K10D0239_H0240:314b-24: los de dag lhag ma ma lus par yongs su
K10D0239_H0240:314b-25: bcom zhing brnyil bas rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu
K10D0239_H0240:314b-28: mi la sogs pa kun dga' zhing yid du 'ong ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:315a-3: sems rab tu bde zhing yun ring du 'tsho bar 'gyur ro //
K10D0239_H0240:315a-4: 'chi 'pho ba'i dus byed pa na'ang lus dang /
K10D0239_H0240:315a-5: sems la sdug bsngal gyis mi gdung zhing yid du 'ong ba'i bu dang /
K10D0239_H0240:315a-7: 'khor thams cad kyis yongs su bskor bas 'chi 'pho ba'i dus byed kyi /
K10D0239_H0240:315a-8: shin tu 'jigs pa gshin rje'i bo nya mthong bar mi 'gyur ro //
K10D0239_H0240:315a-10: yid du 'ong ba'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen chos kyis dul ba tshul khrims dang /
K10D0239_H0240:315a-11: yon tan du ldan pa bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag pa dang phrad de; lus dang /
K10D0239_H0240:315a-12: sems rab tu dga' ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:315a-13: de la bkur sti dang bcas pas shin tu dad pa skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10D0239_H0240:315a-14: yang tshe 'phos nas kyang phyir mi'i nang du skyes te /
K10D0239_H0240:315a-15: dbang po yongs su rdzogs shing yan lag dang ldan pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:315a-16: gang nas gang du skyes par nad med pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:315a-20: rab tu bde zhing skyid pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:315a-22: yid du 'ong ba'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen chos kyis dul ba tshul khrims dang /
K10D0239_H0240:315a-23: yon tan du ldan pa bsod nams kyi zhing yang
K10D0239_H0240:315a-24: dag pa dang phrad de; de'i rjes su slob pa
K10D0239_H0240:315a-25: dang / srog gcod pa yongs su spong ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:315a-26: sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su gcod pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:315b-0: dge ba'i chos khyad par can thams cad @315b yongs su rdzogs pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:315b-1: theg pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs thams cad tshol ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:315b-2: byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam dang /
K10D0239_H0240:315b-3: spyod pa thams cad la rim gyis gzhol zhing shin
K10D0239_H0240:315b-4: tu yangs pa'i ye shes kyi rgya mtsho la 'jug
K10D0239_H0240:315b-5: pa nas bla na med pa'i byang chub thob pa'i
K10D0239_H0240:315b-7: sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtshon cha med pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:315b-9: 'tshe ba'i ming mi grag pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:315b-10: 'jigs pa thams cad dang bral te rab tu bde skyid pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:315b-12: tshe ring ba'i zhing du sems can dag skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10D0239_H0240:315b-13: de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshe'i tshad kyang dpag tu med de /
K10D0239_H0240:315b-14: sems can dag cis 'dul ba bzhin du dam pa'i chos ston to //
K10D0239_H0240:315b-15: yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang dam pa'i
K10D0239_H0240:315b-16: chos yun ring du gnas shing sems can tshad med
K10D0239_H0240:315b-18: bde ba'i don byed par 'gyur ro //
K10D0239_H0240:315b-20: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
K10D0239_H0240:315b-21: srog gcod pa yongs su spangs pa'i 'khor lo ste
K10D0239_H0240:315b-22: dang po'o // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
K10D0239_H0240:315b-23: po 'khor lo de dang ldan na nyan thos kyi
K10D0239_H0240:315b-24: theg pa la 'khrul ba med par 'gyur /
K10D0239_H0240:315b-25: nyan thos kyi theg pa'i gang zag la 'khrul ba med par 'gyur ro //
K10D0239_H0240:315b-26: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la 'khrul ba med par 'gyur /
K10D0239_H0240:315b-27: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i gang zag la 'khrul ba med par 'gyur ro //
K10D0239_H0240:315b-28: theg pa chen po la 'khrul ba med par 'gyur ro //
K10D0239_H0240:316a-1: po'i gang zag la 'khrul ba med par 'gyur ro //
K10D0239_H0240:316a-2: dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung yongs su 'phel ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:316a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ba'i nye gnas chos kyi snod dam /
K10D0239_H0240:316a-4: chos kyi snod ma yin pa'ang rung /
K10D0239_H0240:316a-5: chung ngu na chos kyi gos kyi tshal bu gyon cing skra dang /
K10D0239_H0240:316a-6: kha spu bregs pa la 'khrul ba med par 'gyur
K10D0239_H0240:316a-7: ro; ;theg pa chen po'i chos la gong nas gong
K10D0239_H0240:316a-8: du 'bar zhing phyir mi ldog pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:316a-10: bsod nams kyi khyad par rtag tu skye zhing 'phel ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:316a-13: sa rnams thams cad la dbang du 'gyur zhing phyir mi ldog pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:316a-14: rtag tu dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang phrad cing rjes su 'gro ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:316a-15: rtag tu sangs rgyas thams cad mthong ba dang mi 'bral zhing byang chub sems dpa' dang /
K10D0239_H0240:316a-16: nyan thos kyi nye gnas mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:316a-17: chos thos pa dang mi 'bral ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:316a-19: bsnyen bkur byed pa dang mi 'bral ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:316a-20: dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad tshol ba la brtson pas sems mi ngoms pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:316a-21: byang chub kyi spyod pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:316a-22: smon lam rnam pa sna tshogs kyi /

K10D0239_H0240:332a-2: kha spu bregs pa la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur ro //

K10D0239_H0240:332a-12: nyan thos kyi nye gnas mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:332a-13: chos thos pa dang mi 'bral ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:332a-15: bsnyen bkur byed pa dang mi 'bral ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:332a-16: dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad tshol ba la brtson pas sems mi ngoms pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:332a-17: byang chub kyi spyod pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:332a-18: smon lam rnam pa sna tshogs kyis sems mi ngoms par 'gyur te /
K10D0239_H0240:332a-19: 'bras bu gzhan dag thob pa'ang ji skad bstan pa bzhin no //
K10D0239_H0240:332a-22: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang nam
K10D0239_H0240:332a-23: 'tsho'i bar du log par lta ba yongs su spangs
K10D0239_H0240:332a-24: na sems can thams cad kyis bkur zhing bla mar
K10D0239_H0240:332b-0: byed pa dang / sems rnam par dag @332b cing log par rtog pa dang bral bar 'gyur te /
K10D0239_H0240:332b-1: de'i dbang gis dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
K10D0239_H0240:332b-2: thog ma med pa'i mtha' nas rgyud lngar 'khor bar
K10D0239_H0240:332b-3: 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor 'bying ba'ang log par ltung ba'i
K10D0239_H0240:332b-6: yid kyi sdig pa mi dge ba'i las bdag kyang
K10D0239_H0240:332b-7: byed la gzhan yang byed du 'jug cing mthong ba
K10D0239_H0240:332b-8: dang thos pa'i rjes su yi rang ba las byung
K10D0239_H0240:332b-9: ba'i nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:332b-10: sems can gyi sgrib pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:332b-12: yang dag par lta ba la sgrib pas bsgribs par
K10D0239_H0240:332b-13: gyur to; ;'di ltar log par lta ba yongs su
K10D0239_H0240:332b-14: spangs pa'i 'khor los lhag ma ma lus par bcom
K10D0239_H0240:332b-15: pas rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu yongs su mi
K10D0239_H0240:332b-16: len te / lus 'di nyid la'ang lha dang /
K10D0239_H0240:332b-17: mi la sogs pa kun dga' zhing yid du 'ong ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:332b-18: dogs pa med par 'gyur ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:332b-20: sems rab tu bde ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:332b-21: sems rnam par dag cing log par lta ba dang bral bar 'gyur ro //
K10D0239_H0240:332b-22: 'chi 'pho ba'i dus byed pa na'ang lus dang /
K10D0239_H0240:332b-23: sems la sdug bsngal gyis mi gdung zhing yid du 'ong ba'i bu dang /
K10D0239_H0240:332b-25: 'khor thams cad kyis yongs su bskor bas 'chi 'pho ba'i dus byed par 'gyur gyi /
K10D0239_H0240:332b-26: shin tu 'jigs pa'i gshin rje'i pho nya mthong bar mi 'gyur ro //
K10D0239_H0240:333a-0: yid du 'ong ba'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen chos @333a *//
K10D0239_H0240:333a-1: kyis dul ba tshul khrims dang /
K10D0239_H0240:333a-3: bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag pa dang phrad de /
K10D0239_H0240:333a-5: sems rab tu dga' ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:333a-6: bkur sti dang bcas pas shin tu dad pa skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10D0239_H0240:333a-7: tshe 'phos nas kyang phyir mi'i nang du skye zhing
K10D0239_H0240:333a-8: dbang po yongs su rdzogs pa yan lag dang ldan
K10D0239_H0240:333a-9: pa dang / gang nas gang du skyes par sems
K10D0239_H0240:333a-10: rnam par dag cing log par lta ba dang bral
K10D0239_H0240:333a-11: pa dang / ba dang / byad gzugs bzang pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:333a-13: rab tu bde zhing skyid pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:333a-14: phyir yang yid du 'ong ba'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen chos kyis dul ba /
K10D0239_H0240:333a-15: tshul khrims dang yon tan du ldan pa /
K10D0239_H0240:333a-16: bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag pa dang phrad de /
K10D0239_H0240:333a-17: de'i rjes su mthun par slob pa dang; log par lta ba'i chos yongs su spong ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:333a-18: sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su gcod pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:333a-19: dge ba'i chos khyad par can thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:333a-20: theg pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs thams cad tshol ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:333a-21: byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam dang /
K10D0239_H0240:333a-22: spyod pa thams cad rim gyis gzhol zhing shin tu
K10D0239_H0240:333a-23: yangs pa'i ye shes kyi rgya mtsho la 'jug pa
K10D0239_H0240:333a-24: nas bla na med pa'i byang chub 'thob pa'i bar
K10D0239_H0240:333a-25: du 'gyur ro // sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyan thos dang /
K10D0239_H0240:333a-26: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang bral ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:333b-0: @333b lha'i bdud kyi 'khor thams cad dang bral ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:333b-1: mu stegs can gyi 'khor thams cad dang bral ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:333b-2: rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs kyis brgyan cing shin tu mdzes pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:333b-3: yang dag par lta ba dang ldan zhing ngo mtshar dang /
K10D0239_H0240:333b-5: tshul ngan pa'i lta ba sna tshogs dang /
K10D0239_H0240:333b-9: bdag gir lta ba thams cad mongs su spangs pa'i sems can dag zhing der skye ste /
K10D0239_H0240:333b-10: shin tu tshe ring ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:333b-11: theg pa chen po'i ro gcig la longs spyod par 'gyur ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:333b-12: de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshe'i tshad kyang dpag tu med de /
K10D0239_H0240:333b-13: sems can dag cis 'dul ba bzhin du chos ston pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:333b-14: yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas shing /
K10D0239_H0240:333b-15: sems can tshad med pa la phan pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:333b-16: bde ba'i don du ro gcig pa'i chos bstan pa
K10D0239_H0240:333b-17: la rtsod pa med pas yongs su rgyas par byed
K10D0239_H0240:333b-18: cing bgegs dang / bar chad med par 'gyur ro //
K10D0239_H0240:333b-20: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
K10D0239_H0240:333b-21: log par lta ba yongs su spangs pa'i 'khor lo
K10D0239_H0240:333b-22: bcu pa'o // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
K10D0239_H0240:333b-23: po 'khor lo rnam pa bcu po 'di dang ldan
K10D0239_H0240:333b-24: pas nyan thos kyi theg pa la 'khrul pa med
K10D0239_H0240:333b-25: bcu pa'o // par 'gyur / nyan thos kyi theg
K10D0239_H0240:333b-26: pa'i gang zag la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur ro
K10D0239_H0240:334a-0: bcu pa'o // par 'gyur / // rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa @334a *//
K10D0239_H0240:334a-2: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i gang zag la 'khrul ba med par 'gyur ro //
K10D0239_H0240:334a-3: theg pa chen po la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur /
K10D0239_H0240:334a-4: theg pa chen po'i gang zag la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur ro //
K10D0239_H0240:334a-5: dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung yongs su 'phel ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:334a-6: de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ba'i nye gnas chos kyi snod dam /
K10D0239_H0240:334a-7: chos kyi snod ma yin pa la'ang rung /
K10D0239_H0240:334a-8: chung du na chos gos kyi tshal bu gyon cing skra dang /
K10D0239_H0240:334a-9: kha spu bregs pa la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:334a-10: theg pa chen po'i chos la gong nas gong du 'phar zhing phyir mi ldog pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:334a-12: bsod nams kyi khyad par rtag tu skye zhing 'phel ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:334a-16: sa rnams thams cad la dbang du 'gyur zhing phyir mi ldog pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:334a-17: rtag tu dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang phrad cing rjes su slob pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:334a-18: rtag tu sangs rgyas thams cad mthong ba dang mi 'bral zhing /
K10D0239_H0240:334a-20: nyan thos nye gnas mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:334a-21: chos thos pa dang mi 'bral ba dang; dge 'dun la mchod pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:334a-22: bsnyen bkur byed pa dang mi 'bral ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:334a-23: dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad tshol ba la brtson pas sems mi ngoms pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:334b-0: byang chub @334b kyi spyod pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:334b-2: pha rol tu phyin pa drug la sems mi ngoms par 'gyur te /
K10D0239_H0240:334b-3: 'bras bu gzhan 'thob pa'ang ji skad bshad pa bzhin no //
K10D0239_H0240:334b-5: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang 'khor
K10D0239_H0240:334b-6: lo rnam pa bcu po de dag dang ldan na
K10D0239_H0240:334b-7: myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
K10D0239_H0240:334b-8: pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya
K10D0239_H0240:334b-9: bar 'gyur ro // de ci'i phyir zhe na /
K10D0239_H0240:334b-10: snga ma 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
K10D0239_H0240:334b-11: pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad
K10D0239_H0240:334b-12: kyang mi dge ba bcu'i las yongs su spongs nas
K10D0239_H0240:334b-13: thams cad kyis dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam gyi
K10D0239_H0240:334b-15: sems can thams cad la bde ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:334b-17: byang chub kyi lam skye zhing 'phel bar bya ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:334b-18: sems can thams cad kyi las dang /
K10D0239_H0240:334b-19: nyon mongs pa'i sdug bsngal lhag ma ma lus par bsal bar bya ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:334b-20: ngan song gsum bskam par bya ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:334b-21: dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung bas ba par bya ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:334b-22: khams gsum gyi srid pa yongs su gcad par bya ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:334b-25: skye mched gcad par bya ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:334b-26: thams cad myur du 'jigs pa med pa'i mya ngan
K10D0239_H0240:334b-27: las 'da' ba'i grong khyer du gzung ba'i phyir ji
K10D0239_H0240:334b-28: skad bshad pa bzhin du mi dge ba bcu'i las
K10D0239_H0240:334b-29: kyi 'bras bu yongs su spong ngo //
K10D0239_H0240:335a-2: gal te yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du
K10D0239_H0240:335a-3: dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam 'di ma bsgrubs par
K10D0239_H0240:335a-5: chung du na yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin
K10D0239_H0240:335a-6: du dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam 'ga' tsam yang
K10D0239_H0240:335a-7: mi srung bar nga ni theg pa chen po yang
K10D0239_H0240:335a-9: nga ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sgrub pa'o zhes zer na /
K10D0239_H0240:335a-10: gang zag de ni shin tu brdzun par smra ba ste /
K10D0239_H0240:335a-11: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'jig rten slu ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:335a-13: ngo tsha ba med pa'ang stong par smra zhing chad par lta ba /
K10D0239_H0240:335a-14: glen pa mi shes pa slu ba can yin te /
K10D0239_H0240:335a-15: de tshe 'phos nas ngan song du ltung bar shes par bya'o //
K10D0239_H0240:335a-16: rigs kyi bu; gang tshig tu brjod pa tsam mam /
K10D0239_H0240:335a-17: mnyan pa tsam gyis chog ste /
K10D0239_H0240:335a-18: dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam bsgoms pa'am /
K10D0239_H0240:335a-19: nan tan bya mi dgos par byang chub dang /
K10D0239_H0240:335a-20: mya ngan las 'das par thob du zin na ni
K10D0239_H0240:335a-21: bskal pa gcig la yud tsam thang cig gis phyogs
K10D0239_H0240:335a-22: bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi sa'i khams
K10D0239_H0240:335a-23: kyi rdul phra mo snyed kyi sems can thams cad
K10D0239_H0240:335a-24: byang chub mngon par 'tshang rgya ste /
K10D0239_H0240:335a-25: mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur ba zhig na de ni de lta bu'i gnas med do //
K10D0239_H0240:335b-0: dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam ni theg pa chen po'i rtsa @335b ba yin te /
K10D0239_H0240:335b-2: mya ngan las 'da' ba'i them skas lta bu'o //
K10D0239_H0240:335b-4: gal te sems skyed pa tsam mam /
K10D0239_H0240:335b-5: smon lam btab pa tsam gyis chog ste /
K10D0239_H0240:335b-6: dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam goms par nan tan bya mi dgos par byang chub dang /
K10D0239_H0240:335b-7: yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar thob tu zin
K10D0239_H0240:335b-8: na ni bskal pa gcig la yud tsam thang cig
K10D0239_H0240:335b-9: gis phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad sa'i
K10D0239_H0240:335b-10: khams kyi rdul phra mo snyed kyi sems can dag
K10D0239_H0240:335b-11: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par
K10D0239_H0240:335b-12: 'tshang rgya zhing mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba
K10D0239_H0240:335b-13: zhig na de ni de lta bu'i gnas med do
K10D0239_H0240:335b-15: dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam ni 'jig rten dang /
K10D0239_H0240:335b-16: 'jig rten las 'da' ba'i 'bras bu'i khyad par dang /
K10D0239_H0240:335b-18: rigs kyi bu; gal te dge ba bcu'i las kyi
K10D0239_H0240:335b-19: lam la nan tan du ma byas na phyogs bcu'i
K10D0239_H0240:335b-20: sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul phra mo
K10D0239_H0240:335b-21: snyed kyi bskal par bdag ni theg pa chen po
K10D0239_H0240:335b-26: smon lam btab kyang byang chub dang /
K10D0239_H0240:335b-27: mya ngan las 'da' ba 'thob par mi 'gyur la /
K10D0239_H0240:335b-29: 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las 'don mi nus so //
K10D0239_H0240:335b-31: dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la nan tan byas pas 'jig rten na rgyal rigs dang /
K10D0239_H0240:335b-32: bram ze la sogs pa rigs chen po dang /
K10D0239_H0240:336a-1: bzhi'i lha nas 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched steng gi bar du yod pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:336a-2: nyan thos kyi theg pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:336a-3: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:336a-4: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du'ang yod par 'gyur te /
K10D0239_H0240:336a-5: de dag kun kyang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam
K10D0239_H0240:336a-6: la shin tu nan tan byed pa'i khyad par dang
K10D0239_H0240:336a-10: gang myur du bla na med pa yang dag par
K10D0239_H0240:336a-11: rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par 'dod na dge ba
K10D0239_H0240:336a-12: bcu'i las kyi lam la nan tan gyi rgyan gyis
K10D0239_H0240:336a-13: brgyan te; mi dge ba bcu'i sngom pa la mi
K10D0239_H0240:336a-14: gnas na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
K10D0239_H0240:336a-15: pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o //
K10D0239_H0240:336a-16: gang myur du theg pa chen po'i spyod yul du
K10D0239_H0240:336a-17: chud par 'dod dam; myur du bla na med pa
K10D0239_H0240:336a-18: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par 'dod
K10D0239_H0240:336a-19: dam / myur du dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs
K10D0239_H0240:336a-20: su rdzogs par 'dod na sngar dge ba bcu'i las
K10D0239_H0240:336a-21: kyi lam shin tu bsrung bar bya'o //
K10D0239_H0240:336a-23: dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam gyis ni dge ba'i chos thams cad dang /
K10D0239_H0240:336a-24: yon tan rnam par gzhag pa'i gzhi dang /
K10D0239_H0240:336a-26: 'jig rten las 'da' ba'i 'bras bu'i mchog thob par byed pa'i rgyu yin no //
K10D0239_H0240:336a-27: de bas na dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la shin tu nan tan bya'o //
K10D0239_H0240:336b-0: de nas bcom ldan 'das @336b kyis don 'di dag
K10D0239_H0240:336b-1: gsal bar bzlas pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad de gsungs
K10D0239_H0240:336b-2: pa / srid pa'i sdug bsngal kun gcod cing /
K10D0239_H0240:336b-4: dge bcu'i 'khor lo'i nan tan la //
K10D0239_H0240:336b-5: le lo ma byed brtson par gyis //
K10D0239_H0240:336b-6: theg pa gsum gyis dam chos dang //
K10D0239_H0240:336b-7: theg pa rnam gsum gang zag dang //
K10D0239_H0240:336b-8: rab tu byung ba thams cad la //
K10D0239_H0240:336b-10: theg chen spyod la dad mos shing //
K10D0239_H0240:336b-12: chos mchog rtogs nas zhing dag der //
K10D0239_H0240:336b-13: byang chub chen po myur du 'thob //
K10D0239_H0240:336b-14: gal te srog gcod yongs spangs na //
K10D0239_H0240:336b-15: kun gyis bkur zhing bla mar byed //
K10D0239_H0240:336b-16: rtag tu nad med tshe yang ring //
K10D0239_H0240:336b-17: bde zhing skyid la gnod pa med //
K10D0239_H0240:336b-18: skye ba'i gnas ni thams cad du //
K10D0239_H0240:336b-19: sangs rgyas spyod yul lam la mos //
K10D0239_H0240:336b-20: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun mthong //
K10D0239_H0240:336b-21: myur du bla med byang chub 'thob //
K10D0239_H0240:336b-22: ma byin len pa yongs spangs na //
K10D0239_H0240:336b-23: mkhas pas bkur zhing bla mar byed //
K10D0239_H0240:336b-24: 'dod chags skye ba'i lam kun zhi //

K10D0239_H0240:362b-16: reg bya gsum dang; tshor ba gsum dang /
K10D0239_H0240:362b-20: rnam par grol ba gsum dang /
K10D0239_H0240:362b-21: rnam pa de dag thams cad la sems rab tu zhi ba /
K10D0239_H0240:362b-24: len pa med pas mnyam pa nyid du gnas so //
K10D0239_H0240:362b-25: gang ji snyed sbyin pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:362b-31: pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad la sems kyi
K10D0239_H0240:362b-32: spyod pa med par rab tu zhi bar gnas so
K10D0239_H0240:362b-33: // de bzhin du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /
K10D0239_H0240:362b-34: yang dag par spong ba bzhin dang /
K10D0239_H0240:362b-35: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /
K10D0239_H0240:362b-38: byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /
K10D0239_H0240:362b-39: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la'ang sems kyi
K10D0239_H0240:363a-0: spyod pa med pa rab tu zhi bar gnas @363a
K10D0239_H0240:363a-1: *// so; ;gang ji snyed dgu mthar gyis gnas pa'i
K10D0239_H0240:363a-2: snyoms par 'jug pa la'ang sems kyis spyod pa med
K10D0239_H0240:363a-3: par rab tu zhi bar gnas so //
K10D0239_H0240:363a-5: mngon par 'du byed pa gsum dang /
K10D0239_H0240:363a-6: chos la sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes dang /
K10D0239_H0240:363a-8: lam gyi rang bzhin 'dren par byed pa dag la'ang len pa med pa /
K10D0239_H0240:363a-9: sems kyi spyod pa med pa /
K10D0239_H0240:363a-10: kun gzhi rnam par shes pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:363a-11: kun gzhi rnam par shes pa ma yin pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:363a-12: nye bar len pa dang bcas pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:363a-13: nye bar len pa med pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:363a-14: zag pa dang bcas pa dang; zag pa med pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:363a-23: mi dge ba dang; lung du mi ston pa thams
K10D0239_H0240:363a-24: cad kyi rnam pa la len pa med pa dang
K10D0239_H0240:363a-25: / sems kyi spyod pa med par rab tu zhi bar gnas so //
K10D0239_H0240:363a-26: gang ji snyed byams pa chen po dang /
K10D0239_H0240:363a-28: thabs mkhas pas sems can yongs su smin par byed
K10D0239_H0240:363a-29: pa nas srung bar bya ba med pa gsum dang
K10D0239_H0240:363a-31: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi
K10D0239_H0240:363a-32: bar du chos thams cad kyi rnam pa la len
K10D0239_H0240:363a-33: pa med pa / sems kyi spyod pa med par rab tu zhi bar gnas so //
K10D0239_H0240:363a-34: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag 'khor
K10D0239_H0240:363b-0: lo 'di'i dbang gis @363b tshor ba rnam gsum gyi
K10D0239_H0240:363b-1: nyes pa yongs su bsal ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:363b-2: rnam par rtog pa thams cad yongs su zhi ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:363b-3: mtshan ma'i chos thams cad yongs su spong bar 'gyur ro //
K10D0239_H0240:363b-5: ji snyed nam mkha'i mig dang /
K10D0239_H0240:363b-6: spyi bo'i ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /
K10D0239_H0240:363b-7: gzungs rnams la thabs mkhas pa'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo'ang 'dren par 'gyur te /
K10D0239_H0240:363b-8: byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lo de la gnas pas
K10D0239_H0240:363b-9: gang 'das pa'i dus kyi sdig pa mi dge ba'i
K10D0239_H0240:363b-10: las kyi lhag mas gnyer te ngan 'gro mnar med
K10D0239_H0240:363b-11: pa dang / gzhan yang srid pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:363b-12: 'gro ba rnams su 'khor bar 'khor ba'i las thams
K10D0239_H0240:363b-13: cad lhag ma ma lus par yongs su bsal te
K10D0239_H0240:363b-14: / rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu mi myong bar byed do //
K10D0239_H0240:363b-18: mun pa nag pos nam mkha' thams cad yog pa
K10D0239_H0240:363b-19: na nyi ma shar ba'i tshe mun pa thams cad
K10D0239_H0240:363b-21: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' 'ang tshigs so
K10D0239_H0240:363b-22: so yang dag par rig pa nam mkha'i dbyings dang
K10D0239_H0240:363b-25: yangs shing rgya chen po dang ldan pas ji snyed sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad de /
K10D0239_H0240:363b-28: shin tu brtan pa'i bzod pa'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo'ang grub cing 'dren par 'gyur ro //
K10D0239_H0240:363b-31: spyi bo'i ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /
K10D0239_H0240:364a-1: mkhas pa'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo la gnas
K10D0239_H0240:364a-2: pa dpag tu med pa nam mkha' lta bu'i ye
K10D0239_H0240:364a-3: shes kyi nyi mas phyin ci log bzhi'i mun pa
K10D0239_H0240:364a-5: 'das pa'i dus kyi sdig pa mi dge ba'i las
K10D0239_H0240:364a-6: kyi lhag mas gnyer te ngan 'gro mnar med pa
K10D0239_H0240:364a-9: 'gro ba rnams su 'khor bar 'khor ba'i las thams
K10D0239_H0240:364a-10: cad lhag ma ma lus par yongs su sel te
K10D0239_H0240:364a-11: / rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu myong bar mi byed do //
K10D0239_H0240:364a-13: de'i dbang gis sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la dbang thob pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:364a-15: sdig pa'i grogs po'i dbang du mi 'gro zhing rjes su mi spyod pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:364a-16: rtag tu sangs rgyas mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:364a-18: nyan thos kyi nye gnas mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:364a-19: chos thos pa dang mi 'bral ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:364a-21: bsnyen bkur byed pa dang mi 'bral ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:364a-22: yon tan thams cad la sems mi ngoms pa nas byang chub kyi bar du rgyun mi 'chad de /
K10D0239_H0240:364a-23: rtag tu sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang mi
K10D0239_H0240:364a-24: 'bral ba ni chung du na rmi lam du'ang bar
K10D0239_H0240:364a-27: de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems
K10D0239_H0240:364a-28: dpa' chen po tshigs so so yang dag par rig
K10D0239_H0240:364a-29: pas nam mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam pa /
K10D0239_H0240:364b-0: mtha' yas @364b pa; yangs shing rgya che ba dang
K10D0239_H0240:364b-1: ldan pas ji snyed sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad
K10D0239_H0240:364b-4: shin tu brtan pa'i bzod pa'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo 'dren par 'gyur zhe na /
K10D0239_H0240:364b-6: byang chub sems dpa' rnams bsam gtan dang po nas
K10D0239_H0240:364b-7: bsam gtan bzhi pa'i bar du snyoms par 'jug pa
K10D0239_H0240:364b-8: dang / nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched nas 'du
K10D0239_H0240:364b-9: shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi bar
K10D0239_H0240:364b-12: tshor ba 'gog pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
K10D0239_H0240:364b-13: 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas na tshor
K10D0239_H0240:364b-15: 'du byed gsum po yongs su bcad de /
K10D0239_H0240:364b-17: g-yo ba'i sems kyi spyod pa med pa /
K10D0239_H0240:364b-22: yid la byed pa la sogs pa kun gcod par 'gyur ro //
K10D0239_H0240:364b-23: ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas na zhag gcig gam;
K10D0239_H0240:364b-24: zhag bdun gyi bar du bsam gtan gyi zas za
K10D0239_H0240:364b-25: bar 'gyur ro // ting nge 'dzin de las langs
K10D0239_H0240:364b-26: na'ang sems rab tu zhi ba len pa med cing
K10D0239_H0240:364b-27: bar 'gyur ro // / lhan ner gnas par 'gyur ro //
K10D0239_H0240:364b-28: gzhan yang don dam pa'i mthas gtugs pa'i stong pa
K10D0239_H0240:364b-29: nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par 'jog go
K10D0239_H0240:365a-0: / ting nge 'dzin de la gnas na sems rab tu mnyam pas nam mkha' ltar @365a *//
K10D0239_H0240:365a-2: lus kyi ba spu'i bu ga kun nas zil dngar
K10D0239_H0240:365a-3: gyi thigs pa skar ma snar ma lta bu mngon
K10D0239_H0240:365a-4: par byung bas kun nas nyon mongs pas bcings pa'i
K10D0239_H0240:365a-5: yongs su gdung ba thams cad sel bar 'gyur ro
K10D0239_H0240:365a-6: // ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas yang dag pa'i dran pa thob ste /
K10D0239_H0240:365a-7: dga' ba khyad par can gyis lus la khyab par gyur pa ni ji ltar lha'i sras po dang /
K10D0239_H0240:365a-9: bde ba'i ting nge 'dzin thams cad la 'jug pa
K10D0239_H0240:365a-10: nas lus kyi ba spu'i khung bu kun nas rab
K10D0239_H0240:365a-11: tu bde ba myong ba bzhin de ltar byang chub
K10D0239_H0240:365a-12: sems dpa' de lus la bde bas reg pas sangs
K10D0239_H0240:365a-13: rgyas rjes su dran par 'gyur ro //
K10D0239_H0240:365a-14: sangs rgyas rjes su dran pas sangs rgyas mthong ba las mtshan ma gzhan mthong ba med do //
K10D0239_H0240:365a-15: byang chub sems dpa' de'i tshe sangs rgyas gcig yid la byas na sangs rgyas gcig mthong ngo //
K10D0239_H0240:365a-16: gal te sangs rgyas mang po yid la byas na sangs rgyas mang po mthong ngo //
K10D0239_H0240:365a-17: gal te sangs rgyas kyi sku chung bar yid la
K10D0239_H0240:365a-18: byas na sangs rgyas kyi sku chung dur mthong ngo
K10D0239_H0240:365a-19: // gal te sangs rgyas kyi sku chen por yid
K10D0239_H0240:365a-20: la byas na sangs rgyas kyi sku chen por mthong
K10D0239_H0240:365a-21: // ngo // gal te sangs rgyas kyi sku tshad
K10D0239_H0240:365a-22: med par yid la byas na sangs rgyas kyi sku
K10D0239_H0240:365b-0: gal te bdag gi lus sangs @365b rgyas kyi sku'i
K10D0239_H0240:365b-1: mtshan dang ldan par yid la byas na bdag gi
K10D0239_H0240:365b-2: lus de sangs rgyas kyi sku dang 'dra bar mtshan
K10D0239_H0240:365b-3: phun sum tshogs par mthong ngo //
K10D0239_H0240:365b-4: gal te gzhan gyi lus sangs rgyas kyi skur yid
K10D0239_H0240:365b-5: la byas na gzhan gyi lus sangs rgyas kyi sku
K10D0239_H0240:365b-6: dang 'dra bar mtshan phun su mtshogs par mthong ngo
K10D0239_H0240:365b-8: sems can ma yin pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:365b-9: ji snyed gzugs su gtogs pa thams cad sangs rgyas
K10D0239_H0240:365b-10: kyi sku mtshan dang ldan par yid la byas na
K10D0239_H0240:365b-11: sems can dang / sems can ma yin pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:365b-12: ji snyed gzugs su gtogs pa thams cad sangs rgyas
K10D0239_H0240:365b-13: kyi sku dang 'dra bar mtshan phun sum tshogs par
K10D0239_H0240:365b-14: mthong gi gzugs gzhan du mi mthong ngo //
K10D0239_H0240:365b-15: byang chub sems dpa' de'i tshe'ang 'di snyam du chos
K10D0239_H0240:365b-16: thams cad dang; gzugs thams cad ni sgyu ma dang
K10D0239_H0240:365b-17: 'dra ste / yang dag pa ma yin pas bdag gis tshor ba rnam gsum dang /
K10D0239_H0240:365b-18: 'du byed gsum la sogs pa chos thams cad lhag
K10D0239_H0240:365b-19: ma ma lus par yongs su gcad do snyam nas
K10D0239_H0240:365b-20: 'gog pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so
K10D0239_H0240:365b-21: // ting nge 'dzin de la gnas nas blo sngon
K10D0239_H0240:365b-22: du btang ba bzhin du thams cad yongs su bcad
K10D0239_H0240:365b-23: de ting nge 'dzin gyi ro'i zas kyis 'tsho'o //
K10D0239_H0240:365b-24: gal te na zhag bdun nam /
K10D0239_H0240:366a-1: gal te bskal pa tshad med pa bye ba khrag
K10D0239_H0240:366a-2: khrig brgya stong gi bar du ci nus su gnas
K10D0239_H0240:366a-3: te / ting nge 'dzin gyi zas za'o //
K10D0239_H0240:366a-4: ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas sems rab tu
K10D0239_H0240:366a-5: zhi bas ci la'ang mi chags te bde bar gnas
K10D0239_H0240:366a-6: so // gal te don dam pa'i mthas gtugs pa'i
K10D0239_H0240:366a-7: ting nge 'dzin du zhugs na'ang sngar ji skad bshad
K10D0239_H0240:366a-8: pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi sku mtshan dang ldan
K10D0239_H0240:366a-9: pa yid la bya ba nas chos thams cad dang
K10D0239_H0240:366a-10: so // / gzugs thams cad sgyu ma dang 'dra
K10D0239_H0240:366a-11: ste yang dag pa ma yin pa'i bar du chud
K10D0239_H0240:366a-12: so // / par byed do // rigs kyi bu /
K10D0239_H0240:366a-13: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
K10D0239_H0240:366a-14: tshig so so yang dag par rig pa nam mkha'i
K10D0239_H0240:366a-15: dbyings dang mnyam pa; tshad med pa /
K10D0239_H0240:366a-17: yangs shing rgya che ba dang ldan pa ji snyed sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad de /
K10D0239_H0240:366a-19: gzungs thams cad dang; shin tu brtan pa'i bzod pa'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo zhes bya ste /
K10D0239_H0240:366a-20: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag 'khor lo 'di dang ldan na nam mkha'i mig dang /
K10D0239_H0240:366a-21: spyi bo'i ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /
K10D0239_H0240:366a-22: gzungs rnams las shin tu thabs mkhas pa thams cad
K10D0239_H0240:366a-23: lhag ma ma lus par spangs te rnam par smin
K10D0239_H0240:366b-0: pa'i 'bras bu len par mi byed @366b do; ;gzhan
K10D0239_H0240:366b-3: 'jig rten gyi khams su mes 'jig pa 'byung du
K10D0239_H0240:366b-4: nye ba ni nyi ma lnga gcig car shar te
K10D0239_H0240:366b-5: / 'jig rten gyi khams na rdzing bu dang /
K10D0239_H0240:366b-10: mtsho chen po'i chu rnams lhag ma ma lus par thams cad skems par 'gyur ro //
K10D0239_H0240:366b-11: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' 'ang tshigs so
K10D0239_H0240:366b-12: so yang dag par rig pa nam mkha'i dbyings dang
K10D0239_H0240:366b-15: yangs shing rgya che ba dang ldan pas sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad de /
K10D0239_H0240:366b-18: shin tu brten pa'i bzod pa'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo'ang mngon par 'dren to //
K10D0239_H0240:366b-21: spyi bo'i ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /
K10D0239_H0240:366b-22: gzungs rnams la thabs mkhas pa'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo la'ang gnas shing 'dren par 'gyur ro //
K10D0239_H0240:366b-23: gang 'das pa'i dus kyi sdig pa mi dge ba'i las kyi lhag mas gnyer te /
K10D0239_H0240:366b-26: 'gro ba rnams su 'khor bar 'khor ba'i las thams
K10D0239_H0240:366b-27: cad lhag ma ma lus par yongs su bskams te
K10D0239_H0240:366b-28: / rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu mi len par byed do //
K10D0239_H0240:367a-1: 'jig pa byung ba na stong gsum gyi stong chen
K10D0239_H0240:367a-2: po'i 'jig rten gyi khams chu 'di'i khams chung du'i
K10D0239_H0240:367a-4: gling phran brgyad dang; ri rab ri'i rgyal po dang /
K10D0239_H0240:367a-5: ri phran thams cad chu yis bkrus te zhig nas lhag ma ma lus par zad par 'gyur ro //
K10D0239_H0240:367a-6: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang tshigs so
K10D0239_H0240:367a-7: so yang dag par rig pa nam mkha'i dbyings dang
K10D0239_H0240:367a-10: yangs shing rgya che ba dang ldan pas ji snyed sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad de /
K10D0239_H0240:367a-13: shin tu brtan pa'i bzod pa'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo'ang 'grub cing 'dren par 'gyur ro //
K10D0239_H0240:367a-15: spyi bo'i ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /
K10D0239_H0240:367a-16: gzungs rnams la thabs mkhas pa'i go cha chen po'i
K10D0239_H0240:367a-17: 'khor lo la gnas shing 'dren par 'gyur bas 'das
K10D0239_H0240:367a-18: pa'i dus kyi sdig pa mi dge ba'i las kyi
K10D0239_H0240:367a-19: lhag mas gnyer te ngan 'gro mnar med pa dang
K10D0239_H0240:367a-22: 'gro ba rnams su 'khor ba 'khor ba'i las la
K10D0239_H0240:367a-23: mkhas pa'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo'ang gnas par
K10D0239_H0240:367a-24: 'gyur ro // 'khor lo 'di la gnas pas dpag
K10D0239_H0240:367a-25: tu med pa nam mkha' lta bu'i ye shes kyi
K10D0239_H0240:367b-0: nyi ma 'byung bas rang gi lus @367b la phyin
K10D0239_H0240:367b-2: ma rig pa'i mun pa thams cad yongs su sel bar 'gyur ro //
K10D0239_H0240:367b-3: 'das pa'i dus kyi sdig pa mi dge ba'i las
K10D0239_H0240:367b-4: kyi lhag mas gnyer te ngan 'gro mnar med pa
K10D0239_H0240:367b-7: 'gro ba rnams su 'khor bar 'khor ba'i las thams
K10D0239_H0240:367b-8: cad kyang lhag ma ma lus par yongs su sel
K10D0239_H0240:367b-9: te / rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu'ang myong bar byed do //
K10D0239_H0240:367b-11: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang 'khor
K10D0239_H0240:367b-12: lo 'di dang ldan na thog ma sems bskyed nas
K10D0239_H0240:367b-13: 'dod pa rnam lnga yongs su bsal te; nyan thos
K10D0239_H0240:367b-14: dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das shing /
K10D0239_H0240:367b-16: rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing du 'gyur ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:367b-18: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:367b-21: 'khor lo 'di'i dbang gis sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la dbang du 'gyur ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:367b-23: sdig pa'i grogs po'i dbang du mi 'gro ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:367b-24: sangs rgyas thams cad mthong ba dang mi 'bral zhing byang chub sems dpa' dang /
K10D0239_H0240:367b-25: nyan thos kyi nye gnas mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:367b-26: chos thos pa dang mi 'bral ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:368a-1: bkur byed pa dang mi 'bral ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:368a-2: yon tan thams cad la sems mi ngoms pa ste /
K10D0239_H0240:368a-3: mngon par byang chub kyi bar du rgyun mi 'chad
K10D0239_H0240:368a-4: pa dang; rtag tu sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa
K10D0239_H0240:368a-5: dang mi 'bral ba ni chung du na rmi lam
K10D0239_H0240:368a-7: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' de bsod nams dang /
K10D0239_H0240:368a-8: ye shes kyi tshogs kyang myur du rdzogs pa dang /
K10D0239_H0240:368a-9: ring po mi thogs par rnam par dag pa'i sangs
K10D0239_H0240:368a-10: rgyas kyi zhing du bla na med pa yang dag
K10D0239_H0240:368a-11: par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas
K10D0239_H0240:368a-12: nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na sems can thams
K10D0239_H0240:368a-13: cad kyang rdzus te skye ba dang /
K10D0239_H0240:368a-15: gzugs sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang 'dra ba /
